String.Source: Alik'r Warrior
String.Dest: 阿利克尔战士

String.Source: faction for party guests
String.Dest: faction for party guests

String.Source: Orc
String.Dest: 兽人

String.Source: What did you find in the cave?
String.Dest: 你在洞穴里找到什么了？

String.Source: I wouldn't have it any other way, friend.
String.Dest: 我没有其他方式，朋友。

String.Source: Ancano is dead. The College is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了。冬堡学院安全了。

String.Source: What's with the Orc?
String.Dest: 那个兽人是怎么回事？

String.Source: Thank you, my friend. I'll find you again if I need you.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，我的朋友。下次当我需要你的时候，我还会来找你的。

String.Source: Haelga
String.Dest: 哈尔嘉

String.Source: Strong will, maybe. Strong character? Tell that to all the people I've killed.
String.Dest: 强大的意志，也许。强大的性格？去告诉那些我杀了的人吧。

String.Source: Fort Greymoor
String.Dest: 灰沼泽堡垒

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Sky Haven Temple
String.Dest: 天空圣坛神庙

String.Source: You probably have a better chance of finding a talking mudcrab.
String.Dest: 你可能有了一个更好的机会去找到一只会说话的泥沼蟹。

String.Source: High Gate Ruins Catacombs
String.Dest: 高门遗迹

String.Source: What brought you to Skyrim?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹到天际省来了？

String.Source: Harmugstahl
String.Dest: 汉蒙斯托尔

String.Source: I know, I'm sick of seeing your face.
String.Dest: 我知道，我厌恶看见你的脸。

String.Source: The Ratway
String.Dest: 鼠道

String.Source: Fisherman
String.Dest: 渔民

String.Source: What's your problem?
String.Dest: 你遇到什么问题了？

String.Source: Don't worry, we have a plan for slipping by the Giant. This is just in case.
String.Dest: 别担心，为了以防万一，我们还有一个绊倒巨人的计划。

String.Source: Cowflop Farmhouse
String.Dest: 牛蹄农场

String.Source: Khajiit
String.Dest: 虎人

String.Source: Steamscorch Mine
String.Dest: 灼热溪流矿场

String.Source: Pit Wolf
String.Dest: 斑点狼

String.Source: Conjure Dragon Priest
String.Dest: 召唤龙祭司

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过？

String.Source: Barkeep
String.Dest: 酒吧老板

String.Source: What's the word around town?
String.Dest: 城里有什么传闻吗？

String.Source: Tell me a story from the company days.
String.Dest: 说说你那些年和伙伴一起的日子。

String.Source: You explained why you got the name "Swamp Knight." But not how.
String.Dest: 你解释了为什么你会得到“沼泽骑士”的称号，但我想知道你是怎么得到这个称号的。

String.Source: Movarth's Lair
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯的巢穴

String.Source: Scholar
String.Dest: 学者

String.Source: Look at it this way. If we do, it'll just mean more adventures.
String.Dest: 这样来想这件事：如果我们这么做了，只会意味着更多的冒险。

String.Source: This isn't for you. I go where the challenge is greatest.
String.Dest: 这不是因为你，哪里有最艰难的挑战哪里就有我。

String.Source: Wolfskull Ruins
String.Dest: 狼头骨遗迹

String.Source: Fort Sungard Shrine
String.Dest: 森加德堡垒祭坛

String.Source: Fort Sungard Annex
String.Dest: 阳光花园堡垒角楼

String.Source: The Warrens
String.Dest: 贫民窟

String.Source: Hunter's Journal
String.Dest: 猎人日记

String.Source: What did you have in mind?
String.Dest: 你在想什么？

String.Source: You're welcome.
String.Dest: 不用客气。

String.Source: A man who can play the lute is handy on a weary road.
String.Dest: 在漫漫长路上，有个会弹琴的人陪着真是太有爱了。

String.Source: Solitude
String.Dest: 独孤城

String.Source: Evoker
String.Dest: 唤魔者

String.Source: It's a shame your company couldn't reunite under better circumstances.
String.Dest: 你和你的小伙伴不能在个好一点的环境下重逢真是太遗憾了。

String.Source: Windpeak Inn
String.Dest: 风峦旅馆

String.Source: Reveler
String.Dest: 狂欢者

String.Source: Goat Hide
String.Dest: 山羊皮

String.Source: Lexicon Receptacle
String.Dest: 方典基座

String.Source: Cellar
String.Dest: 地下室

String.Source: Castle Dour
String.Dest: 杜尔城堡

String.Source: Dalum-Ei is the assassin.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾就是那个刺客。

String.Source: How does the boy's past change things?
String.Dest: 这个男孩的过去是如何改变一切的?

String.Source: Fortify One-handed
String.Dest: 单手武器强化

String.Source: Knifepoint Mine
String.Dest: 刀尖矿场

String.Source: Barbarian
String.Dest: 野蛮人

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Bodyguard
String.Dest: 侍卫

String.Source: Investigate the Hall of the Dead
String.Dest: 调查亡者之厅

String.Source: I agree. I would be honored to include myself among them.
String.Dest: 我同意，很荣幸加入他们。

String.Source: Torture Victim
String.Dest: 被折磨的受害者

String.Source: You decide. I don't care what happens to the urchin.
String.Dest: 你来决定。我可不在乎在那个顽童身上会发生什么。

String.Source: Sleeping Tree Cave
String.Dest: 沉睡之树洞穴

String.Source: Are you sure? I don't trust this mage can keep him safe.
String.Dest: 你确定吗?我不相信这个法师能保证他的安全。

String.Source: So what's the plan?
String.Dest: 你有什么计划？

String.Source: Student
String.Dest: 学员

String.Source: Sergius
String.Dest: 瑟吉尔斯

String.Source: Are you proposing we get the Greybeards drunk? Do you realize the consequences?
String.Dest: 你建议我们把灰胡子灌醉？你知道后果吗？

String.Source: Changing clothes won't help. You can't hide the past like it didn't happen.
String.Dest: 改变服装也无济于事。你不能逃避它，就像它没有发生过。

String.Source: Bilegulch Mine
String.Dest: 比雷古奇矿井

String.Source: That, and I actually wash behind my ears regularly.
String.Dest: 那个，好吧，我洗耳恭听。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Miner's Barracks
String.Dest: 矿工营地

String.Source: Ghost
String.Dest: 鬼魂

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Rimerock Burrow
String.Dest: 雾凇岩地洞

String.Source: Here. Have a gold piece. (1 gold)
String.Dest: 来，这枚金币拿去。(1金币)

String.Source: What's our next move?
String.Dest: 我们下一步做什么？

String.Source: Fenn's Gulch Mine
String.Dest: 芬恩的地沟矿场

String.Source: Redoran's Retreat
String.Dest: 瑞多然的休息处

String.Source: Vanquishing the World Eater was a collective effort.
String.Dest: 是集体的力量让我们击败了奥杜因。

String.Source: Why Riften? Are you going to check the orphanage?
String.Dest: 为什么是裂谷城? 难道你打算去孤儿院看看？

String.Source: Then I guess I have no choice but to come along.
String.Dest: 我猜我除了一起去以外没别的选择了对吧。

String.Source: Windhelm Barracks
String.Dest: 风盔营房

String.Source: Thanks, I guess.
String.Dest: 那就，谢谢吧。

String.Source: Rein in your emotions. This weapon is potentially dangerous.
String.Dest: 放轻松，武器可没长眼。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Oh, you missed out. Ancano's dying screams were sweet, sweet poetry.
String.Dest: 哦，你错过好戏了。安卡诺那垂死的尖叫简直比诗歌还甜美。

String.Source: The Drunken Huntsman
String.Dest: 酩酊猎手

String.Source: It fits you. You look like a true knight.
String.Dest: 那很适合你。你看起来像个真正的骑士了.

String.Source: How did you escape?
String.Dest: 你是怎么逃脱的？

String.Source: So what now?
String.Dest: 那么现在呢？

String.Source: Broken Tower Redoubt
String.Dest: 破碎塔据点

String.Source: I understand that most travel is done by boat.
String.Dest: 我知道大多数旅行都得靠船。

String.Source: Romlyn Dreth's House
String.Dest: 洛姆林·德莱瑟

String.Source: Mara's Eye Den
String.Dest: 玛拉之眼巢穴

String.Source: Lost Echo Cave
String.Dest: 失落之声洞穴

String.Source: Atheron Residence
String.Dest: 阿瑟荣住宅

String.Source: What's your opinion on Morndas?
String.Dest: 关于摩恩达斯，你做了什么样的決定?

String.Source: Burguk's Longhouse
String.Dest: 博古克长屋

String.Source: Beggar's Row
String.Dest: 乞丐的平房

String.Source: So it's like fighting three hackwings?
String.Dest: 因此就像是跟三个刀翼干架?

String.Source: Dragonsreach Jarl's Quarters
String.Dest: 龙宵宫领主居住区

String.Source: Shiv
String.Dest: 利刃

String.Source: Corpselight Farm
String.Dest: 尸光农场

String.Source: Dalum-Ei suggested Bodan was the traitor.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾暗示波登就是那个叛徒。

String.Source: Blank Lexicon
String.Dest: 空白方典

String.Source: We need your assistance with a Giant.
String.Dest: 我们需要你帮忙对付一个巨人。

String.Source: The Pit
String.Dest: 地窖

String.Source: It wasn't the revenge he wanted, but he got it nonetheless.
String.Dest: 这不是他所期望的复仇，但他还是这么做了。

String.Source: Dragonsreach Dungeon
String.Dest: 龙宵宫地牢

String.Source: Mistwatch West Tower
String.Dest: 观雾西塔

String.Source: Liar's Retreat
String.Dest: 谎言者藏身处

String.Source: Nord
String.Dest: 诺德人

String.Source: You said you were born in a tribal village. But it couldn't have been isolated.
String.Dest: 你说你出生于一个部落村落，可那也不可能与世隔绝。

String.Source: Dragons attack because they're afraid. Just look at us. We're terrifying.
String.Dest: 那些巨龙攻来是因为它们在害怕。看看我们自己，我们长得可吓人了。

String.Source: What about the cheese? Who doesn't like cheese?
String.Dest: 那奶酪呢? 有谁不喜欢奶酪?

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂

String.Source: Boulderfall Cave
String.Dest: 落石洞穴

String.Source: Who are you?
String.Dest: 你是谁？

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Adventurer
String.Dest: 冒险家

String.Source: Clearly you lack compassion, you heartless shrew.
String.Dest: 很明显你根本就没有同情心，你这禽兽不如的泼妇！

String.Source: Here. Have a drink on me.
String.Dest: 拿去，我身上有些喝的。

String.Source: Shriekwind Bastion
String.Dest: 啸风棱堡

String.Source: Honestly, I think opening a gateway to Oblivion might be fun.
String.Dest: 说实话，我觉得开启一扇通往湮灭的大门会很有趣。

String.Source: Salvius Farmhouse
String.Dest: 萨维乌斯农场

String.Source: You mentioned a company of fighters.
String.Dest: 你提到了一队战士。

String.Source: Shadowgreen Cavern
String.Dest: 绿影洞穴

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Moss Mother Cavern
String.Dest: 沼泽母亲洞窟

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: You're the hero. I'm just some weakling the Gods chose to give this power to.
String.Dest: 你才是英雄，我只是一个有点运气，被神眷顾的人罢了。

String.Source: The Ragged Flagon
String.Dest: 破碎的大酒壶

String.Source: By the way, I know the Greybeards. They are still whiny children.
String.Dest: 顺便一提，我知道灰胡子。他们仍然是爱发牢骚的孩子。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) You mentioned fighting hackwings. Will that experience help?
String.Dest: （龙族兴起）你曾提到剿灭刀翼。这段经历会有所帮助吗？

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Considering the history, I don't blame them for despising you.
String.Dest: 想想以前发生的事，我也就不怪他们如此鄙视你了。

String.Source: Good to see you.
String.Dest: 幸会。

String.Source: Solitude Guard
String.Dest: 独孤城卫兵

String.Source: Bounty Hunter
String.Dest: 赏金猎人

String.Source: Who were you talking to?
String.Dest: 你跟谁讲话呢？

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Northwatch Prisoner
String.Dest: 北塔要塞囚犯

String.Source: Is it wise to leave Bodan alone?
String.Dest: 独自离开波登真的是明智的选择吗？

String.Source: Nchuand-Zel Excavation Site
String.Dest: 楚安德·泽尔洞穴

String.Source: Fort Kastav Prison
String.Dest: 卡斯塔夫堡垒监狱

String.Source: Noble
String.Dest: 贵族

String.Source: What will you do?
String.Dest: 你接下来有什么打算？

String.Source: Black Robes
String.Dest: 黑色长袍

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: We lazy people prefer to call it "stamina conservation."
String.Dest: 我们这些懒人更喜欢叫它 "节省体力"。

String.Source: Sorry, can't help you.
String.Dest: 抱歉，我没帮到你。

String.Source: Good luck with that.
String.Dest: 祝你好运。

String.Source: Pit Fan
String.Dest: 斗兽场爱好者

String.Source: Nchuand-Zel
String.Dest: 楚安德·泽尔

String.Source: Solitude Catacombs
String.Dest: 独孤城地下墓穴

String.Source: Just passing through.
String.Dest: 只是路过而已。

String.Source: Are you alright?
String.Dest: 你没事吧？

String.Source: Silver-Blood Inn
String.Dest: 银血旅店

String.Source: Chest
String.Dest: 箱子

String.Source: There's prestige with the name, but also pressure to live up to it.
String.Dest: 这个名字很有威信，但要想不辜负它同样很有压力。

String.Source: Isobel
String.Dest: 依索蓓

String.Source: Steel Dagger
String.Dest: 钢制匕首

String.Source: Healing Hands
String.Dest: 治愈之手

String.Source: Yes, I've always thought of myself as royalty.
String.Dest: 是的，我一直认为自己是皇室。

String.Source: Radiant Raiment
String.Dest: 锦衣玉裳

String.Source: You were right the first time. The boy should've died in that cave.
String.Dest: 你终于刚才正确了一次。那男孩本来应该已经死在那洞穴了。

String.Source: Wizard
String.Dest: 法师

String.Source: What do you think happened to Indrel?
String.Dest: 你认为英卓尔身上发生了什么?

String.Source: Stormcloak Guard
String.Dest: 风暴斗篷卫兵

String.Source: Lever
String.Dest: 拉杆

String.Source: Skyrim is my home.
String.Dest: 天际省就是我家园。

String.Source: I don't know how you can be so excited. I'm frightened for our lives.
String.Dest: 我真不知道你怎么能这么兴奋……咱们能活下来吧！

String.Source: Haelga's Bunkhouse
String.Dest: 哈尔嘉工棚

String.Source: Swindler's Den
String.Dest: 骗子老巢

String.Source: Morndas has a long way to go before becoming a monster like me.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝要成为像我这样的怪物还有好一大段路要走。

String.Source: Assassin
String.Dest: 刺客

String.Source: Temple of Dibella
String.Dest: 迪贝拉神殿

String.Source: Sarethi Farm
String.Dest: 萨雷提农场

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) How do the Companions compare to your old company?
String.Dest: (荣誉召唤)这个同伴和你以前的同伴比起来如何？

String.Source: Drelas
String.Dest: 德瑞拉斯

String.Source: Steam Breath
String.Dest: 蒸汽之息

String.Source: Temple of Talos
String.Dest: 塔洛斯神殿

String.Source: Treva's Watch
String.Dest: 崔瓦哨塔

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: What is this place?
String.Dest: 这是什么地方？

String.Source: Sleeping Giant Inn
String.Dest: 沉睡巨人旅店

String.Source: Elgrim's Elixirs
String.Dest: 艾尔格瑞姆的灵药

String.Source: Falkreath Jail
String.Dest: 佛克瑞斯监狱

String.Source: Argonian Assemblage
String.Dest: 亚龙人聚居区

String.Source: Synod Researcher
String.Dest: 希诺研究者

String.Source: Fellglow Keep Dungeons
String.Dest: 菲戈罗要塞地牢

String.Source: Are you interested in me?
String.Dest: 你对我感兴趣吗？

String.Source: Do you think you'll ever see her again?
String.Dest: 你觉得你还会再一次见到她吗？

String.Source: Hall of the Dead
String.Dest: 亡者之厅

String.Source: <Alias=Follower> is waiting for you
String.Dest: <Alias=Follower>在等你

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) What do you think about all this Elder Scrolls business?
String.Dest: （上古知识）你对上古卷轴的事了解多少？

String.Source: Alftand Ruined Tower
String.Dest: 艾尔夫坦德遗迹塔

String.Source: Go on.
String.Dest: 继续。

String.Source: You still have much to atone for. Tagging along with me doesn't change that.
String.Dest: 你仍然有许多过错要弥补。跟着我并不能改变这一点。

String.Source: No, I haven't.
String.Dest: 不，从来没有。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei said she suspected Bodan.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾说他怀疑波登。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei was an honorable knight. May the Gods take his soul.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾是个正直诚实的骑士，愿他的灵魂能够安息。

String.Source: Northwatch Keep
String.Dest: 北塔要塞

String.Source: Thalmor
String.Dest: 梭默

String.Source: What happens now?
String.Dest: 现在怎么办？

String.Source: Hat
String.Dest: 帽子

String.Source: Corpse
String.Dest: 尸骸

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: Why not?
String.Dest: 为什么不呢？

String.Source: Chillfurrow Farm
String.Dest: 寒犁农场

String.Source: Wait here a moment.
String.Dest: 在这等一会儿。

String.Source: Viola Giordano's House
String.Dest: 维奥拉·乔尔丹诺的房屋

String.Source: The marsh is dangerous. You should not delve into it as you do.
String.Dest: 那块沼泽相当危险，为了你的生命安全请务必远离那里。

String.Source: Purewater Run
String.Dest: 纯水奔流

String.Source: Drelas' Cottage
String.Dest: 德瑞拉斯的小屋

String.Source: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯已经干掉了，莫萨尔应该安全多了吧。

String.Source: East Empire Company
String.Dest: 东帝国公司

String.Source: Dead Man's Drink
String.Dest: 死人之酒

String.Source: Are you going to be alright?
String.Dest: 你还好么？

String.Source: Fort Greymoor Prison
String.Dest: 灰沼泽堡垒监狱

String.Source: Lund's Hut
String.Dest: 伦德的小屋

String.Source: Centurion Dynamo Core
String.Dest: 百夫长动力核

String.Source: Honor is a word poor people throw around to justify their poverty.
String.Dest: 穷人们总是把荣耀这个词挂在嘴边来为他们的贫穷辩解。

String.Source: I've got some business to attend to. I'll meet you in Riften.
String.Dest: 我还有些事情要处理，我会跟你在裂谷城見面。

String.Source: What did you see?
String.Dest: 你看到了什么？

String.Source: We could try walking in opposite directions.
String.Dest: 我们可以试着走反方向。

String.Source: Honorhall Orphanage
String.Dest: 荣耀厅孤儿院

String.Source: Lost Knife Hideout
String.Dest: 失落小刀据点

String.Source: The townsfolk may have suspected him, but thankfully they never acted.
String.Dest: 镇上的居民可能怀疑过他，不过幸好他们没表现出来。

String.Source: Karthwasten Hall
String.Dest: 卡斯威斯腾大厅

String.Source: Dead Crone Rock
String.Dest: 亡孺岩石

String.Source: Who was it?
String.Dest: 谁在那？

String.Source: So you aren't even a real knight. Might as well just call yourself "The Swamp."
String.Dest: 所以，你甚至不是一个真正的骑士。还不如干脆称自己为 "沼泽人"

String.Source: You don't think letting the boy live comes with some risk?
String.Dest: 你不觉得让男孩住有一定的风险？

String.Source: What are you doing out here?
String.Dest: 你在外面是做什么的？

String.Source: How did he die?
String.Dest: 他是怎么死的？

String.Source: Snapleg Cave
String.Dest: 断腿洞穴

String.Source: Slave
String.Dest: 奴隶

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: It's not the method of training, but your skill on the battlefield that counts.
String.Dest: 这不是训练的方法,不过你的技能在战场上才是最重要的.

String.Source: I prefer the old clothes myself.
String.Dest: 我宁愿是自己的旧衣服。

String.Source: Cidhna Mine
String.Dest: 希达纳矿场

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Go ahead. I'm listening.
String.Dest: 继续说，我在听。

String.Source: What did he do?
String.Dest: 他做了什么？

String.Source: What happened in Elsweyr?
String.Dest: 埃斯沃拉省发生了什么事？

String.Source: Can I make a request?
String.Dest: 我能点首曲子吗？

String.Source: Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 说说你的事。

String.Source: Skeever Tail
String.Dest: 雪鼠的尾巴

String.Source: What is it you do here?
String.Dest: 你在这里做什么？

String.Source: Cracked Tusk Vaults
String.Dest: 裂牙储藏室

String.Source: Candlehearth Hall
String.Dest: 烛炉堡

String.Source: How come?
String.Dest: 怎么这样？

String.Source: I found that book you wanted.
String.Dest: 我找到你要的书了。

String.Source: What makes you say that?
String.Dest: 你为何这么说？

String.Source: What do you think? Do we trust this mage?
String.Dest: 你觉得呢？我们能相信这个法师么？

String.Source: You're a necromancer?
String.Dest: 你是个死灵术士？

String.Source: I'd like to make a request.
String.Dest: 我想要点歌。

String.Source: The only good dragon is a dead dragon.
String.Dest: 唯一可爱的龙就是死龙。

String.Source: Hall of Attainment
String.Dest: 成就大厅

String.Source: Cragwallow Slope
String.Dest: 克雷格沃罗坡地

String.Source: Gabania's dead. I saw the knife go in his back.
String.Dest: 卡贝尼亚死了。我看见刀锋往他的背上画去。

String.Source: Snow-Shod Manor
String.Dest: 雪蹄别墅

String.Source: Breton
String.Dest: 布莱顿人

String.Source: Lemkil's Farmhouse
String.Dest: 莱姆吉尔的农舍

String.Source: Brazier
String.Dest: 火盆

String.Source: The Companions are still around because they have power. Honor is irrelevant.
String.Dest: 战友团依然团结在一起是因为他们拥有力量。而荣誉则是无关紧要的。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: You're on. (Brawl - 100 gold)
String.Dest: 来吧。(打架 - 100金币)

String.Source: It's done. Alduin's dead. Skyrim, saved.
String.Dest: 成功了。奥杜因死了。而天际省得到了拯救。

String.Source: Serpent's Bluff Ruins
String.Dest: 蛇石断崖遗址

String.Source: All you needed was an Orc.
String.Dest: 你所需要的就是一个兽人。

String.Source: Blue Palace
String.Dest: 蓝色宫殿

String.Source: Rorik's Manor
String.Dest: 洛里别墅

String.Source: Did you rescue the child?
String.Dest: 你把那孩子救出来了？

String.Source: Proudspire Manor
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅

String.Source: I didn't really care for the song to be honest. No wonder he tossed it aside.
String.Dest: 老实说我真的不在意那首歌儿。更别说他弃之不顾怎么的。该我何事。

String.Source: Black-Briar Meadery
String.Dest: 黑荆棘酒坊

String.Source: Hagraven Claw
String.Dest: 乌鸦鬼婆的爪子

String.Source: Fire Storm
String.Dest: 火焰风暴

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景庄园。

String.Source: It sounds like your company was tricked into making a bad choice.
String.Dest: 听起来似乎你的伙伴是被蒙骗着做出这样一个糟糕的决定的。

String.Source: You should've ran through a horde of ogres. That would scare him off.
String.Dest: 你要是从一群食人魔中穿过就好了。那会吓跑他的。

String.Source: Black Mage Hood
String.Dest: 黑色法师帽

String.Source: It was the hardest battle I ever fought. And the most rewarding.
String.Dest: 这是我打过的最艰难的战斗。也是最有意义的。

String.Source: Hm...maybe it's us who should act like hackwings then. Strike and flee.
String.Dest: 唔……或许到时我们可以像刀翼那样活动，比如打击和开溜。

String.Source: What happened then?
String.Dest: 然后发生了什么？

String.Source: Living with you would be perfect.
String.Dest: 和你一起生活将会很完美。

String.Source: Honeyside
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾

String.Source: Wood Elf
String.Dest: 木精灵

String.Source: The Ratway Warrens
String.Dest: 鼠道窝棚

String.Source: Fort Sungard Muster
String.Dest: 阳光花园堡垒集结点

String.Source: Greywater Grotto
String.Dest: 灰水洞穴

String.Source: Conjure Dremora Lord
String.Dest: 召唤魔人王士

String.Source: Erith
String.Dest: 艾瑞斯

String.Source: Lost Prospect Mine
String.Dest: 绝望矿场

String.Source: That doesn't seem like a good business model.
String.Dest: 这似乎并不像一个很好的交易。

String.Source: What about you?
String.Dest: 你呢？

String.Source: Broken Fang Cave
String.Dest: 断牙洞穴

String.Source: Why are you here?
String.Dest: 你为什么会在这里？

String.Source: Yes. There's nothing quite as exhilarating as embarking on a long quest.
String.Dest: 是的。没有什么比从事一个长期任务更让人兴奋的了。

String.Source: Argonian
String.Dest: 亚龙人

String.Source: Dragonborn
String.Dest: 龙裔

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) We've come to the end. Alduin and the final battle awaits.
String.Dest: （龙临堡）最后的时刻到了。奥杜因和终极之战等着咱们。

String.Source: The Ragged Flagon - Cistern
String.Dest: 破碎的大酒壶 · 蓄水池

String.Source: I'm glad we were able to save them.
String.Dest: 很高兴你能拯救他们。

String.Source: What do the Thalmor want with you?
String.Dest: 梭默那群人想从你身上得到什么？

String.Source: He was a deranged lunatic.
String.Dest: 他是个精神错乱的疯子。

String.Source: Fort Hraggstad
String.Dest: 哈格斯塔德堡垒监狱

String.Source: Skeleton
String.Dest: 骷髅

String.Source: If you were there, you most certainly would have died.
String.Dest: 如果你在那，你铁定回不来了。

String.Source: Mercenary
String.Dest: 雇佣兵

String.Source: I'm just exploring.
String.Dest: 我只是在探索。

String.Source: Hagraven Feathers
String.Dest: 乌鸦鬼婆的羽毛

String.Source: Mistveil Keep
String.Dest: 迷雾面纱塔楼

String.Source: What sort of drink would they prefer? I know you aren't a fan of mead.
String.Dest: 他们可能会喜欢什么样的饮料呢？我知道你不是蜂蜜酒的拥趸。

String.Source: Lund
String.Dest: 伦德

String.Source: The boy could stay with you.
String.Dest: 那个男孩可以和你在一起。

String.Source: Hall of the Vigilant
String.Dest: 警戒者之厅

String.Source: Thought I'd say hello before you became Chaurus chow.
String.Dest: 在你变成查鲁斯的美餐之前，我应该先跟你打个招呼。

String.Source: Chomping I can handle. It's the dragon fire that worries me.
String.Dest: 我能克制不打牙战，但龙炎我不一定能抗住啊。

String.Source: Wisp
String.Dest: 幽魂

String.Source: This isn't goodbye. I'll slay that dragon, and we'll go for a drink.
String.Dest: 这不是告别。我会杀了那头龙，之后我们可以去喝一杯。

String.Source: Cracked Tusk Keep
String.Dest: 裂牙要塞

String.Source: That is exactly what I was asking. Do you find me to be an interesting person?
String.Dest: 这就是我刚才在问的。你应该觉得我很有趣吧，嗯哼？

String.Source: Sven
String.Dest: 斯万

String.Source: What was the bad choice your company made? What caused you to split up?
String.Dest: 你的同伴做了什么坏抉择？怎么你们散伙了？

String.Source: Bloodlet Throne
String.Dest: 溅血王座

String.Source: Windhelm
String.Dest: 风盔城

String.Source: Markarth
String.Dest: 马卡斯城

String.Source: Would it be better if the weapon was a pie?
String.Dest: 如果武器是张馅饼的话是不是更好点？

String.Source: It was nothing. Like taking a sweetroll from a guardsman.
String.Dest: 这啥也不是。就像从守卫那儿拿走一个甜甜圈。

String.Source: Moorside Inn
String.Dest: 默赛德客栈

String.Source: Excuse me?
String.Dest: 不好意思。

String.Source: Riftweald Manor
String.Dest: 裂谷旷野庄园

String.Source: Skeever
String.Dest: 雪鼠

String.Source: What do you do for a living?
String.Dest: 你是做什么工作的？

String.Source: Tell me about Riften.
String.Dest: 告诉我关于裂谷城的事。

String.Source: Smuggler
String.Dest: 走私者

String.Source: The Bannered Mare
String.Dest: 母马横幅

String.Source: Penitus Oculatus Outpost
String.Dest: 锐眼鹰前哨

String.Source: A typical Nord then.
String.Dest: 那时的典型诺德人。

String.Source: Fellglow Keep
String.Dest: 菲戈罗要塞

String.Source: Do you need some time alone?
String.Dest: 你需要一些独处的时间嗎？

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: I'm the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 我是龙裔。

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: If we're lucky, maybe he'll leave a few for us.
String.Dest: 如果咱们运气好，也许他会给我们留点东西。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 海里姆，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Still no news on the child?
String.Dest: 还没有关于孩子的消息吗？

String.Source: Yes, we should be careful. It's always better to be wrong than unprepared.
String.Dest: 是的，我们应该小心点。做过多的准备总比毫无准备要好。

String.Source: Child
String.Dest: 孩童

String.Source: Worker's House
String.Dest: 工人的住所

String.Source: Master-Wizard
String.Dest: 大法师

String.Source: Perhaps another time.
String.Dest: 下次再说吧。

String.Source: Soljund's Sinkhole
String.Dest: 索云德的污水坑

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Whiterun
String.Dest: 雪漫城

String.Source: Then good luck, my friend. I'm glad to know the world is safer with you in it.
String.Dest: 那就祝你好运吧，我的朋友。天际有你更美好。

String.Source: Black-Briar Manor
String.Dest: 黑荆棘庄园

String.Source: Falion's House
String.Dest: 法利昂家

String.Source: Drain Health
String.Dest: 吸取生命

String.Source: Never mind.
String.Dest: 算了。

String.Source: Belted Tunic
String.Dest: 束腰便服

String.Source: Angarvunde Catacombs
String.Dest: 安佳翁德地下墓穴

String.Source: Tell me how you got the name "Swamp Knight."
String.Dest: 告诉我你是怎样得到“沼泽骑士”这个绰号的？

String.Source: Orotheim
String.Dest: 奥瑟姆

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) What do you think of the plan to infiltrate the Embassy?
String.Dest: （外交豁免）你计划怎样打入大使馆内部？

String.Source: From Grelka? You can't be serious.
String.Dest: 从格瑞卡那边？你是在开玩笑吧。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 对，我来告诉你。

String.Source: How's business?
String.Dest: 生意如何？

String.Source: What can I do to help?
String.Dest: 我能帮些什么忙？

String.Source: Ahlam
String.Dest: 阿拉姆

String.Source: (Climb the Steps) The Greybeards must really depend on Klimmek.
String.Dest: （爬台阶）灰胡子看来还真是得依靠科林麦来运送东西啊。

String.Source: Mauhulakh's Longhouse
String.Dest: 莫胡拉克的长屋

String.Source: All right. Let's go to Mistwatch.
String.Dest: 好吧。我们一起去迷雾塔楼。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: What is it you want?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: There might be room if we strap you to Odahviing's tail.
String.Dest: 如果我们把你抽到傲达伟英的尾巴上你是不是就有空了？

String.Source: Hagraven
String.Dest: 乌鸦鬼婆

String.Source: Hey. Stop that. I'm a Nord.
String.Dest: 嘿，住手，我是诺德人。

String.Source: You're right. She's a no good thief. But that has its uses.
String.Dest: 你说的对。她不是个好盗贼，但是自有其用途。

String.Source: Generic dialogue
String.Dest: Generic dialogue

String.Source: Folgunthur
String.Dest: 佛古恩瑟

String.Source: The White Phial
String.Dest: 雪瓶

String.Source: I wanted to meet the one who braves the marsh.
String.Dest: 我想认识那位有勇气挑战沼泽的人。

String.Source: They shouldn't feel guilty. Falion is up to something. I know it.
String.Dest: 他们不该有负罪感。法利昂和这有关。我知道。

String.Source: Apprentice
String.Dest: 学徒

String.Source: The Treasury House
String.Dest: 藏宝室

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: I'm sorry about your friends.
String.Dest: 关于你的朋友我很抱歉。

String.Source: The boy probably wanted a mother. And not a score of fathers to share her with.
String.Dest: 这个男孩想要一个母亲。而不是和她共有二十几个父亲。

String.Source: I'm just glad Bodan isn't around to hear this awful bard lay waste to his work.
String.Dest: 我只是高兴波登不在附近，听不到这个可恶的吟游诗人破坏他的工作。

String.Source: Brunwulf Free-Winter's House
String.Dest: 布伦武夫·自由冬天家

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Maybe another time.
String.Dest: 也许下次吧。

String.Source: That's commendable. True honor is doing the right thing, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 这是值得赞扬的。真正的荣耀是做正确的事儿，哪怕很难。

String.Source: It was a privilege to fight by your side.
String.Dest: 能与你并肩作战真是三生有幸。

String.Source: Smart. Best to be prepared for whatever comes.
String.Dest: 聪明。常备不懈，防患未然嘛。

String.Source: Absorb <mag> points of health per second from the target.
String.Dest: 从目标每秒持续吸取<mag>点生命。

String.Source: High Gate Ruins
String.Dest: 高门遗迹

String.Source: No thanks.
String.Dest: 不用，谢谢。

String.Source: Understone Keep
String.Dest: 石下要塞

String.Source: Riften
String.Dest: 裂谷城

String.Source: Where will you go now?
String.Dest: 你现在要去哪里？

String.Source: Boethiah's Shadow
String.Dest: 波耶西亚的阴影

String.Source: Ogmund's House
String.Dest: 欧格蒙的房子

String.Source: What about battle did he love?
String.Dest: 他热爱的战斗如何？

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: I guess Gren is as much a High King as Ulfric.
String.Dest: 我想格伦跟乌佛瑞克一样都有资格做至高王。

String.Source: So how did you two part ways?
String.Dest: 然后你们俩是怎么分开的？

String.Source: The Midden
String.Dest: 贝丘

String.Source: Belethor's General Goods
String.Dest: 贝莱托尔杂货铺

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) That's another dragon on our kill list.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的刀刃）这是我们的死亡名单上的另一个龙。

String.Source: What do you mean by that?
String.Dest: 你指的是什么意思？

String.Source: It was a beautiful song.
String.Dest: 这真是一首优美的歌曲。

String.Source: We should take him to Honorhall Orphanage.
String.Dest: 我们应该带他去荣耀厅孤儿院。

String.Source: Steepfall Burrow
String.Dest: 坠崖洞穴

String.Source: New Gnisis Cornerclub
String.Dest: 新格尼西斯街角吧

String.Source: I know this urchin means a lot to you. But the boy's too dangerous.
String.Dest: 我知道这顽童对你来说狠重要，但是这个男孩太危险了。

String.Source: You should try it. I think shouting is something you would be good at.
String.Dest: 你应该试试。我想你应该很擅长吼叫。

String.Source: Bandit
String.Dest: 强盗

String.Source: I am poorly educated and unfamiliar with Black Marsh. Please enlighten me.
String.Dest: 我受过的教育很少，并且也完全不熟悉黑沼泽省。请教教我吧。

String.Source: Don't Argonians travel inside giant worms?
String.Dest: 难道亚龙人不是在那些巨大的虫子中旅行的种族吗？

String.Source: Anonymous Letter
String.Dest: 匿名信

String.Source: Eldergleam Sanctuary
String.Dest: 古老闪光圣所

String.Source: Well, Falion does do strange experiments at night.
String.Dest: 嗯……法利昂在晚上总做些奇怪的实验。

String.Source: Angarvunde
String.Dest: 安佳翁德

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <mag> points fire damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.
String.Dest: 近身的敌人每秒受到<mag>点火焰伤害，持续<dur>秒。着火目标将承受额外伤害。

String.Source: Why did you wake the blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你为什么要叫醒铁匠？

String.Source: Well, good luck with that.
String.Dest: 嗯，那也只能祝你好运了。

String.Source: Maybe some other time.
String.Dest: 也许改天吧。

String.Source: Redguard
String.Dest: 红卫人

String.Source: You live here?
String.Dest: 你住在这里？

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: I think I've earned that 100 gold.
String.Dest: 我想你该付我那100金币了。

String.Source: Graywinter Watch
String.Dest: 灰冬望台

String.Source: I believe I she can be reformed. There's good inside of her.
String.Dest: 我相信我可以改变她，她心中还有部分是良善的。

String.Source: Lost Valkygg
String.Dest: 失落的瓦尔奇格

String.Source: Bards College
String.Dest: 诗人学院

String.Source: Nchuand-Zel Quarters
String.Dest: 楚安德·泽尔居住区

String.Source: I'm sorry.
String.Dest: 抱歉。

String.Source: Solitude Lighthouse
String.Dest: 独孤城灯塔

String.Source: Summons a Dremora Lord for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: 召唤卡斯塔格为你战斗<dur>秒。

String.Source: Geirmund's Hall
String.Dest: 格尔蒙德大厅

String.Source: Dremora Lord
String.Dest: 魔人王士

String.Source: The world isn't dangerous enough for me. It could do with more danger.
String.Dest: 我不觉得这世界对我来说有什么危险。再危险也不怕。

String.Source: One-handed weapons do <mag>% more damage for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: 单手武器在<dur>秒内增加<mag>%伤害。

String.Source: I agree. I am honored to include myself among them.
String.Dest: 我同意。成为他们中的一员这点让我很自豪。

String.Source: It's just more of Bodan's lies.
String.Dest: 这只不过是波登的又一个谎言罢了。

String.Source: Business Ledger
String.Dest: 营业帐本

String.Source: Rogue Wizard
String.Dest: 流浪法师

String.Source: Beggar
String.Dest: 乞丐

String.Source: People fear what they don't understand. Which is why I fear mammoth cheese.
String.Dest: 人们会对他们不了解的东西抱有恐惧。正因为如此，我害怕长毛象乳酪。

String.Source: Morndas
String.Dest: 周一

String.Source: Temple of Kynareth
String.Dest: 吉娜莱丝神殿

String.Source: Reachwind Eyrie
String.Dest: 瑞驰文德

String.Source: How long have you lived in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你在风盔城生活多久了？

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Ustengrav
String.Dest: 乌斯滕格拉

String.Source: Frostfruit Inn
String.Dest: 冰水果客栈

String.Source: Arm Bandages
String.Dest: 绑手带

String.Source: I've sniffed many deathbells but it has no effect on my decisions.
String.Dest: 我闻过很多的死亡丧钟，而这种玩意对我的决定毫无作用。

String.Source: A thief's honor is as good as a knight's.
String.Dest: 一个盗贼的荣耀和骑士的是一回事。

String.Source: Castle Dour Dungeon
String.Dest: 杜尔城堡监狱

String.Source: How did you end up here?
String.Dest: 你为什么会在这里？

String.Source: Halldir's Cairn
String.Dest: 霍迪尔石冢

String.Source: Any word on the child?
String.Dest: 关于孩子有什么要说的吗？

String.Source: HumanBeard22
String.Dest: HumanBeard22

String.Source: Hawk Beak
String.Dest: 鹰的喙

String.Source: Delphine
String.Dest: 戴尔芬

String.Source: Bleak Falls Temple
String.Dest: 寒落神庙

String.Source: Forgive my impertinence. I would simply like to know your name.
String.Dest: 请原谅我的急躁。我只想知道你的名字而已。

String.Source: I don't really plan myself. It's more fun living dangerously.
String.Dest: 我从不做什么计划。还是过着有悬念的日子比较开心。

String.Source: Fort Sungard Tower
String.Dest: 阳光花园堡垒塔楼

String.Source: The Frozen Hearth
String.Dest: 冰封熔炉

String.Source: Thalmor Embassy, Elenwen's Solar
String.Dest: 梭默大使馆阿兰雯房间

String.Source: Unowned Cell
String.Dest: 无主牢房

String.Source: Temple of Mara
String.Dest: 神殿

String.Source: He isn't dead yet. Where would they go?
String.Dest: 他还没死。他们要去哪？

String.Source: Cronvangr Cave
String.Dest: 克隆万格洞穴

String.Source: We should kill them both. It's the only way to ensure our safety.
String.Dest: 我们应该把他俩都杀了。这样才能保证我们的安全。

String.Source: Sunderstone Gorge
String.Dest: 萨恩德石峡谷

String.Source: What are your plans going forward?
String.Dest: 你接下来的计划是什么？

String.Source: Vilemyr Inn
String.Dest: 维尔米尔旅馆

String.Source: Sometimes, there isn't a right or wrong. It's just the way its.
String.Dest: 很多时候是没什么具体的对或者错。事情就应该是那样。

String.Source: I've got some business to attend to. I'll meet you outside Mourner's Den.
String.Dest: 我有些事情要处理。我会在送葬者的藏身处外和你见面。

String.Source: Brittleshin Pass
String.Dest: 布莱特辛山隘

String.Source: There's obviously more to it than just being Argonian.
String.Dest: 很明显，不只是成为亚龙人而已。

String.Source: Noblewoman
String.Dest: 贵族妇女

String.Source: Oh right. The swamp makes for tough terrain.
String.Dest: 噢对。沼泽地崎岖不平。

String.Source: Is the boy getting along with the other orphans?
String.Dest: 这个男孩和其他的孤儿相处的好吗？

String.Source: I could come with you.
String.Dest: 我可以跟你一起来。

String.Source: Why didn't your people just make carriages like the Nords?
String.Dest: 为什么你们的人把马车做的像是诺德风格？

String.Source: Bard
String.Dest: 吟游诗人

String.Source: This can't be a coincidence. The person we're looking for has to be there.
String.Dest: 这不可能是个巧合。我们找的人一定在这。

String.Source: I'm here to rescue you.
String.Dest: 我来这里营救你。

String.Source: Coffin
String.Dest: 棺材

String.Source: You can start by saying yes.
String.Dest: 你可以从说“是”开始。

String.Source: Thalmor Headquarters
String.Dest: 梭默总部

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Nobleman
String.Dest: 贵族人

String.Source: Nightgate Inn Cellar
String.Dest: 夜门客栈地下室

String.Source: Silent Moons Camp
String.Dest: 静月营地

String.Source: I think this note is for you.
String.Dest: 我想这个便条是给你的。

String.Source: DualFlurry
String.Dest: DualFlurry

String.Source: Hjerim
String.Dest: 海里姆

String.Source: I'd feel better if I had some ale by my side, but I guess you'll do.
String.Dest: 随身带点麦芽酒确实不错，不过我估计你会带的。

String.Source: Embry
String.Dest: 安伯瑞

String.Source: Pirate
String.Dest: 海盗

String.Source: Quick Test Cell
String.Dest: Quick Test Cell

String.Source: This just gets stranger and stranger.
String.Dest: 这真是越来越奇怪了。

String.Source: Arch-Mage
String.Dest: 首席大法师

String.Source: Horker
String.Dest: 三牙海象

String.Source: Skyrim
String.Dest: 天际

String.Source: I find white lies and drunken confessions to be in the spirit of honor.
String.Dest: 我认为善意的谎言与酒后的忏悔是同样值得荣耀的。

String.Source: Was Dalum-Ei saving her for last?
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾把她留到了最后吗？

String.Source: Belyn Hlaalu's House
String.Dest: 贝林·哈拉鲁家

String.Source: Your fight is my fight. We do this together.
String.Dest: 你的战斗就是我的战斗。我们一起来。

String.Source: Jenassa
String.Dest: 简拉萨

String.Source: What brings you to this party?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来的？

String.Source: Labyrinthian Thoroughfare
String.Dest: 拉布林西安遗迹大道

String.Source: Guard
String.Dest: 卫兵

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园。

String.Source: The Mortar and Pestle
String.Dest: 研钵和杵

String.Source: Morndas is perfect the way she is.
String.Dest: 这样的摩恩达丝是那样的完美。

String.Source: Don't worry. This torturer can't hide forever.
String.Dest: 不用急。这个施暴者藏不了多久。

String.Source: Bran
String.Dest: 布兰德

String.Source: Sanuarach Mine
String.Dest: 萨努阿拉奇矿场

String.Source: Let me guess. Now you want to search for the boy.
String.Dest: 让我猜猜看，现在你想做的是去找那个男孩。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Sounds like the Blood of Skyrim alright.
String.Dest: 这听起来像是天际血宴，对吧？

String.Source: Nightgate Inn
String.Dest: 夜门客栈

String.Source: Alchemist
String.Dest: 炼金师

String.Source: Nazeem
String.Dest: 纳奇姆

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Imperial
String.Dest: 帝国人

String.Source: Are you going stay here or return to Black Marsh?
String.Dest: 你是打算留在这儿呢还是回到黑沼泽省?

String.Source: You aren't worried about this assassin?
String.Dest: 你不担心这个刺客吗？

String.Source: Dibella Statue
String.Dest: 迪贝拉雕像

String.Source: The Arcanaeum
String.Dest: 奥术厅

String.Source: In any case, this is how it ends. Your company has its peace.
String.Dest: 无论如何，就这样结束了。你们也得以安宁了。

String.Source: Gloomreach Hive
String.Dest: 阴郁河段蜂房

String.Source: I have no shortage of enemies. Still, bandits don't usually write me letters.
String.Dest: 我从来不缺敌人。然而，强盗们通常不会给我写信。

String.Source: Luaffyn
String.Dest: 路阿芬

String.Source: Labyrinthian Chasm
String.Dest: 拉布林西安裂口

String.Source: The Winking Skeever
String.Dest: 眨眼雪鼠

String.Source: Temple of the Divines
String.Dest: 圣灵神殿

String.Source: Are you in charge here?
String.Dest: 你是这里的负责人吗？

String.Source: Steam breath
String.Dest: 蒸汽之息

String.Source: What do you mean, saved? They died.
String.Dest: 你是什么意思，被拯救了？他们明明是死了！

String.Source: Falmer Servant
String.Dest: 雪精灵仆人

String.Source: Falmer Shaman
String.Dest: 雪精灵萨满

String.Source: We should bring some wine and other party items.
String.Dest: 我们该带点酒和什么聚会玩的东东来才对。

String.Source: Orphan's Tear
String.Dest: 孤儿之泪

String.Source: Are you enjoying the party?
String.Dest: 你喜欢这个宴会吗？

String.Source: I've seen their teeth. I've smelled their breath. I wasn't impressed.
String.Dest: 我见过他们的牙，闻到过他们的呼吸，我不觉得有什么好。

String.Source: Farmer
String.Dest: 农夫

String.Source: Silus Vesuius's House
String.Dest: 希鲁斯·威苏尤斯家

String.Source: Dwarven Centurion
String.Dest: 矮人百夫长

String.Source: Thank you, my friend. I won't let you down.
String.Dest: 多谢，我的朋友。我不会让你失望的。

String.Source: You're bold. I'd like to know your name so I can carve it on your headstone.
String.Dest: 你很勇敢。我想问问你的名字，到时候好刻在你的墓碑上。

String.Source: You miss your old company, don't you?
String.Dest: 你挺怀念你以前同伴的，不是么？

String.Source: Fort Sungard Oubliette
String.Dest: 阳光花园堡垒地牢

String.Source: Fire/Frost/Shock Mage
String.Dest: 火焰/寒霜/电击法师

String.Source: Where are you headed? Perhaps I can be of some help.
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？也许我能帮把手。

String.Source: Reflect Blows
String.Dest: 反弹攻击

String.Source: What are you in for?
String.Dest: 你是怎么进来的？

String.Source: So, ready to get moving? We ought to test out that new armor of yours.
String.Dest: 那，准备好行动了吗？咱得好好测试一下你的新装甲。

String.Source: Bruca's Leap Redoubt
String.Dest: 布兰卡跳跃据点

String.Source: Whistling Mine
String.Dest: 笛声矿场

String.Source: Uttering Hills Cave
String.Dest: 发声山丘洞穴

String.Source: Dwarven Spider
String.Dest: 矮人蜘蛛

String.Source: Leather Boots
String.Dest: 革制靴

String.Source: This person seems trustworthy enough. If not, we can just kill him.
String.Dest: 这个人看起来可以相信了。要是还不可靠，杀了他就是。

String.Source: I don't have time for this.
String.Dest: 我没时间玩游戏。

String.Source: Dragonsreach
String.Dest: 龙宵宫

String.Source: The Giant is guarding a treasure. We'll split it four ways.
String.Dest: 那个巨人在守着宝藏。我们分四路行动。

String.Source: Some say all dragons are monsters, but I'm not so sure.
String.Dest: 一些人说所有的龙都是恶魔……我可不这么确定。

String.Source: Thonnir's House
String.Dest: 东尼尔家

String.Source: All that matters is that the future King is safe.
String.Dest: 最重要的是未来的国王仍然安全。

String.Source: Abandoned Prison
String.Dest: 废弃监狱

String.Source: Nightshade
String.Dest: 龙葵

String.Source: Gloves
String.Dest: 手套

String.Source: Warehouse
String.Dest: 仓库

String.Source: Dark Brotherhood Assassin
String.Dest: 黑暗兄弟会刺客

String.Source: Four Shields Tavern
String.Dest: 四面盾牌客栈

String.Source: Larak's Longhouse
String.Dest: 拉拉克长屋

String.Source: Abandoned House
String.Dest: 废弃房屋

String.Source: (Honor's Calling) The Honorable Eight. It must have been more than a name.
String.Dest: (荣耀的召唤) 八圣灵之荣。不仅仅是个名字。

String.Source: Elrindir
String.Dest: 艾伦迪

String.Source: Hall of Valor
String.Dest: 勇气大厅

String.Source: What was the company's makeup?
String.Dest: 这战友团都是些什么人？

String.Source: He did what he thought was right. Even when it was so wrong.
String.Dest: 他做了自己认为是正确的事。即使那其实是错的。

String.Source: Saarthal
String.Dest: 萨瑟尔城

String.Source: Is there anything I can do to help?
String.Dest: 我可以帮上什么忙吗？

String.Source: War Quarters
String.Dest: 战区

String.Source: Let's pray he gets twice the sellswords we did. You can never have enough.
String.Dest: 让我们祈祷他有比我们多两倍的佣兵吧。反正来多少对你都无关紧要。

String.Source: You're a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你是风暴斗篷的一员？

String.Source: Fort Snowhawk
String.Dest: 雪鹰堡垒

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Falion's still is a danger. Not because he's a bad man, but with mages...
String.Dest: 法利昂终归是个大麻烦……不怕坏人，但是一个会魔法的坏人就……

String.Source: White River Watch
String.Dest: 白河监视营

String.Source: That's up to Larsdon. After this, we'll be lucky if he isn't the new Pelagius.
String.Dest: 那就看劳斯登的意思了。不管咋说，他如果不是新的佩拉吉奥斯那我们真是撞大运了。

String.Source: Broken Helm Hollow
String.Dest: 裂盔山谷

String.Source: Iron Arrow
String.Dest: 铁箭

String.Source: Braidwood Inn
String.Dest: 森林织带旅馆

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 发生什么事了？

String.Source: What was that argument about?
String.Dest: 那场争辩是为了什么？

String.Source: It would just go to waste on these idiots.
String.Dest: 反正都要浪费在这些蠢货们身上了。

String.Source: I had a different plan. Poisoning their food.
String.Dest: 我还有个主意：在他们食物里下毒。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟着我。

String.Source: Actually, most of the Companions are either hunters or sellswords.
String.Dest: 事实上所谓的战友团里除了猎人就是佣兵.

String.Source: Is there any way I can help?
String.Dest: 我能帮上什么忙吗？

String.Source: Bleakcoast Cave
String.Dest: 阴冷海岸洞穴

String.Source: Sadri's Used Wares
String.Dest: 萨德利旧货店

String.Source: Lost Knife Cave
String.Dest: 失落小刀洞穴

String.Source: Not right now.
String.Dest: 等会儿。

String.Source: I've never seen you flinch. You can fight by my side any day.
String.Dest: 你还真是天不怕地不怕，愿意跟我混的话随时欢迎！

String.Source: Bear
String.Dest: 熊

String.Source: Ustengrav Depths
String.Dest: 乌斯滕格拉深渊

String.Source: Lod's House
String.Dest: 罗德家

String.Source: Are you saying you get nervous? Your mouth is jovial enough.
String.Dest: 你是说你会紧张吗？你的嘴倒是说的挺顺溜的。

String.Source: Kilkreath Catacombs
String.Dest: 基尔克瑞斯墓穴

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 为什么呢？

String.Source: What's the problem?
String.Dest: 出了什么问题？

String.Source: I've got better things to do.
String.Dest: 我有更重要的事情要做。

String.Source: Bloated Man's Grotto
String.Dest: 臃肿男的小洞穴

String.Source: The Bee and Barb
String.Dest: 蜂蜜与诗人

String.Source: What happened to him?
String.Dest: 发生了什么事？

String.Source: That's none of your business.
String.Dest: 这不关你的事。

String.Source: Snow-Shod Farm
String.Dest: 雪蹄农场

String.Source: Labyrinthian, Tribune
String.Dest: 拉布林西安讲坛

String.Source: Dawnstar.
String.Dest: 晨星。

String.Source: It will be my honor.
String.Dest: 这将是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Strange that no one questioned your involvement.
String.Dest: 你这件事居然没人过问，真是奇怪。

String.Source: The Chill
String.Dest: 寒冷

String.Source: I don't have time for that.
String.Dest: 我没那个闲时间。

String.Source: Thalmor Justiciar
String.Dest: 梭默审判者

String.Source: Leave It
String.Dest: 保留

String.Source: <Alias=Animal> is waiting for you
String.Dest: <Alias=Animal>在等你

String.Source: This Elia and I share similar interests.
String.Dest: 这位艾拉真是跟我臭味相投。

String.Source: They have every right. The farmers are obligated to help military garrisons.
String.Dest: 他们拥有充分的权利。农民有义务帮助驻军。

String.Source: Make sure to stop by the alchemist's shop as well.
String.Dest: 别忘了顺路去一趟炼金药材铺。

String.Source: Breezehome
String.Dest: 风宅

String.Source: What will you do now?
String.Dest: 你现在有什么打算？

String.Source: Sounds like a plan. Although I don't know if they'll drink any of it.
String.Dest: 听上去是不错。不过我觉得他们一滴也不会喝。

String.Source: You look shiny. But strong.
String.Dest: 你看上去闪闪发光，并且很强壮。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得去别的什么地方。

String.Source: Grelka's dead. You won't be buying anything from her.
String.Dest: 格瑞卡死掉了，你再也没法买她的东西了。

String.Source: Kilkreath Temple
String.Dest: 基尔克瑞斯神庙

String.Source: Embershard Mine
String.Dest: 煤块矿场

String.Source: Don't worry. No matter what you decide, I'll have your back.
String.Dest: 别担心，不管你作出什么决定，我都坚定支持！

String.Source: What was that all about?
String.Dest: 那是怎么回事？

String.Source: Barrel
String.Dest: 木桶

String.Source: <Cool graphic>
String.Dest: <Cool graphic>

String.Source: You don't have the required item.
String.Dest: 你没有必要的物品

String.Source: I present the two of you with these matching rings, blessed by Mara's divine grace. May they protect each of you in your new life together.
String.Dest: 我赠给你们这对带有玛拉神圣赐福的对戒，愿它们在你们的新生活中保佑你们。

String.Source: What are you looking at?
String.Dest: 你在看什么？

String.Source: Remember child, he said, it matters not the size of their blades, or the size of their numbers. Only the size of your heart.
String.Dest: 记着孩子, 他说, 他们的武器和人数并不重要。你自己的意志才是关键。

String.Source: Only they all dress the same, and they've been forcing the farms to ration them supplies by order of the "High King."
String.Dest: 只有他们衣着一样,他们被押到农场以 "至高王"的命令进行配给。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei? No, I...I refuse to believe it! Let me see that note.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾? 不, 我...我不相信! 让我看看那纸条.

String.Source: I'll shoulder some of your burden.
String.Dest: 我会帮你减轻些负重的。

String.Source: Great accomplishments always are. That was the first thing I learned when I joined the Honorable Eight.
String.Dest: 保持修养. 这是我加入荣光八人众学到的第一件事.

String.Source: By the Hist, you're an annoying one!
String.Dest: 希斯特在上, 你这个讨厌鬼!

String.Source: Disappointing.
String.Dest: 真令人失望。

String.Source: Damn you!
String.Dest: 去你妈的！

String.Source: You mean the day, or a certain Redguard thief you keep in your company?
String.Dest: 你的意思是这天某个红卫人的小偷还隐藏在你的同伴中间？

String.Source: These Draugr have such horrible manners! You set out a bunch of plates and bowls, and they prefer to eat off the table!
String.Dest: 这些尸鬼真无礼! 你丢给他们盘子和碗，他们却选择啃桌子!

String.Source: Good to see no one's killed Lurbuk. Yet.
String.Dest: 还没人干掉卢布克。不错。

String.Source: Are you joking?
String.Dest: 你开玩笑吧？

String.Source: I'd stay clear of this dog. I've seen that look before. He'll follow you to Black Marsh if you let him.
String.Dest: 我不想与这条狗扯上任何关系，我以前见过他这样的，只要你允许，这小家伙就会一直跟着你，哪怕到黑降都会跟着你。

String.Source: What's the point of having an army at the front gate, if you can slip in from the side?
String.Dest: 如果你能另一个方向溜走，就算有一支军队守在前门又能怎么样？

String.Source: If what that note says is true, then Bodan may get some exercise yet.
String.Dest: 如果笔记上说的是真的，那么波登可能已经接受过一些训练了。

String.Source: Ah, but greedy men insist they are "being practical," when it's an excuse to pander to one's vices. Nevertheless, greed wasn't our problem.
String.Dest: 啊，但当贪婪的人为他们的恶习找借口的时候，他们总说自己只是“更现实一些”。尽管如此，贪婪不是我们的问题。

String.Source: You alright, traveler? (Laughs) You look like you need a nap! Was it killing the dragon that got you tired, or eating its soul?
String.Dest: 你还行吗，旅行者？（笑）你看起来该睡一觉了！是杀那条龙把你累着了，还是因为你吃了它的魂？

String.Source: Still, I appreciate the concern, traveler. At times like this, I'm reminded what it is I value most, and why I have to see this through.
String.Dest: 总之，我感谢你的关心，旅行者！每当这种时候，我就想起我最珍惜的应该是什么，还有我为什么要看透这些。

String.Source: Silver ingots? Rubies? And he wants to turn that into incense? I don't know, traveler, are you sure those aren't code words for skooma?
String.Dest: 银锭？红宝石？他说要把这些化为一缕香气？我不明白，旅行者，你确定那些不是指代斯库玛的暗号吗？

String.Source: The north is a fine place to die. Wind on your scales, snow under your feet. Your past swept away in a patina of frost.
String.Dest: 死在北方是一个不错的选择。风吹过你的鳞片，雪堆在你脚下。你的过去在一片冰霜的光泽中被抹去。

String.Source: Traveler, I've fought leviathans, and I've fought hackwings, but a dragon? By the Hist! This might be the ale talking, but I can't wait.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我上山打过鸟，下海捉过妖，可是要说龙？老天呐，就算喝多了说胡话吧，我真是等不及试试看啦！

String.Source: I don't know, healer. It seems like he only got away because we let him.
String.Dest: 我不知道啊，治疗师，看起来他逃走的唯一原因就是我们放的。

String.Source: Warlocks. I pray they attack us first.
String.Dest: 是术士！但愿他们会先对我们出手。

String.Source: Maybe today she's picking a lock in a Nord ruin. Maybe tomorrow, it's somebody's home.
String.Dest: 她今天撬开的只是诺德废墟里的锁，但说不定明天她撬开的就是某户住家的大门了。

String.Source: Or maybe I can! Who knows if these dragons even have stomachs? That's what so exciting. We have no idea what we're dealing with!
String.Dest: 或者我可以！谁知道这些龙有没有胃？这真是太刺激了，我们根本不知道接下来要面对的是什么！

String.Source: Stick and move! Stick and move!
String.Dest: 坚持住，动起来 ！坚持住，动起来 ！

String.Source: What do you want, stranger? I have a date with the marsh, and the chaurus that call it home.
String.Dest: 陌生人，你想要什么？我还得去与查鲁斯称之为家的那个沼泽约会呢。

String.Source: So a couple of gutter rubes were going to overthrow the Thieves Guild? (Laughs) Maybe you should've joined them instead.
String.Dest: 那么说来一对肮脏下贱的乡巴佬想颠覆盗贼公会？（大笑）或许你应该转而加入他们。

String.Source: And the politeness continues! Perhaps I am speaking with a noble! My apologies, my lord!
String.Dest: 并且这种粗鲁的行为还是会继续的！也许我是在跟贵族说话！真是抱歉啊大人！

String.Source: Widow's Watch is a very sad name. I wonder how many husbands and wives watched the sea, waiting for soldiers who would never come home.
String.Dest: 望夫塔，多么令人忧伤的地方。有多少人总是注视着那海平面，守望着那些上了战场却不会再归来的另一半。

String.Source: I'll rip you in half!
String.Dest: 我会把你撕成两半。

String.Source: How about a shave, werewolf!
String.Dest: 狼人，来剃剃毛怎样阿！

String.Source: I knew a bard once. He was a lot like you. When he sang, every note made you feel his pain.
String.Dest: 我曾经见过一个吟游诗人。他和你很像。当他开唱时，你会觉得杀猪也不过如此。

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我会连你的鳞片一刀切掉的，怪物！

String.Source: Can I help you?
String.Dest: 我能为你效劳吗？

String.Source: Even a good bottle of ale will leave you in the end. A good friend never will.
String.Dest: 即使是一瓶再好的啤酒最终也会离你而去，但一个好朋友永远不会。

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: 你这蝼蚁之辈！

String.Source: Probably not, but they'll appreciate the sentiment. It's like giving a piece of advice, without having to say the words.
String.Dest: 多半不会，但是他们会感到感激的。这就像”一切尽在不言中“那种感觉。

String.Source: To the Dragonborn!
String.Dest: 为了龙裔！

String.Source: I like the way this Redguard thinks. Charge ahead, take 'em down, and sort out the pieces.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个红卫人的作风。冲上去，干掉他，收拾好。

String.Source: Because when it comes down to it, it's the scribes and the singers who have the final say.
String.Dest: 因为每当尘埃落定时，都是由作家和歌手来总结陈词。

String.Source: I'm sure if this treasure was guarded by a pile of firewood, those muscles would come in real handy.
String.Dest: 我很肯定如果这些财宝是被一堆傻瓜所看守的，这些雇佣兵很快就从附近跳出来。

String.Source: Any questions?
String.Dest: 还有问题吗？

String.Source: By the Hist...What about the others? Dalum-Ei? Indrel?
String.Dest: 希斯特神啊……其他人呢？达卢姆艾? 英卓尔?

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't know Nords had fur!
String.Dest: (笑声) 我真不知道诺德人还有绒毛！

String.Source: And I am honored to meet one so thick as to think this pond is a marsh.
String.Dest: 以及，居然让我遇见一个会认为这个池塘是个沼泽的蠢货，我还真是荣幸。

String.Source: Draugr. At least these mummies have flesh. Nothing feels more awkward than trying to cut bone.
String.Dest: 尸鬼。至少这帮干尸身上还算有点肉。没有什么比直接往骨头上砍所带来的手感更糟的东西了。

String.Source: Looks like Thonnir's practicing to become a bard. Why doesn't he play at the inn? (Laughs) Afraid that Orc will upstage him?
String.Dest: 看起来东尼尔是在为成为一个吟游诗人而努力，那他为什么不在旅馆里演奏？（大笑）难不成是怕兽人抢了他的风头？

String.Source: So I grabbed my sword and demanded Ula-Wei tell me which direction they were coming from. He turned to Dalum-Ei, and our leader nodded.
String.Dest: 于是我抓住我的剑柄要乌拉卫告诉我他们从哪个方向来。他扭头询问达卢姆艾的意见，我们的头领点了点头。

String.Source: Send that milk-drinker back to the farm!
String.Dest: 把那乳臭未干的小子带回农场！

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, He's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 这就是龙裔，他是每个人的榜样。

String.Source: I saw how the serpent camouflaged itself in the foliage. How the leviathan waded effortlessly through the swamp, simply by refusing all effort.
String.Dest: 我看到了毒蛇如何将自己隐藏在叶子中，庞大的怪兽如何毫不费力地穿过沼泽地而没有借助任何外部的力量。

String.Source: (Laughs) I suppose I could, thief, but then there'd be no reason to fight!
String.Dest: (笑声)我想我可以，盗贼，但是我没有理由去战斗啊！

String.Source: Don't be so sure. It's not like the old days. Maybe this time it was me doing the saving! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 话别说得太满。它不是像以前那样。也许这次我能做出一次拯救的行为！ (笑声)

String.Source: We better kill these Forsworn quickly. I don't think the miners can stand being around their wives!
String.Dest: 我们最好快点把那些弃誓者干掉。因为恐怕矿工们在和妻子们一起的地方熬不了太久啊。

String.Source: Gyaaargh!
String.Dest: 呀啊啊啊啊！

String.Source: You would've made an excellent addition to our company. Although "Honorable Nine" doesn't quite have the same ring to it. If only we were nefarious!
String.Dest: 你为我们团队又添了辉煌的一笔。尽管神圣九人并没有相似的荣耀……我们要是大坏蛋该多好啊！

String.Source: All right, love. I'll go get my things.
String.Dest: 好的亲爱的，我去收拾下东西。

String.Source: Dragon Bridge. Suicide central. You could build a bridge to Sovngarde from all the bones lying in the Karth, but I suppose it's easier to jump.
String.Dest: 龙桥。自杀的圣地。你可以用所有埋于卡尔斯里的骨头建一座通往松加德的桥,但我想还是直接跳下去比较容易。

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵法师啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: Fralia Gray-Mane is convinced that the Battle-Borns have abducted one of her sons.
String.Dest: 法利亚·灰鬃认为战狂家族的人绑架了她的儿子。

String.Source: So nice of these bandits to set up camp for us. Even nicer of them to attack. Now we don't have to share!
String.Dest: 这些强盗真好啊，给咱们支好了营地。更好的是他们还打我们。所以现在就不用合住一起啦。

String.Source: The Nord, Arnwulf though, he got tired of all the standing around. Black robes and ominous words. Good enough for him.
String.Dest: 诺德人阿恩武夫虽然已经厌倦了一切的无所事事。但黑色的长袍和不详的话语，这些对他来说已经足够好了。

String.Source: That's an old story. Back when the Hrothgar monks had milk in their beards from sucking their mother's teats! Okay, maybe not that old, but old.
String.Dest: 这是一个古老的故事。这得回溯到高吼峰的修道士从他们母亲的乳头吸得满胡子奶的时候！好吧，也许年代没那么久远，但这个故事依然是很古老的。

String.Source: We've stopped. What is it?
String.Dest: 我们停下来了。怎么回事？

String.Source: Worry about yourself.
String.Dest: 担心你自己吧。

String.Source: That's right. What are you hiding? What's this nonsense about an Oblivion Gate?
String.Dest: 这是正确的。你在隐瞒什么？关于湮灭之门的废话？

String.Source: Be careful!
String.Dest: 小心！

String.Source: It started with Ula-Wei. At the time, I was disheartened, yet I was far from surprised.
String.Dest: 一切从乌拉卫开始. 那个时候我总是灰心丧气，对什么事情都很冷漠。

String.Source: Lead, brave one, and I will follow.
String.Dest: 领路吧，勇敢者，我将紧随其后。

String.Source: You're a clever one! Saw right through my glib response. Alright, I'll tell you, but it's a long story, so you might want to sit down for this one.
String.Dest: 挺聪明的嘛！竟然看懂了我的暗示。好吧，我会告訴你，但這是個很长的故事，你得坐下來仔細听听。

String.Source: You know what's at stake, what you have to lose, and that if you stand together as one, there's no way you possibly can.
String.Dest: 事有轻重缓急，你必须做出取捨。如果你打算两者兼得，那是不可能的。

String.Source: None escape the Vigil. All come into the light.
String.Dest: 无人能逃避守夜人的审判。一切将昭示于光明之下。

String.Source: Sabjorn's having a mead tasting? (Laughs) And here I thought the one thing I liked about the Nords is that they weren't stuck up wine sippers!
String.Dest: 撒布乔恩要去品尝蜜酒？(笑声) 我想我喜欢诺德人的一点是他们在喝酒时不会高傲自大。

String.Source: May you walk on warm sands.
String.Dest: 祝你一路顺风。

String.Source: I'll carve you into pieces!
String.Dest: 我要将你撕成碎片！

String.Source: You're welcome.
String.Dest: 欢迎。

String.Source: So this woman tends the shop all day while that lout drinks away her profits. They say you can't choose family, but you can sure as hell beat them.
String.Dest: 结果这个女人一边苦心经营她的小店一边被那混蛋把她的利润喝个精光。虽然说你不能选择你的家人，可你肯定可以狠狠地揍他们！

String.Source: I don't know who struck first. It didn't matter. We killed them all. Well, all except one.
String.Dest: 我不知道是谁先动手的。但这不重要。我们把他们全都杀光了，呃，还留了一个活口。

String.Source: So nice of Ancano to leave us a present. And here I thought I'd only get to kill one Thalmor today.
String.Dest: 安卡诺留给我们的礼物真是棒极了。我今天已经迫不及待的想去杀个梭默了。

String.Source: Alright. I'll find out what I can.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会尽我所能。

String.Source: Maybe that's the problem.
String.Dest: 也许这就是问题所在。

String.Source: And it's not like you'll need my help. You didn't come this far by riding my tail.
String.Dest: 他跟你找我帮的忙不一样。你还没有走到骑上我的尾巴这一步。

String.Source: So Kodlak's in a better place, and you get to keep his bed! (Laughs) But traveler, I can't think of a person more deserving.
String.Dest: 所以克拉科去了一个更好的地方，而你仍卧在他的床上！ (笑声) 但是旅行者,我想不出比你更有资格享受这一切的人了。

String.Source: I heard those mages up in Winterhold have been trying to figure out how many dragons there are in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我听说冬堡的法师们想要统计天际究竟有多少头龙。

String.Source: And what did your little group decide?
String.Dest: 那么你的小队做出决定了吗？

String.Source: Hrragh!
String.Dest: 哈呀！

String.Source: As you command.
String.Dest: 谨遵号令。

String.Source: (Laughs) Indrel would've liked you. She conserved enough stamina for the eight of us, yet when battle came, she still lagged behind like a rootworm.
String.Dest: (笑声)但愿英卓尔会喜欢你。她有足够的体力对付我们八人,然而,当战争来临,她仍然像条虫一样落在我们后面。

String.Source: Do you think Indrel will show up to the wedding? She'lll probably end up sleeping on the roof.
String.Dest: 你认为英卓尔会出现在婚礼上吗?她可能到头来还是在屋顶上睡大觉。

String.Source: Of course. Let's go.
String.Dest: 当然，走吧。

String.Source: But honor is a funny thing. Sometimes, it trumps even love. We may not be a company, but he'd never abandon us now.
String.Dest: 但是荣誉是一个有趣的事情。有时候,它甚至胜过爱情。我们或许不是同伴,但他却从未放弃过我们。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Moon-Tail was the only company member I didn't always trust. I got the same shivers around him as I do in place like this.
String.Dest: 月尾是我唯一不那么信任的公会成员。我在他身旁发现了一些东西，就像我现在在这里做的一样。

String.Source: Ugh, don't remind me. I'll never get that week back.
String.Dest: 啊，别提醒我。我永远不想回忆那一周了。

String.Source: You never have, and I suspect you never will. But if something goes wrong, let out a shout, and I'll do my best to crash the party.
String.Dest: 你从来没有，我怀疑也永远不会有失手的时候。但是如果事情出错，就大喊一声，我会尽我所能来破坏这场派对的。

String.Source: The skald at the Silver-Blood Inn has a classic Nord voice, cut from the cold. Yet I'm partial to Redguard voices, smooth as the dunes of the Alik'r.
String.Dest: 银血旅店的那个诗人是标准的诺德嗓，寒冷的沧桑味儿。只是我还是更喜欢红卫人的嗓音，柔美得像阿利克尔的沙丘。

String.Source: Ugh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Of course you do.
String.Dest: 你当然需要。

String.Source: You'll beg me to kill you before I'm done!
String.Dest: 你会求我杀了你的！

String.Source: Ivarstead. There's something peaceful about this place. Even the leaves look like they're meditating. Well Dragonborn, you ready to make the climb?
String.Dest: 紫杉镇. 这是一个和平的地方。即使是叶子看起来也像是在冥想。好了龙裔, 你准备爬上去了吗?

String.Source: (Roars)
String.Dest: (吼叫)

String.Source: Yes, although I can't say they'll ever be the same. Sometimes death is the answer, but it's not an easy thing to give.
String.Dest: 是的，虽然我不能说他们将永远是相同的。有时候死亡就是这个问题的答案，但这不是一件容易的事情。

String.Source: Yeah.
String.Dest: 是啊。

String.Source: Nightmares, pirates, surly miners...what's not to like about Dawnstar?
String.Dest: 噩梦，海盗，总是板着脸的矿工……你对晨星城的还有哪些地方不满意呢？

String.Source: All right. What is it?
String.Dest: 好。什么事？

String.Source: See that ledge to your left? That's probably a lookout. Rattle those bone chimes, and this whole cave will know we're here.
String.Dest: 看见你左边的那个突出的地方了吗，那可能是个瞭望台。让那些骨质编钟咯吱作响的话，那整个山洞都会知道我们在这儿了。

String.Source: Bodan arrived carrying Ula-Wei on his shoulder. He said more were on the way. He turned to Elia, but she shook her head. She was all out of magicka.
String.Dest: 波登扛着乌拉卫出现在了雾气中。他说他大部分时间都花在了路上。他转向了艾拉，但是艾拉摇了摇头。她已经耗尽了魔力。

String.Source: It will be done.
String.Dest: 包在我身上。

String.Source: What is it? You look like you have something on your mind. Don't worry, it'll pass.
String.Dest: 怎么回事？你看上去像是忧心忡忡。别担心，会过去的。

String.Source: Would you like to buy a lady a drink?
String.Dest: 你能请一位女士喝一杯吗？

String.Source: You have a grim look.
String.Dest: 你看起来好狰狞。

String.Source: But Dalum-Ei was always teaching me, and over time, some of the words managed to stick in my scales.
String.Dest: 但是达卢姆-艾一直在教导我。时间长到他的一些话都陷入我的鳞片了。

String.Source: By the time I was grown, I could slay five feathered serpents with a single slash, and do it with my eyes closed.
String.Dest: 等我长大了，我可以一刀劈死五只飞蛇，而且还是闭着眼睛。

String.Source: Alright, let's trade.
String.Dest: 那好，我们交易点东西。

String.Source: I suppose it is.
String.Dest: 希望如此。

String.Source: Traveler, I never cared much for treasure, but adventure and good company, that's another story.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我从不执着于财宝，但却热衷于冒险，在乎我的优秀同伴，而这是另外一个故事了。

String.Source: Be cautious, he says. This place could be filled with anything, he says. Then he tells us to poke around. Ha, I think this mage is trying to kill us.
String.Dest: 小心点，他说。他还说，这里不知道都埋伏着些什么乱七八糟的东西。然后他让我们四处逛逛。哈，我觉得这个法师想弄死我们。

String.Source: I'm sorry Thane, but you three will have to go on without me. I have business in Riften.
String.Dest: 抱歉，男爵。但是我不能陪你们三个继续走下去了。我要去裂谷城办点事。

String.Source: Then that is my task.
String.Dest: 我会去处理的。

String.Source: The bottom line is you killed him. You saved Skyrim. Let the snow-striders figure out how.
String.Dest: 最重要的是你杀了他。你救了天际省。让冰雪漫游者看看你是怎么做到的吧。

String.Source: So that's it! We're married. From now on, we don't fight for glory, for boon, or even honor. We fight for each other.
String.Dest: 成了！我们结婚了！从今以后，我们的战斗不是为了荣耀、为了尊严或是正义……我们是为彼此而战！

String.Source: There is much you have not told us about this Caller, Orthorn. All conjurers are callers, but what makes her special? Who, or what, does she call?
String.Dest: 有很多关于这个呼唤者的事情你可没告诉我们啊，奥松恩。所有的法师都是召唤者，但是她凭什么这么与众不同呢？她召唤的是谁？……或者说，是什么？

String.Source: Ula-Wei never spoke much, but when he did, people listened. Even Arnwulf trusted him, and I've never known a Nord to heed the advice of a lizard.
String.Dest: 乌拉卫话不多，可是只要他说，人们都会听。就连阿恩武夫都相信他，我还真没见过哪个诺德人会听一只蜥蜴的意见。

String.Source: It's my experience that runaways always come home. Maybe if we wait here, Orthorn will come to us. But what would be the fun in that?
String.Dest: 逃亡的人一般都会回家……我们如果呆在这，奥松恩就会朝我们飞奔过来……但是咱们也该拿他找点乐子了吧？

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't know Nords had scales!
String.Dest: （笑）我还真没听说诺德人有鳞片的！

String.Source: Jonna and Ingarte at the inn. Agni and Falion. Even old Lurbuk, annoying all the Nords in Sovngarde with his song.
String.Dest: 乔娜和印卡塔在旅馆里。阿格尼还有法利昂。甚至还有老卢布克，用他的歌声骚扰松加德所有的诺德人。

String.Source: I've heard about these bandits. They use these rocks to trap and kill peddlers. Now, we could find another route, but I say this way's more fun.
String.Dest: 我听说过那些强盗，用石头和陷阱害死路人。现在我们可以选择另找条路，不过要我说还是这条路更有意思。

String.Source: Show me what you've got!
String.Dest: 来啊！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你完全没机会了！

String.Source: Smart.
String.Dest: 真聪明。

String.Source: A blind Redguard, claiming to be your blood relative. She asked about you before heading over to the Bunkhouse.
String.Dest: 一个盲眼的红卫人，说是你的直系亲属。她问过你的事之后就去工坊了。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: This Orthorn does not deserve to live, nor does he deserve to die. Leave him in a cage to rot.
String.Dest: 这个叫奥松恩没什么资格继续生存……也没资格自己挂掉。我们把他扔到笼子里慢慢看他烂掉……不错吧？

String.Source: (Laughs) Moon-Tail told me it takes a monster to kill a monster, so maybe that's why you're here.
String.Dest: (笑)月尾跟我说要干掉一只怪物就得用另一只怪物出手，也许这就是你出现在这儿的原因。

String.Source: Just name it.
String.Dest: 讲出来。

String.Source: Sure.
String.Dest: 当然。

String.Source: So whether you want to stick with me or say goodbye, I want to say this now, before the moment passes.
String.Dest: 所以要么你跟我在一起要么趁早说拜拜，我现在把这话说了，免得下次没机会。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well said, traveler. Now that's the kind of bleak, worrisome future I can get behind.
String.Dest: （笑）说的好，旅行者。现在我能看得出那个杯具的令人担忧的未来了。

String.Source: There were truths in every lie. Parts of different stories that told the same tale. And if you pieced it all together, you would know.
String.Dest: 每个谎言里面都有真相的成分。不同的故事讲述着同样的传说。只要你能把碎片拼起，就能得到答案。

String.Source: (Laughs) It could be! You wouldn't be much of a hero if you were scared of a few hundred Daedra!
String.Dest: （笑）有可能！要是一下来好几百个魔人吓你，恐怕就没什么好逞英雄的啦。

String.Source: Your first lesson was on wards, huh. So that's how you protect yourself from mage fire! And all this time I've been dodging it!
String.Dest: 你的第一堂课学的是结界吗？这样就能挡住法师的火球了！我一直以来都是拼命躲闪来着。

String.Source: (Laughs) You tell it true, traveler. In my old company, it was always up to me to lighten the mood.
String.Dest: （笑）你说的没错，旅行者。在我以前的那伙人里边，能帮别人放松心情的事都靠我。

String.Source: Well traveler, the bad news is the Falmer stole some of our fun. The good news is, killing Falmer is just as enjoyable!
String.Dest: 好吧旅行者，坏消息是雪精灵抢走了我们一部分乐趣。好消息呢是去杀雪精灵也是一种乐趣。

String.Source: So tell me, priest, what's this group done exactly that has you chasing after them?
String.Dest: 那么告诉我，祭司，在你追踪那伙人的时候他们到底做了什么？

String.Source: They would, if they knew how to write! (Laughs) Get someone angry enough, and they'll spend every ounce of their energy letting you know it.
String.Dest: 他们会的，只要他们知道如何写！(笑声) 只要让某些人燃起怒火，他们就会花尽每一盎司的精力来让你知道。

String.Source: Huh?
String.Dest: 嗯？

String.Source: Take care of yourself.
String.Dest: 照顾好自己。

String.Source: A cave. What will we find? Trouble, or treasure?
String.Dest: 有个洞穴。到里面会发现什么呢？麻烦？还是宝藏？

String.Source: Will do.
String.Dest: 没问题。

String.Source: You may not be nobility, but you have a presence that rivals any queen. And that's why they'll know you belong.
String.Dest: 你也许不是贵族，可你有种媲美任何女皇的气质。这样他们才知道你是谁。

String.Source: He strode through the swamps like a cold breeze, and I realized how clumsy I was in comparison.
String.Dest: 他像一阵寒风那样大步走过沼泽,相比之下,我意识到了我是多么的笨手笨脚。

String.Source: By the Hist! Is that the Eldergleam? Now that's impressive.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！这就是古藤圣所？真是叫人印象深刻。

String.Source: Well, usually the dumber they look, the cheaper their prices! But this one, she's not as cheap as she looks.
String.Dest: 是啊，一般来讲，看起来越笨的，价格越便宜！不过这个，她可不像她看起来那么便宜。

String.Source: Funny.
String.Dest: 很好笑。

String.Source: Hear any news on Indrel?
String.Dest: 想听听关于英卓尔的消息么?

String.Source: The Arcanaeum is more like a wine cellar. If Orthorn really wanted to suck up to the mages, he should have left the books and stolen the liquor!
String.Dest: 秘藏馆更像一个酒窖。如果奥松恩真的想巴结这个法师，他就应该把书留下把酒卖掉！

String.Source: A Dwarven ruin! Wait, you want to go inside? (Laughs) Very well.
String.Dest: 一个矮人遗迹！等等，你想进去？（笑）好吧。

String.Source: They say in Riften, everyone keeps their head covered, and pointed at the floor.
String.Dest: 他们说在裂谷城，每个人都把他们的脑袋遮住，并垂着头。

String.Source: These Forsworn spies don't lack in numbers. It's a good strategy. Not even a Leviathan can shake off a legion of rats.
String.Dest: 那群弃誓者间谍的人数倒是不少，这是个不错的战略。体型再怎么大的生物也无法抵挡一群老鼠的围攻。

String.Source: Personally, I'd rather have a man who could wield a sword. But Bodan's lute was both.
String.Dest: 就我个人而言，我宁愿要一个会挥剑的人，但波登除了会耍剑还会弹鲁特琴。

String.Source: I'm surprised bandits even know how to work a lever, let alone build a tiny city.
String.Dest: 我连强盗会用扳手都觉得惊讶，更何况建造一座小城了。

String.Source: Ah, Dragon Bridge. Wait, the Nords call that a bridge? You can practically jump across!
String.Dest: 啊，龙桥。等等，诺德人把这叫做桥？你都能直接跳过去吧！

String.Source: Still, I think these monks have a little more discipline than that. Besides, they'd never make it to Ivarstead. It's a long way down.
String.Dest: 我还是想，这些僧侣受过更好的训练。另外，他们没有去紫杉镇，而是往下一直走。

String.Source: I'm beginning to think this city's Argonian population is wherever I happen to be standing.
String.Dest: 我开始感激这座城市对亚龙人的包容，这也是我站在这里的支柱。

String.Source: All right.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Is that so? I would very much like to meet this Argonian, and tell him about the pretty maiden from Hammerfell!
String.Dest: (笑声) 真的吗？我很乐意去会会这位亚龙人，并且告诉他有关落锤省漂亮少女的事！

String.Source: Oh well, Dragonborn, there's always next time.
String.Dest: 很好，龙裔。永远都是下一次再说。

String.Source: Not that she had a reason too, but that girl has Nocturnal's luck.
String.Dest: 她没有那种理性，但那小妞有诺克图娜尔的运气。

String.Source: Nothing yet. But I'll let you know if that changes.
String.Dest: 没事。有变故的话我会知会你的。

String.Source: Okay, traveler. Let's follow the light, and cut down everything in its path.
String.Dest: 好的，旅行者。让我们一起沿着光线,把路上所有东西都了结掉。

String.Source: (Meridia's Beacon) So you've got a Daedric Prince in your head? It happens to the best of us.
String.Dest: 现在有个魔族王子在你脑袋里？这是我们碰到最好的事情了。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei gave the nod. Couldn't chance it. Some poor hatchling could've been on a table, about to become some sick bastard's war puppet.
String.Dest: 达卢姆埃点头了，没法变了。一些可怜的幼体没有呆在桌子上，变成了一些混蛋的战争傀儡。

String.Source: Running out of room, eh? I'll be glad to help.
String.Dest: 没有空间了吗？我很乐意帮忙。

String.Source: Nord ruins. How long do you think they've stood here?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。你认为它矗立于此多久了？

String.Source: Hey, one of those levers has a fox! That's new.
String.Dest: 哈，有个拉杆上面有只狐狸！太新鲜了！

String.Source: I agree. Whenever we meet, it's never by chance. Sometimes it's friendship, other times it's fate. This time it could be the latter.
String.Dest: 我同意。我们无论何时见面都不仅仅是运气使然。有时我们是因为友谊的连接，有时是因为仇恨的关联。这次……应该是后者吧。

String.Source: Traveler, I'd have to disagree. A code takes discipline. It requires rules. Morals. Standards.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我不是很同意你的观点。准则带来纪律，这也需要规则、道德和标准的约束。

String.Source: The flora and insects in Hjaalmarch make it ideal for alchemists. For chaurus, the abundance of alchemists makes it an ideal place for lunch.
String.Dest: 希雅陲领的植物和昆虫简直就是炼金师的天堂啊！对于查鲁斯来说，炼金师的那些废弃材料就够他们吃喝不愁了。

String.Source: When I arrived here, I forgot this town had such a large cemetery. I thought the people were kind, they thought I was mourning.
String.Dest: 当我到这的时候，我已经忘记了这个城镇有这么大的一个墓地……这里的人民很友好……他们一直觉得我在悼念谁谁谁。

String.Source: You can stop by and say hello, but I suggest keeping your hands on your coin purse.
String.Dest: 你当然可以停下来打招呼，但请把手放在口袋里捏紧钱包。

String.Source: None. But I know that's where the Draugr are, and it'd be a shame not to slay a few on the way.
String.Dest: 没人，但我知道那里有一大堆的尸鬼……不干掉几个都对不起自己的良心。

String.Source: I just want to say thank you. A part of me died the day my company disbanded, and the part that remained was unclean.
String.Dest: 我只想说谢谢你。当我的队友解散之后，我的身体一部分已经算是死了。另一部分……我觉得他是污秽的。

String.Source: I don't know what's more inviting, the smell or the fire. Both would come second to a warm bed.
String.Dest: 我不知道什么对我更有吸引力……食物的香味还是温暖的篝火？……不过我觉得，这两样都比不上一张温暖的床……

String.Source: How's business today?
String.Dest: 今天的生意好吗？

String.Source: There's something about that Dark Elf that makes my tail stand on end. Careful with that one.
String.Dest: 这个黑暗精灵身上的什么东西让我的尾巴都竖起来了……小心点。

String.Source: I'm afraid we don't. We don't even have a company anymore.
String.Dest: 我很担心我们办不到，我们甚至连其他同伴都没有。

String.Source: Right you are. But few boats stopped by my village.
String.Dest: 你说的对。但很少有船会停在我的村子啊。

String.Source: For once, I agree with playing the thief's role. Stick to the shadows, traveler. No need for bloodshed.
String.Dest: 这次我建议咱们可以玩玩盗贼流。旅行者，这次我们可以隐藏在阴影中，没必要跟以往一样血淋淋的。

String.Source: Have you ever tried reasoning with bandits? No? Well, you're smarter than you look!
String.Dest: 你还试过跟强盗讲道理? 没？看上去你也不傻啊……

String.Source: Isn't there some business you should be tending to?
String.Dest: 你不是有正事要做吗？

String.Source: You want another one of those?
String.Dest: 你还想要再一轮吗？

String.Source: Well, I did see something interesting not long ago.
String.Dest: 我不久前就见过些有意思的事。

String.Source: I hope you know what you're doing, because this Silus fellow hasn't a clue.
String.Dest: 我希望你知道你自己在做什么。因为希鲁斯他们一点线索都没有。

String.Source: Fight!
String.Dest: 上啊！!

String.Source: It was kind of you to leave Valdr behind. I don't think he's recovered from his wounds.
String.Dest: 谢谢你把瓦尔卓甩了……我觉得他还没恢复呢。

String.Source: Either way, it doesn't take a shaman to see a there's a storm coming. But I don't mind getting a little wet.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，不需要萨满都看得出有一场风暴要来了。不过我不介意弄得湿漉漉的。

String.Source: Well, brave traveler, I have to admit I miss the swamp. Bodan used to say at the end of a battle, a warrior's first thoughts are always of home.
String.Dest: 好吧，勇敢的旅行者，我不得不承认我怀念沼泽。波登常说，在战斗结束后，战士最先冒出的念头总是回家。

String.Source: Yes, mother.
String.Dest: 是的，母亲。

String.Source: This is a place called "Greywater Grotto." Huh. I guess by "Greywater" they meant "Ice."
String.Dest: 这就是被叫做 "灰水石窟" 的地方吧。恩。我猜 "灰水" 指的是 "冰"。

String.Source: A vampire's coffin. But only one. Strange, I expected there were more of them. No, hoped is more like it.
String.Dest: 一个吸血鬼的棺材。但只有一个。奇怪，我期望这儿有更多的吸血鬼。不，我希望的是更多像这样的棺材。

String.Source: If you say so.
String.Dest: 如果你这么说的话。

String.Source: Smell that? Blood and death. Theirs will come soon enough.
String.Dest: 闻到了吗？鲜血和死亡。它们即将来临。

String.Source: (Laughs) Are you sure this time?
String.Dest: （笑声）你确定现在吗？

String.Source: So Mercer runs off with all the loot. So much for honor among thieves. What's next, Dark Brotherhood members killing each other? Works for me.
String.Dest: 所以墨瑟带着所有的战利品逃跑了。还有那盗贼的荣誉。那么接下来是什么，黑暗兄弟会的成员们互相残杀？为我工作吧。

String.Source: Yes. Beautiful, sad, and angry. A lost love, a death without an answer, and Gods who cared not for either.
String.Dest: 是的，美丽，难过和愤怒。一个失落的爱， 一个没有答案的死亡，不是任何人都会被圣灵所在意。

String.Source: Maybe even a mage thrown in as well! (Laughs) And why not? When all of us are together, I feel almost invincible. Let's go.
String.Dest: 也许一个法师也加入！(笑声) 为什么不呢? 当我们在一起，我觉得我们所向披靡。我们走吧.

String.Source: I'll skin you alive!
String.Dest: 我会活剥了你！

String.Source: And with Agni living with him, I didn't want to be responsible for another orphan.
String.Dest: 那么让阿格尼跟他住在一块儿吧。我不想负责另外一个孤儿。

String.Source: If that's your best, you won't live much longer!
String.Dest: 如果这就是你的最强实力，那你死定了！

String.Source: Is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 你就只有这点本事？

String.Source: No, I don't think I'm going to be alright. Not for a while. I'm going to be confused, frustrated, and angry.
String.Dest: 不，我并不认为我会变得更好。用不了多久，我会变得糊涂、失落和愤怒。

String.Source: Yeah?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Well, I knew Arnwulf the drunk, and Arnwulf the letch, and Arnwulf the brute. But Arnwulf the Wayfarer? Can't say I have.
String.Dest: 很好，我知道阿恩武夫。此人又嗜酒又色情又粗暴无礼。但你说阿恩武夫只是一个旅人？我难以言明我有多么吃惊。

String.Source: Traveler, I don't know whether to praise you for returning the Skeleton Key, or scold you for bringing the thieves luck! But you did it with honor.
String.Dest: 旅行者，我不知道是否要因为你归还骷髅钥匙而赞美你，或责骂你带来这小偷的运气！但你却带着荣誉这样做了。

String.Source: But maybe we can still do something. Come on, they must have left for the marsh. It's the only place they could be alone.
String.Dest: 但也许我们还可以做些什么。来吧，他们必须去沼泽。这是他们唯一独处之地。

String.Source: But on some nights, when he thought everyone was asleep, he would drift out into the swamp, where only the Gods and the Hist could hear his tune.
String.Dest: 但在某些夜晚，当他觉得每个人都睡着的时候,，他会游荡到沼泽，在那里唯有圣灵和希斯特才能听到他的歌声。

String.Source: What now?
String.Dest: 又怎么了？

String.Source: Malborn didn't make it, huh. He wasn't a soldier, but he was gallant all the same.
String.Dest: 马伯恩没能做到，嗯。他不是战士，但他与战士一样英勇。

String.Source: You mean another one?
String.Dest: 你是说另外一个？

String.Source: Hagravens betraying each other? Well, can't say I'm surprised. If anything, I'm surprised it doesn't happen more often.
String.Dest: 乌鸦鬼婆会经常背叛彼此？嗯哼，也不是说我有多惊讶。真要说的话，我很惊讶这种背叛情形居然不是每一次都发生。

String.Source: All these damn spores...this place is dustier than a Thalmor's handshake.
String.Dest: 这些该死的臭脓包...这地方简直比梭默的握手行为还要肮脏。

String.Source: Eyraargh!
String.Dest: 伊呀啊啊！

String.Source: You know, cleaning and sweeping really is harder than slaying trolls. The dust, it just keeps coming back for more.
String.Dest: 你懂的，打扫真的比杀死巨魔要难得多。这些该死的灰尘只会不断的越来越多。

String.Source: What?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: She liked them young and stupid, she said, but not that young, and not that stupid.
String.Dest: 她说，她喜欢他们的年轻和愚蠢，但他们不是那么年轻，也没有那么愚蠢。

String.Source: What are you some sort of mannequin? Could've fooled me, the way those Elves have you playing dress up!
String.Dest: 你是什么服装模特儿么？你在愚弄我，用这种装扮成那些精灵的方式玩弄我！

String.Source: Then traveler, I'd say you were a sodding Draugr, because damn if you don't have a heart.
String.Dest: 那么旅行者，我会说你是个该死的尸鬼，因为你他妈的没有良心。

String.Source: I admit, I don't pay much attention to what goes on in this town. But the murder of a child bears investigating.
String.Dest: 我得承认，我没注意这个小镇发生了什么。但似乎一个杀了孩子的凶手正在被追捕。

String.Source: They call this side of town the "Dry Side." Good to see it doesn't apply to the mead!
String.Dest: 他们管城镇的这一边叫“干燥地带”。这不适用于蜂蜜酒真是太好了！

String.Source: But who will save the mages from themselves? (Laughs) That was a jest, traveler. I, for one, am glad to see one less Thalmor in the world.
String.Dest: 但谁会去拯救法师他们自身？（笑）那就是个小丑，旅行者。而那些会为世界上少了一个梭默而庆幸的人，也算我一个。

String.Source: In the end, maybe my stubbornness won out. Still, without him, I wouldn't be who I am.
String.Dest: 最后，或许会是我的顽固取得了胜利。但是，没有他，我就不会是我了。

String.Source: It was Mara that first gave birth to all of creation and pledged to watch over us as her children.
String.Dest: 是玛拉赐予我们以至于万物生命，并将我们当做自己的孩子。

String.Source: The Greybeards are an honorable lot, but even wise men need a break from all the wisdom. Sometimes you just want to act stupid.
String.Dest: 灰胡子是高贵的，但哪怕是最聪明的人也该暂时从智慧中抽出身来。有些时候，你只需要装糊涂就好。

String.Source: I don't know what Dalum-Ei told you, but I bet she suspected one of us.
String.Dest: 我不知道达卢姆?艾给你说了什么，可我打赌她对我们中的一个有所怀疑。

String.Source: It looks like the High King's been taking more than his fair share from the locals.
String.Dest: 似乎至高王一直以来都从当地人手里夺取了过多的东西。

String.Source: Exactly.
String.Dest: 就是这样。

String.Source: The Companions value being true to yourself. Still, while you can have a lot of personalities, a good company should always fight for a single goal.
String.Dest: 同伴的价值在于永远对你真诚。同样，而你可以保留自己的个性，一个优秀的搭档永远都只会为一个目标而战斗。

String.Source: Whether it was an old company or a good friend, I am what I am because of people like you.
String.Dest: 不管那是个老战友还是好朋友。我就是因为你这样的人才成为现在的我。

String.Source: But I don't think they'd be here if Kodlak didn't believe in them as much as Dalum-Ei believed in me.
String.Dest: 如果克拉科信任他们并不像我信任达卢姆艾一样程度的话，他们大概不会来吧？

String.Source: What? What do you mean?
String.Dest: 什么？你这是什么意思？

String.Source: Black robes and ominous words. The past never tires of mocking the present.
String.Dest: 黑色的长袍与不祥的语言。历史总在不停地嘲讽着现实。

String.Source: You did the smart thing, traveler. The Gildergreen was already dead, and trying to keep the dead alive isn't priestly. It's necromancy.
String.Dest: 你做了件聪明事儿，旅行者。翠苒树已经死了，试图让死去的东西复活不是牧师的事儿，那得用巫术。

String.Source: I don't know what's right or wrong anymore. All I know is today, I lost two friends.
String.Dest: 我不知道什么是对，什么是错。我只知道今天，我失去了两个朋友。

String.Source: Well, I was trying to get rid of him. What's your excuse?
String.Dest: 嗯，我是想摆脱他。你的理由是什么？

String.Source: Well, traveler, try as we might, it looks like we can't go more than fifty paces without running into each other!
String.Dest: 那么,旅者,假设我们可以做到，这看上去就算我们不撞到对方我们也根本走不了五十步！

String.Source: This Sven fellow fancies himself a skald? (Laughs) I didn't know there was war being fought at the Sleeping Giant Inn!
String.Dest: 斯万这家伙把自己当成战地诗人？（笑）我可不知道沉睡巨人旅馆里有战争！

String.Source: I've been told bears in Skyrim won't attack unless provoked. Hah! You'll find less aggression sticking your tail in a hornet's nest!
String.Dest: 有人告诉我在天际省的熊不会主动攻击至少被激怒之前不会。哈！结果你会发现熊的进攻就像你的尾巴上粘着一个马蜂窝一样！

String.Source: Not a problem. Why mess with a good thing.
