String.Dest: 没问题。为什么要和好事混在一起。

String.Source: Maybe ten years ago, I would've thought like you. Whether it was dragons or Daedric Princes, I thought I could take them all.
String.Dest: 也许十年前我不会像你这样思考问题，不管是巨龙还是魔族王子，我想我都能把他们全都干掉。

String.Source: I venture dragons aren't the nipping type. They probably like to chomp, and have much bigger teeth.
String.Dest: 我敢说龙可不是那种细嚼慢咽的类型。他们更应该大口吞吃，他们的牙大得多。

String.Source: And you do his memory proud. Thank you.
String.Dest: 你做的会让他回忆起来都感到骄傲。谢谢你。

String.Source: Coffins? And so few of them! Why, these won't last the hour!
String.Dest: 棺材？而且这么少！有什么用呢，都撑不过一个小时！

String.Source: Ha! It's a little heavier than I remember, but I suppose I can just blind my foes instead!
String.Dest: 哈！这比我印象中还要有些沉重，但我可以把敌人弄瞎，他们就看不到我了。

String.Source: But that isn't honor, traveler. A true knight keeps to their code, not because it's easy, but because it's hard.
String.Dest: 但是旅行者，这可不光彩。一名真正的骑士遵守他们的戒律，不是因为这些清规戒律很容易做到，相反，这是因为它们很难办到。

String.Source: Ready yourself, hero, this Halldir is no ordinary foe.
String.Dest: 英雄，你得做好准备，这位霍迪尔可不是寻常人物。

String.Source: You would've fit in well with our company. Nobody ever minced words, least of all Dalum-Ei, and everything he said had a point.
String.Dest: 你会和我们的伙伴相处的很好的。没人会拐弯抹角的说话，除了达卢姆艾，他说什么事儿都有点儿兜圈子。

String.Source: I admit, I've made a lot of mistakes in my life. But I've always owned up to them. I wear them on my back. Morndas, she wears them on her chest.
String.Dest: 我承认，我在生活中犯了很多错误。但我一直承担它们，将那些错误负于背上。而摩恩达丝，则把它们压在胸口。

String.Source: And the braggart named Ragnar was boastful no moooooree... when his ugly red head rolled around on the floor!
String.Dest: 牛皮王拉格纳不能再自夸……他的红脑袋摔成了一堆渣！

String.Source: Stendarr's Light purify you of your ills.
String.Dest: 斯丹达尔的光芒将净化你的疾病。

String.Source: An inn's a good place for rumors, mercs, and drink. Unless you're the kind who preaches sobriety. If so, I'll have to reevaluate our friendship!
String.Dest: 旅馆是流言的集散地，也是提供雇佣兵和啤酒的好地方。除非你是个推崇节制的家伙，如果是那样，那我得重新审视我们之间的友谊了！

String.Source: Even when every other farm in the hold is barely scraping by, the harvest at Rorikstead is always bountiful.
String.Dest: 即使是冬堡的农民都没有半点收成时，洛里斯泰德的收成依然可观。

String.Source: This tunnel must have brought safe passage to thousands of travelers to and from the White River. We walk in the footsteps of history.
String.Dest: 这条隧道一定给数千从白河往来的旅行者们带来了安全。我们正沿着历史的足迹前行。

String.Source: So this is your home, huh. It's a fine place to live.
String.Dest: 所以这就是你的家，哈。真是个居住的好地方。

String.Source: That's right. Everyone in a company is different, and in the Companions, no one is anyone's master.
String.Dest: 是啊。每一个同伴都是不同的，在战友团，没有谁高人一等。

String.Source: Bleeding wind? That I don't know. If it was breaking wind, we'd be talking about Arnwulf, but I take it he's doing that in Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 血腥的风?那我不知道。如果是破碎的风,我们是在讨论阿恩武夫,但我认为他在松嘉德忙活着呢.

String.Source: This place looks better than most people's homes! The folks from Riverwood ought to move in here!
String.Dest: 这地方的房子看起来比大多数人的都好！河木镇的人应该搬到这儿来！

String.Source: I'm actually not surprised the Wolf Queen's back. Skyrim has so many walking corpses and would be rulers, it makes sense for some of them to overlap.
String.Dest: 其实我对狼心女王的归来并没感到有多惊讶。天际已经有这么多的行尸走肉想要成为统治者了。这之间有一些相似的道理。

String.Source: Are you sure you made the right decision? I don't know if I'm comfortable leaving here knowing we let this mage live. But it's your call.
String.Dest: 你确定你做了正确的决定？我不确定在我知道“让这法师活着”的时候我会很舒服的离开这里。但这是你的要求。

String.Source: But this land is ours and we'll see it wiped clean. Of the scourge that has sullied our hopes and our dreams.
String.Dest: 这片大地是我们的，洁白而干净。任何灾难只会加强我们的信念跟梦想！

String.Source: (Laughs) I say that in jest, Dragonborn. I know you'll fit right in.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我在开玩笑呢，龙裔。我知道你会很合适的。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei used vengeance to motivate him. Looking into his eyes, I wonder if that's all but settled.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾常常用复仇来刺激他。看着他的眼睛， 我不知道这一切是否妥当。

String.Source: (Laughs) You think you're a Nord? Then I must be a dragon! Climb on my back, and we'll fly to new worlds!
String.Dest: (笑声) 你以为你是一个诺德人？那我则是一条龙！爬到我的背上，我们将飞向新的世界！

String.Source: No, I think I'll go to Aetherius the normal way. Through old age and a belly full of wine.
String.Dest: 不，我想我会凭着我这年老满腹酒水之体，用平常的方法去艾瑟瑞斯。

String.Source: Arnwulf...Moon-Tail...Elia...why?
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫……月尾……艾拉……为什么？

String.Source: They were refugees from Cyrodiil. Altmer, Khajiit, and Argonian. Driven from Leyawiin. To the clans, they might as well have been wraiths.
String.Dest: 他们是从赛瑞迪尔来的难民。高精灵，虎人，还有亚龙人。这些人是从从丽雅雯来的。对于部落来说，他们估计也要变成亡魂了。

String.Source: They're probably trying to scare us into giving them more money and influence, so they can save us from the dragons threat.
String.Dest: 他们大概想吓唬我们，好让我们因为恐惧而交出更多的钱。

String.Source: Not likely, traveler. Hackwings like to hit and run. They'll swoop down and nip you and wait for you to bleed out.
String.Dest: 不太可能，旅行者。刀翼喜欢打游击。它们会突然俯冲下来攻击你然后等你慢慢流血死去。

String.Source: Sure, why not! I think I'm ready to settle down. Is that what you want?
String.Dest: 当然，为什么不呢！我已经准备好定居了。你想这样么？

String.Source: Enjoy your last breath!
String.Dest: 享受你最后一口气吧。

String.Source: Thank you, traveler. None of this is easy. So it means a lot, knowing you're on my side.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，旅行者。这是不容易事。所以它意义重大，我知道你站在我这边了。

String.Source: We were, and we did.
String.Dest: 我们就是，而且我们还作下去了。

String.Source: We all have are faults, and sometimes we just have to wise up to see them. Maybe the Redguard will figure that out eventually.
String.Dest: 我们每个人都有缺点，有时我们不得不清楚的认识那些缺点。也许这个红卫人最终会明白这个道理的。

String.Source: You want a drink?
String.Dest: 想喝点什么？

String.Source: The Redguard at the inn here. I once saw him fight in the Imperial City Arena. He was undisciplined. Wild. A brute. And a force to be reckoned with.
String.Dest: 那个红卫人在这家酒馆。我曾经看过他在皇城竞技场的战斗。他散漫，狂野而残暴。还有一股不容小觑的力量。

String.Source: Another archer on the walkway. Looks like the way up is to the right. Sounds like a group of them talking, we may be able to catch 'em off guard.
String.Dest: 走道上又有一个弓箭手。看起来上去的那条路是往右边去的。好像有一群人在说话，也许我们能给他们来个偷袭。

String.Source: I wasn't aware these were military men, traveler. Bandits, more like it. And the king of bandits is no king of mine.
String.Dest: 我没注意到这些是当兵的，旅行者，要说像强盗还差不多。强盗的大王可不是我的大王。

String.Source: I will tell you that there's only one thing in this world I truly mourn. My sanity! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 我会 告诉你,在这个世界上只有一件事是我真正悲哀的。那就是我的理智！(笑)

String.Source: By the swamps of Black Marsh, look at that! I don't know what that purple egg is, but I say we charge ahead before it hatches!
String.Dest: 在黑沼泽边上，快看！虽然我不知道那个紫色的蛋是什么，但我要说我们得在它孵化之前快冲上去！

String.Source: How are you holding up, traveler? Don't be afraid to rest early tonight. You've earned it. Don't worry, I'll drink enough for the both of us!
String.Dest: 你还好吧，年轻人？别想太多了，今晚你应该早点休息。别担心，今晚我会替你喝个够！

String.Source: It looks like a 40 foot drop. Who knows how deep that water is. Well, there's only one way to find out!
String.Dest: 看起来这有40英尺，鬼才知道这到底有多深。好吧，只有一个办法能让我们知道这究竟有多深！

String.Source: Did you hear me?
String.Dest: 你听见我说什么了吗？

String.Source: A Dwarven city. Remarkable.
String.Dest: 一座矮人城市。真是不同寻常。

String.Source: Something dark and evil is waiting behind those fences. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 一些黑暗和邪恶之物隐藏在暗处虎视眈眈。提高警惕。

String.Source: Jonna and Ingarte at the inn. Agni and Falion. Even old Lurbuk, still making sure no one in Morthal gets a good night's sleep.
String.Dest: 这家酒馆的乔和印卡塔，阿格尼和法利昂，甚至是老卢布克，也都在墨索尔城睡不好觉。

String.Source: Wait! I think one of them's missing! Up front! I swear by the Hist, there was someone there!
String.Dest: 等等！我看他们少了一个人！前面上方！我对希斯特发誓那儿绝对有人！

String.Source: You puny weakling!
String.Dest: 你这可怜虫！

String.Source: (Laughs) Is that so? Well traveler, that might say more about you than it does her. But as one of your companions, I trust you.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真是这样吗？好吧旅行者，看起来支持她的人比支持你的更多。但作为朋友，我相信你。

String.Source: Then pass. Be like the wind. At least it has the courtesy not to speak.
String.Dest: 那就放下吧。像风一样飘过。至少风有不说话的雅量。

String.Source: Yes, and unless there's room on that overgrown lizard for two, this is where we part ways.
String.Dest: 是的，我们得在这分别了，除非那大蜥蜴身上能多坐一个人。

String.Source: An Orc follows to the death.
String.Dest: 兽人至死相随。

String.Source: We split up in Bravil. Don't know why he chose me. Seems to me he was better off with the Breton. But as I kept going north, he never left my side.
String.Dest: 我们在布拉维尔分了手，我不知道为什么他选择了我。在我看来，他和那个布萊頓人在一起会更好。但是就算我一直往北走，他也从未离开过我身边。

String.Source: I haven't the slightest idea what you're talking about.
String.Dest: 我对你所说的东西毫无概念。

String.Source: Lami's always experimenting with ingredients, which is a good for the mind, but bad for the coin purse. Well, bad for her coin purse, anyway.
String.Dest: 拉米对草药经验丰富，这有益于头脑灵活，但不利于钱包健康。当然，只是对她的钱包而已。

String.Source: The marsh is a good place to catch dragonflies. Bright ones are like the day, good for stamina. Dark ones are like night, for to sleep is to heal.
String.Dest: 沼泽是个抓蜻蜓的好地方。亮色的蜻蜓就像阳光一样，有益于补充耐力。而暗色的蜻蜓就像夜色一样，能让你睡个好觉得到充分的休息。

String.Source: You look like an adventurous one. I bet we're kindred spirits, you and I.
String.Dest: 你看起来像一个爱冒险的人。我觉得我们志趣相投，你和我。

String.Source: I can't believe we let provincials like you wander Skyrim.
String.Dest: 真不敢相信我们让你这样的乡巴佬在天际省四处游荡！

String.Source: Not so tough now, are you?
String.Dest: 知道厉害了吧？

String.Source: I've heard about this ship. They call it the Dainty Sload. Ha, maybe I'll call my ship the portly skeleton!
String.Dest: 我听说过这艘船。他们叫它“优雅斯洛德号”。哈，也许我把我自己的船叫做“肥胖的骨头号”！

String.Source: Arnwulf couldn't be bested by strength, and Ula-Wei couldn't be killed by stealth. This assassin is dangerous, Companion. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫不可能在力量上被战胜，乌拉卫不可能被暗杀。这刺客是危险的，朋友。你们务要儆醒。

String.Source: I was hatched in a small tribal village, lost in the swamps between Thorn and Helstrom. In other words, in the middle of nowhere.
String.Dest: 我在一个小部落中降生，在索恩和赫尔斯托姆之间的沼泽中迷失。换句话说，不知道身在何处.

String.Source: You can't really blame this bandit for hiding his treasure here. It's safer in a cave of full angry bears than in a camp full of his peers!
String.Dest: 你不能责怪这个强盗把他的财宝藏在这儿。比起那个到处是他的同行的营地，还是这个满是愤怒的熊的山洞更安全些！

String.Source: There's only one place I can think of. The marsh. Come on, maybe we can still do something!
String.Dest: 我能想到的只有一个地方。沼泽。快走，也许我们还能做点儿什么。

String.Source: As for my name, my clan once knew me as Anum-La, but fighting folk call me The Swamp Knight.
String.Dest: 至于我的名字，我的族人曾叫我阿努姆拉，但是佣兵叫我沼泽骑士。

String.Source: (Laughs) Sure, why not! It may not be that kind of party, but either way, we'll have something to look forward to when it's done.
String.Dest: (笑声) 当然，为什么不呢！这不是那种聚会，但是同样，我们有值得期待的事情。

String.Source: Together, the eight of us wanted to be honorable. But you already are. You are everything a knight aims to be.
String.Dest: 一起吧。我们八个都想获得荣誉。但是你早已功成名就了。你是所有骑士努力的目标。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Come on, kid, get up. We're taking you home.
String.Dest: 我想的没错儿。来吧孩子，快起来。我们带你回家。

String.Source: Ha, maybe they ought to rule together. You know what they say, two bad kings are better than one!
String.Dest: 哈哈，也许他们该一起统治。你知道他们说什么吗， 两个坏国王，总比一个强！

String.Source: Indrel was the first to suggest we drink the potions from the shipment. Dalum-Ei said he would kill anyone who tried.
String.Dest: 英卓尔第一个建议我们喝一下货里的药剂， 达卢姆艾说谁那样做他就杀了谁。

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你还是做好最坏的打算吧！

String.Source: Dalum-Ei! It really is you!
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾！真的是你！

String.Source: Get some rest, traveler. I'm sure Dalum-Ei will have a plan when he's ready.
String.Dest: 去歇会儿吧，旅行者。我相信当达卢姆艾准备好了，他会有个计划的。

String.Source: Wait...why are we fighting?
String.Dest: 等一下……我们为什么打架来着？

String.Source: You sometimes forget that Markarth was a Dwemer ruin before it became a Silver-Blood one.
String.Dest: 有时候你会忘记马卡斯城在银血家族来之前只是片矮人废墟。

String.Source: Fair enough.
String.Dest: 有道理。

String.Source: There's a lot of evidence that points to the Falmer. Arrows, ears...it's almost too much. Like it was planted. Ah, maybe I'm over-thinking it.
String.Dest: 有很多的证据指向了雪精灵。箭啊，耳朵什么的……简直是太多了，雪精灵的这些东西就像是一夜之间长出来了一样，也许我得思考一番。

String.Source: Waiting.
String.Dest: 还在等。

String.Source: I can't stand the stuff, but the Nords seem to like it. All the honey and fruits they put into it takes away from the bite.
String.Dest: 我不能忍受这种东西，但诺德人似乎喜欢它。他们把所有蜂蜜和水果都倒进去调味儿。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: To the next fight.
String.Dest: 朝下一场战斗前进。

String.Source: They seem to think it's at least a dozen, but I'm sure they're exaggerating.
String.Dest: 他们似乎觉得至少有一打，不过那太夸张了点。

String.Source: You need to not bother me.
String.Dest: 别打扰我。

String.Source: This Mulush talks tough, but he's soft enough to fear what his employers will do to him, should the miners slack.
String.Dest: 这个家伙口气很强硬，不过 等到他知道他老板要怎么做的时候他就会知道害怕的。

String.Source: The job was simple. Clear out a cave of necromancers that were terrorizing one of the clans that resided near the border.
String.Dest: 这个活儿很简单，只要清除驻扎在边境附近的那窝儿藏匿于山洞的亡灵法师就行了。他们好死不死的恐吓了一个氏族。

String.Source: Thank you, traveler. I'll do my best to remember the fallen. Moon-Tail, for his surprises, Arnwulf for his laugh.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，旅行者。我会尽力记住那些逝者的。我会记住特别容易吃惊的月尾，还有总喜欢开怀大笑的阿恩武夫。

String.Source: But I won't abandon him. I'll do my best to stay close, and keep my sword ready.
String.Dest: 可我决不会放弃他。我会尽可能地贴近，保持战斗状态。

String.Source: And if we don't, we risk losing everything else.
String.Dest: 要是我们不做，就有可能失去一切。

String.Source: So these bandits just tossed their leader into the pit? You'd think even the lowliest of companies would show a little more respect.
String.Dest: 所以这些强盗就把他们的首领扔进了坑里？你会想到即使是最卑微的同伴也该给予他们更多的尊重。

String.Source: Is it good fortune? The blessings of the Divines? Who knows?
String.Dest: 这算宝藏？圣灵的赐福吗？谁知道呢？

String.Source: In a world of liars, sellswords and turncoats, you stand above. You bring honor to the name, adventurer. Here, a small token of my appreciation.
String.Dest: 你真是个世界顶尖的骗子，佣兵和叛徒。你给这些职业添了光。冒险家。拿着这些钱吧，略表我的心意。

String.Source: A Nord ruin. Thousands of years old.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。它有数千年之久了吧。

String.Source: Sadly, no. The child was on the table like Ula-Wei said, but she was already dead. The people around her were mourners. Black robes.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，没有。这个孩子像乌拉卫所说的那样躺在桌子上，但她已经死了。哀悼者们都穿着黑色的长袍，围绕在她身边。

String.Source: He may still think the Gods ignored him, but the force of that song drove the Hist to listen.
String.Dest: 他可能仍认为众神忽视了他，但这首歌蕴藏的力量驱使希斯特去聆听。

String.Source: Indrel was an archer like you. She said as a child, she would do shows for spare gold shooting apples off a beggar's head. Don't get any ideas.
String.Dest: 英卓尔像你一样是个弓箭手。她说，当她还是个孩子时，她就能用省下来的金币射中乞丐头上的苹果了……我的意思是，他用金币贿赂乞丐，让乞丐自愿成为靶子。别多想。

String.Source: I know. I've long held a suspicion of mages, and magic. But after what happened with my old company, I've been a little hesitant.
String.Dest: 我知道，但我一直以来都对法师和魔法有所怀疑。但在跟我的老伙计发生这档子事儿之后，我就有所犹豫了。

String.Source: No! How?
String.Dest: 不！怎么会？

String.Source: Half naked and beard soaked with saliva, he climbed up the tree Indrel was sleeping in. I've never heard such a high pitched scream.
String.Dest: 他半裸着身体，胡子上还沾着口水，就这么爬上了英卓尔睡觉的树。(笑声) 我头一次听到那么大的尖叫声。

String.Source: Sometimes when the fog is thick, I'll wade through the thorny brambles, or stand in the shadow of a mangrove, and think of home.
String.Dest: 有的时候雾很浓，我就到带刺的草丛里走上一趟，或者站在红树的影子里，想家。

String.Source: I should've appreciated the smith's sacrifice. I was the one who asked him to sharpen my sword, and now I was scaring his little ones.
String.Dest: 我应该感谢这个铁匠的牺牲。我是那个要求他磨利我的剑的人，而现在我又把他的孩子吓得半死。

String.Source: The honor is mine, Thane. Or should I say king?
String.Dest: 那是我的荣幸，男爵。或者我应该称您为王？

String.Source: This is all your fault you know. What did you think was down there anyway?
String.Dest: 反正这一切都是你的错。你之前到底以为那下面藏着什么呢？

String.Source: Suit yourself.
String.Dest: 随你便。

String.Source: Well, what do you think? We came all this way, but I admit, our friend here is probably right. It's best he stay with someone who understands him.
String.Dest: 好吧，你怎么看？我们尽全力来到这里，但是我承认我们在这里的朋友可能是对的。他最好和懂他的人呆在一起。

String.Source: But the words didn't sink in until that night near the Dunmer village. That's when I realized it wasn't just about me.
String.Dest: 可那些不知所云的话直到在暗精灵村庄附近度过的那晚才有了解答。那时候我才明白不光是我一个人的事。

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't know Nords were so ugly!
String.Dest: （笑）我都不知道诺德人都这么丑呢！

String.Source: Valdr has not earned the right to continue his feeble existence. Kill him. His corpse will make for a better tool against our foes.
String.Dest: 瓦尔卓没有赢得他卑微生命活下去的资格。干掉他。他的尸体会成为我们送给敌人的最好的礼物。

String.Source: Really?
String.Dest: 真的吗？

String.Source: Naturally, the company laughed uproariously at my expense. They dubbed me "The Swamp Knight," and I've been that ever since.
String.Dest: 当然，我的同伴们老是拿我开涮取乐。他们给我起了“沼泽骑士”这么个外号儿，自那以后我一直被这么叫了。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, drink a cure potion, friend. Trying to avoid each other is like fighting through the swamp. The more you struggle, the more you sink.
String.Dest: (笑声)好了好了，消消气。想避开别人就像逃离沼泽一样。你越是挣扎，下沉越快。

String.Source: But traveling with you, fighting by your side, I was able to reclaim a sense of honor. A belief that I was doing some good.
String.Dest: 但和你一起旅行，在你身边战斗，能让我拾回那久违了的荣誉感。我相信我是在做好事。

String.Source: A reward! How delightful! And here I thought we murdered that Vigilant for nothing!
String.Dest: 奖赏！太爽了！我还以为我们得白白杀了那些警戒者呢！

String.Source: If Dalum-Ei is our foe, then be on your guard, traveler. He's a master swordsman, a living legend, and a true knight.
String.Dest: 如果达卢姆艾是我们的敌人的话，你可得保持警惕了，旅行者。他是一位剑术大师，一个活着的传奇，一名真正的骑士。

String.Source: Is this where Karliah's been hiding out the past 25 years? Are we sure she isn't insane?
String.Dest: 这就是卡莱雅在过去的25年里一直躲着的地方？我们真能确定她没疯吗？

String.Source: That wasn't what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是这个意思。

String.Source: Filthy Forsworn!
String.Dest: 肮脏的弃誓者！

String.Source: Hey, watch it!
String.Dest: 喂，注意点！

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, he's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 这就是龙裔，他是每个人的偶像。

String.Source: This isn't over.
String.Dest: 这事儿没完。

String.Source: No. As much as I don't want to believe it...Bodan's words ring true.
String.Dest: 不，尽管我不想去相信...但波登的话确实是真的。

String.Source: It's the Dragonborn, She's everyone's type.
String.Dest: 是龙裔，她能讨每个人的欢心。

String.Source: Looking to protect yourself, or deal some damage?
String.Dest: 在找保护自己的东西，还是砍人的东西？

String.Source: Maybe, but he was also a great leader, and a true knight. I mourn his loss as I do the others.
String.Dest: 也许吧，不过他也确实是个伟人，真正的骑士。我对他的哀悼像对其他人一样。

String.Source: Not quite good enough!
String.Dest: 还不够好！

String.Source: So if you'll kindly go and save this world, I'll do my best to live in it. Not as a Swamp Knight, but a real one.
String.Dest: 所以如果你会去拯救这个世界的话，我将尽力为此而存在。不是作为沼泽骑士，而是一个真正的人。

String.Source: Imagine my surprise when I found myself talking to a patch of deathbells. (Laughs) There was no one there!
String.Dest: 你猜当时我多震惊啊……发现自己在对着一丛丧钟花说傻话。（笑）那儿根本没人！

String.Source: Good. I don't think I have any scales left to shave.
String.Dest: 好的。我想我没有什么需要梳理的鳞片啦。

String.Source: With his wife dead, Christer probably attacked you knowing you'd kill him. Some people will follow you to the void if they have to.
String.Dest: 知道他老婆死了，克里斯特大概会来攻击你好让你杀了他。有些人在迫不得已时是情愿跟别人一起死的。

String.Source: A fresh pond and fresh water. This looks like a good spot for a camp. Although I'm sure that alchemist over there thought the same.
String.Dest: 干净的水池和新鲜的池水。这儿看起来是个扎营的好地方。虽然我看对面的炼金术士也跟咱想的一样。

String.Source: Is this it? We worked our way up this massive hill and all we found were skeletons. Not even a necromancer to conjure them. I feel cheated.
String.Dest: 就这样而已？我们费了半天的力气爬上这大山就只找到几具骷髅。甚至连召唤它们的亡灵术士都没看见。我觉得上当了。

String.Source: Thane of Hjaalmarch, huh. I wonder if that makes you my Thane as well. There's a nasty rumor going around that I live here!
String.Dest: 希雅陲领领主啊，哈。我想知道这个会不会也让你变成领主啊……真是个恶毒的谣言啊，咱们还住在这呢！

String.Source: The stallion's potion? (Laugh) Perhaps the Steward ought to live in a stable. He'd have a better chance at finding a mate!
String.Dest: 种马药水？（笑）恐怕那管家还是去马厩生活比较好。那儿好方便他找到配偶！

String.Source: To Ysgramor's Tomb then, traveler. For Kodlak!
String.Dest: 然后去伊斯格拉谟之墓吧，旅行者。为了克拉科！

String.Source: I don't know what the Forsworn want with Dibella, but if you're dabbling with witchcraft, whatever reasons you have can't be good.
String.Dest: 我不知道弃誓者要迪贝拉的人做什么，不过对于碰过巫术的人，不管什么原因都好不到哪儿去。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: But for now, let me thank you. You've always been there for me. And as I long as I live, I'll try my best to do the same.
String.Dest: 而此刻，让我谢谢你。你一直守着我。所以只要我活着，就会尽全力对你一样好。

String.Source: I remember when Arnwulf used to get drunk, he and Elia would fool around a bit. But one time he had a little too much, and got a little too brave.
String.Dest: 我记着之前阿恩武夫喝醉的时候，他和伊利亚都会干些蠢事。但有一次他喝的太多了，有点儿变的太勇敢了。

String.Source: In time, you learn it's better to avoid the traps altogether. That, or you don't live to see another.
String.Dest: 总之，你最好及时学会如何避免陷阱。否则你就没机会见到另一个陷阱了。

String.Source: I almost did! I never took the road, and covered my tracks through Niben Bay.
String.Dest: 我几乎做到了！我从没走过那条路，然后不露痕迹的通过尼本湾。

String.Source: From my camp, I often see the fire blazing from this fort. And while it lit up the western sky, at no point did it feel warm.
String.Dest: 从帐篷向外看去，我总会看到那堡垒明亮的火焰不时的闪耀着。虽然这照亮了西方的天空，可我却感不到丝毫温暖。

String.Source: Bad men don't live to see tomorrow. Honor stays.
String.Dest: 坏人活不到看见明天的太阳，荣耀者才可以留下。

String.Source: Falion probably has Idgrod to thank for that. Although I suppose the townsfolk are the lucky ones.
String.Dest: 法利昂可能让伊格罗德为那件事情致谢了。但我还是觉得市民们才是幸运的一方。

String.Source: We're the children of Skyrim, and we fight all our lives. And when Sovngarde beckons, every one of us dies!
String.Dest: 我们是天际的子民，我们一辈子都在战斗，只要松加德传来召唤，我们就英勇赴义。

String.Source: Now you'll pay!
String.Dest: 付出代价吧！

String.Source: Victory is yours! Do what you must.
String.Dest: 胜利是你的！去履行义务吧！

String.Source: My old friend Arnwulf would agree. He wasn't like Indrel, who loved to count our spoils, or Bodan, who favored the glory over the gold.
String.Dest: 我的老朋友阿恩武夫会同意的。他不像英卓尔，老是惦记着我们的赃物，或是波登，把荣誉看得比金子还金贵。

String.Source: Wisps, drawn to that cemetery. Seems like it's them or us. And I don't know about you, traveler, but this is the last place I want to be buried.
String.Dest: 幽魂，也被这墓地吸引了。看来他们跟我们都一样。我不知道你是怎么想的，旅行者，但这是我想要最后被埋葬的地方。

String.Source: I told her the boy was twice as smart as Arnwulf, and three times the man! She laughed so hard the ale spit out of her ass.
String.Dest: 我跟她说那个男孩儿比阿恩武夫还要聪明两倍，比起那个男人更是聪明三倍！她笑得那么厉害，麦芽酒都顺着她的屁股流了下来。

String.Source: For people who've vowed to spend the rest of their lives as mutes, it'll make for a fitting gift.
String.Dest: 对于那些许下誓言要一辈子保持缄默的人们来说，这是个合适的礼物。

String.Source: Sovngarde or not, Kodlak will always be with you. That's what it means to be a company. That's what it means to be family.
String.Dest: 不论生死与否，克拉科会一直在你身边陪伴你。这就是一名同伴的意味。这就是一个家人的意味。

String.Source: Orgnar!
String.Dest: 奥格那！

String.Source: Excellent. I think you'll be glad that you made this decision.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我想你会庆幸你做了这个决定。

String.Source: Watch your step, traveler. Looks like that note about the traps wasn't lying.
String.Dest: 注意脚下，旅行者。看起来这本笔记上写的陷阱不是空穴来风。

String.Source: I'm beginning to think this city's Argonian population is wherever we happen to be standing.
String.Dest: 我开始觉得，这个城市的亚龙人总数……也就是你面前站着的的亚龙人的全部数量了……

String.Source: (Laughs)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: I think I'm going to get another drink.
String.Dest: 我想我要再喝一杯。

String.Source: Right behind you.
String.Dest: 我紧随在后。

String.Source: I'll probably head back to Morthal myself. But whether it's here or there, you have my steel. Now, there's just more of it to have!
String.Dest: 我会自己回到莫萨尔去的。但无论在哪，我的剑都与你同在。而现在，你还有更多的事要做。

String.Source: One will steal your coin purse, the other will steal your weekend! (Laughs) But in all seriousness traveler, be careful around the Redguard.
String.Dest: 有人会偷你的钱包，而有人则会偷走你的周末！（笑声）不过说真的，旅行者，小心堤防着点周围的红卫人。

String.Source: I no longer have to mourn the person I was. I can spend the rest of my life celebrating who I am. And I couldn't have done it without you.
String.Dest: 我不会再自怨自艾了。我会穷尽我的一生为自己的身份而骄傲。是你让我有了如此大的转变。

String.Source: An old friend? Well, I think we can rule out Arnwulf. This person's knowledge of the alphabet goes beyond the letter "C."
String.Dest: 一个老朋友？呃，我想我们可以排除阿恩武夫。这个人认识的字母表绝比字母 "C"要靠后。

String.Source: How's that steel coming along, smith? Is it ready?
String.Dest: 那钢玩意是从哪来的，锻造出来的？已经准备好了吗？

String.Source: They ambushed our camp one night when the mist was thick. Skilled warriors with poison-tipped spears. The others fought them off as best they could.
String.Dest: 在那个雾气蒙蒙的夜晚，他们伏击了我们的营地。老练的战士们将长矛涂上毒药。其他人尽他们所能的赶走了那些人。

String.Source: (Laughs) I imagine it was. Some might say that's Dark Brotherhood talk, but those people never suffered a loss. Vengeance is sweeter than moon sugar.
String.Dest: (笑声)我猜是的。一些人可能觉得这是黑暗兄弟才会说的话，但那是因为这些人从未遭受过什么损失。复仇可是比月亮糖更加甜蜜的东西。

String.Source: They all laughed. All except Dalum-Ei. He walked up to me, shook my hand and said, "Welcome."
String.Dest: 他们都放声大笑。除了达卢姆艾。他走到我面前，握着我的手说，“欢迎回来。”

String.Source: Can't do it.
String.Dest: 我做不到。

String.Source: This death cannot go unavenged, traveler. Take the fight to the Silver Hand. Fight bravely, and fight well.
String.Dest: 这些人不能白白死去，旅行者。跟银手战斗吧。英勇战斗，把他们全都干翻！

String.Source: The truth was I was never supposed to be there. I had found the invitation on a courier while traveling west toward Gideon.
String.Dest: 事实是我从来没有去过那里。当我向西往吉德昂那里走的时候，我就收到了一个信使捎过来的邀请。

String.Source: (Laughs) Am I the only one who thinks an army of skeevers would make perfect sense? They're like fleshflies. They breed fast, and feed fast.
String.Dest: (笑声)我是唯一一个意识到雪鼠军队的设想讲得通的人吗？它们就像肉蝇一样，吃的快，生的快。

String.Source: Thane of the Reach. You're quite the social climber. But don't go trading your sword away for a crown. You'll regret it.
String.Dest: 瑞驰的男爵。你确实是个趋炎附势的人。但别为了个王冠就用你的剑去交换。你会后悔的。

String.Source: (Laughs) You remind me of myself. There wasn't a trap alive I couldn't swing my way out of.
String.Dest: (笑声)你让我想起了我自己。没有一个陷阱是我不能大摇大摆活着走出来的。

String.Source: These days, I'm just glad I have someone to laugh with. So traveler, thanks for listening.
String.Dest: 这些天，我很高兴自己把一些人逗笑了。所以旅行者，感谢聆听。

String.Source: I have nothing to say to you. Now move along, or I'll order my guards to attack.
String.Dest: 我没什么和你说的了。现在快走开，不然我叫人来撵你。

String.Source: I am, and I'm not. It's different when we're all working together...I get that old feeling...like the Gods and the Hist are on our side.
String.Dest: 我是，而我又不是。不同的是当我们一起干活儿时……我老感觉……众神和希斯特是站在我们这边的。

String.Source: I committed myself to killing a feather serpent. On the second night, I thought, I'd vanquish three. By the first hour, my only goal was to survive.
String.Dest: 我决心要亲自杀死一条翎羽蛇。在第二晚，我感觉以一敌三不是问题。但在跟它对上的第一个小时，我所想的只有活下去。

String.Source: I'm sure it will. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我相信它会的。谢谢你。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开}

String.Source: You sure this mage can find his way out? Maybe we should leave him something to eat besides his toes!
String.Dest: 你确定这法师能找到自己的出路？也许我们应该给他留点儿东西吃，别让他光啃自己的脚趾！

String.Source: I bet they do. If I were Klimmek though, I'd probably sneak in a bottle of liquor every now and then.
String.Dest: 我打赌就是他们做的。虽然如果我是科林麦的话，我大概会不时地偷拿几瓶烈酒。

String.Source: I'm not sure that it's news, but lately it seems like every blacksmith in Skyrim is out to prove that he's the equal of Eorlund Gray-Mane.
String.Dest: 我不知道这还算不算新闻，最近好像天际所有的铁匠都想证明自己跟厄伦德·灰鬃不相上下。

String.Source: Ha! Then let me make sure you carve it correctly. I apologize for giving you such a hard time. But you adventurers make such easy targets.
String.Dest: (笑声) 然后让我确保你正确的切开了它。很抱歉让你这么犯难。但你们冒险家这样做还是挺容易的。

String.Source: I couldn't have said it better myself. It's been some time since I've had news from elsewhere in Skyrim. What have you heard?
String.Dest: 我想不出比它再好的了。我上次听到天际其他地方的消息已经是很久以前了。你听说什么了？

String.Source: If she promises to show up soon, it could mean anywhere between now and the end of days. I think it's safer not to wait.
String.Dest: 如果她承诺很快出现，这意味着从现在到世界末日都有可能。我感觉还是别去等她比较靠谱儿。

String.Source: In any case, we can head straight west from here. Once we hit the mountain, just look for the columns with the eagle heads.
String.Dest: 在任何情况下，我们可以直接从这里向西。一旦我们爬上了山，就去找那些刻有鹰首的柱子。

String.Source: He loved the way your palms sweat before a fight and how your blood boils during it. He basked in the roar of a battlecry as it echoed in your chest.
String.Dest: 他爱死了你战斗前那汗湿的手掌，以及从你掌心传来的热血沸腾的感觉。他沉浸在从你胸膛中喷涌而出的战吼怒涛中无法自拔。

String.Source: Why?
String.Dest: 为什么？

String.Source: I understand.
String.Dest: 我明白了。

String.Source: What did I tell you, priest? Go where the action is. It never fails.
String.Dest: 牧师，我怎么说的？去参加那个行动。不会失败的。

String.Source: So we can't rule out anything. Believe me, I've made that mistake far too many times than I care to count.
String.Dest: 所以我们还不能排除任何东西。相信我，我在此之前犯过的那种错误已经多到我懒得去数了。

String.Source: He was a harsh and demanding leader, but he had to be. It was the only way I'd listen.
String.Dest: 作为一个领袖，他太严厉而苛刻了，但他必须得成为这种领袖。只有这样他说的话我才会听。

String.Source: Call me crazy, but I think the music is making him angrier!
String.Dest: 说我是疯子，但我认为这音乐才是让他发怒的罪魁祸首！

String.Source: I am yours to command.
String.Dest: 我听从你的指挥。

String.Source: Go where the challenge is greatest.
String.Dest: 到最有挑战性的地方去。

String.Source: Let's go back to Morthal. If this Baron isn't responsible, maybe Bodan knows who is.
String.Dest: 咱们回墨索尔城吧。如果这个男爵不负责，也许波登知道该谁负责的。

String.Source: Well, they do say vampires are animals. So it makes sense that they live like dogs.
String.Dest: 好吧，人们都说吸血鬼是动物的一种。难怪他们活得跟狗似的。

String.Source: You've bested me!
String.Dest: 你的确有两下子！

String.Source: No.
String.Dest: 不。

String.Source: The throne room's ahead. Be ready, traveler. This Vokun sounds tough, but if we fight as one, no single foe can defeat us.
String.Dest: 正殿就在前头。准备好咯，旅行者。要打败沃昆听起来很困难，但只要我们同心协力，就没人能战胜我们。

String.Source: Sometimes, walking through these caves, my eyes show me images of that orphaned boy. Why do Falmer have to skulk about like children?
String.Dest: 当我在洞穴中行走时，我眼前的景象总会让我想起某个孤儿。为什么雪精灵要像孩子一样蹑手蹑脚地四处走动呢？

String.Source: Just in case what? This Giant ends up using one of us as a backscratcher? No wonder you want a lizard by your side!
String.Dest: 万一什么？这个巨人最终把我们当中的一个作为他的痒痒挠？难怪你要一个蜥蜴在你身边！

String.Source: Give up while you still can!
String.Dest: 趁你还有反悔的机会，投降吧！

String.Source: Fine with me. Magic spells I don't really get, but sticking a sword in someone's belly makes sense to me.
String.Dest: 我无所谓。魔法啦咒语啦我是真的搞不明白，但是把剑插进别人肚子里什么的我还是可以理解的。

String.Source: The Companions already have a long history. We were trying to make one.
String.Dest: 战友团已经有很长一段历史，我们也曾试过去创造一段历史。

String.Source: Yet for all its rage and defiance, in the end, what I hear most is sadness. That's what the Hist heard too, and what moved them to listen.
String.Dest: 到现在他所有的愤怒与反抗，我最后听到最多的是悲伤。希斯特也听到了，这也是使他们去倾听的动力。

String.Source: It's not really a fair comparison, if you ask me.
String.Dest: 要我说，这根本没有可比性。

String.Source: This is a large barrow, traveler. I suggest we start with the catacombs.
String.Dest: 这座墓很大，旅行者。我建议我们先从陵寝开始吧。

String.Source: Is that humility, or false modesty? Or maybe you've been picking too many deathbells!
String.Dest: 这是谦卑，还是假惺惺的客气？或者可能是你摘了太多死亡丧钟！

String.Source: But who knows, you might enjoy milling around with Elenwen and her flock of nobles. Just make it out safe, and then you can tell me what I missed.
String.Dest: 但是谁知道呢，也许你会享受在爱琳温以及她的那些贵客之间转来转去。确保你能安全地从那里出来，然后你才能告诉我我都错过了些什么。

String.Source: By the Hist! Now that's impressive.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！真是叫人印象深刻。

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 嘿！够了！已经结束了！

String.Source: I suppose not. But I hold out hope that somewhere out there, there are people who speak my name with the same reverence as a real one.
String.Dest: (笑声)我想不是。但是我心怀希望世界某处，有人带着尊敬感地说出我的名号，如同我就在他眼前。

String.Source: All that's left now is deciding on where to live.
String.Dest: 剩下的就是决定生活在哪里。

String.Source: So did Bodan, at first. But that didn't stop us from doing everything we could to change his mind.
String.Dest: 一开始，波登也是。但这并不能阻止我们尝试改变他的想法。

String.Source: What in the world?
String.Dest: 搞什么？

String.Source: Bodan! What are you doing here?
String.Dest: 波登! 你怎么会在这里？

String.Source: (Laughs) Look at that shelf. The Short Life of Uriel Septim? Who does this Orc think he's fooling? No one reads this drivel.
String.Dest: (笑声) 看那个架子，尤里尔·赛普丁短暂的一生？是谁让这个兽人认为他在自作聪明？没有人理解了这段胡言乱语的话。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: It wasn't. But Dalum-Ei founded the company to be good, and do good. To wash all the grime that stuck in his scales during the war.
String.Dest: 不是这样的。但达卢姆艾觉得有人陪伴是不错的，并且我看也是这样。至少在战争时有人能够帮你洗掉鳞片间的血污。

String.Source: Legend says Dwarven ruins are haunted. I guess there's only one way to find out.
String.Dest: 据传锻莫遗迹在闹鬼。我认为只有一种方法来证实这些说法是不是谣言。

String.Source: Khajiit will follow.
String.Dest: 虎人会跟着。

String.Source: My old company friend, Bodan, was driven by it. He spent his entire life in Black Marsh hunting the Argonian who slew his love.
String.Dest: 我的老朋友，波登，他就是为此而活的。他在黑沼泽省度过了一生，只为搜寻那个杀掉了他爱人的亚龙人。

String.Source: And it's all thanks to you. I may have learned to fight on my own, but being a knight isn't just about swinging a sword.
String.Dest: 我得为这一切感谢你。也许我已学会战斗方法，但是光是会挥剑可是成不了骑士的。

String.Source: You are perceptive. You have the makings of a great leader. Yes, I misled the three of you earlier when I said I could not find Indrel.
String.Dest: 你的感知很敏锐，战友。你有领导者的必备素质。是的，之前当我说我找不到英卓尔的时候，我误导了你们。

String.Source: A thief spends their whole life breaking those things. A knight spends their entire life defending them.
String.Dest: 一个小偷耗尽一生要破坏的的东西，也是一个骑士奉献一生要守护的东西。

String.Source: Indrel...well, she ignored her, but Indrel ignored everyone.
String.Dest: 英卓尔……呃，她无视了她，但是英卓尔无视了所有人。

String.Source: It looks like this one was frozen in place, and the other 2 tried to run. What would scare a pair of trained Legionnaires? An unwashed uniform?
String.Dest: 看起来这家伙冻死在这里了，而其他两个正在试图逃跑。到底是什么东西把这几个善战退伍老兵吓成这样？多年未洗的臭制服吗？

String.Source: That's why Dalum-Ei used to always remind me...youth fades. Every day your swing gets a little heavier, your feet a little slower.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么达卢姆艾总是提醒我……青春易逝。每一天，你的步伐都会慢一点儿，你的脚也会沉重一点儿。

String.Source: I didn't even think. My company looked to me. They trusted me. And I knew then, it didn't matter how many of them were waiting for me in that mist.
String.Dest: 我甚至想都没想。我的伙伴注视着我。他们信任我。那时我就觉得，不管这雾中有多少敌人在等着我也没关系。

String.Source: You must be a Stormcloak through and through to request that one.
String.Dest: 你一定是风暴斗篷的人吧，不然不会点这首歌的。

String.Source: If they're going to fight, it'd be somewhere they were both comfortable. The marsh. It has to be there!
String.Dest: 如果他们要干架，有个地方他俩肯定都满意。就是那片沼泽。它就在那儿！

String.Source: Sometimes I feel like this boy, he's the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to make sure he's safe.
String.Dest: 有时，我觉得，这个男孩，是我们最后一点荣耀。我得陪着他确保安全。

String.Source: Come on!
String.Dest: 上啊！

String.Source: Agreed. And while I had some anxiety joining such an esteemed company, I quickly discovered that I indeed belonged.
String.Dest: 没错。当我加入这样一个仰慕已久的组织时我有些紧张，但很快我就明白我真的是这里的一员了。

String.Source: Ha, I don't think Elia would've wanted him around either! Males grow squeamish at the mere talk of children, let alone the sight of one.
String.Dest: (笑声)哈，我可不觉着伊利亚喜欢他在身边转悠！仅仅是单纯的谈论孩子都会让男人变得过于拘谨，更别说是看见一个孩子了。

String.Source: No!
String.Dest: 不！

String.Source: I don't know about breaking into this estate, but killing a band of sellswords sounds like something I'd approve of.
String.Dest: 我并不了解闯入房子的后果，但是消灭一队佣兵倒是我乐意的。

String.Source: A copy of the Lusty Argonian Maid? (Laughs) I knew Mercer was giving me dirty looks, but I didn't know just how dirty!
String.Dest: 一本《元气满满的亚龙人女仆》？(笑声) 我知道墨瑟一直都在给我塞小黄书，不过没想到这淫棍口重到这个份上！

String.Source: It might've been different if he hadn't adopted Agni. That part just hit too close to home.
String.Dest: 如果他没接受阿格尼就不一样了。那部分恰恰击中了要害。

String.Source: There's a big one! What do you think they feed it? The easy answer is adventurers, but who knows! Maybe magic spiders need a special diet.
String.Dest: 那边有个超大的！你觉得他们是吃什么长大的？最可能是冒险者，但谁知道呢！或许这些魔法蜘蛛需要特殊的菜单。

String.Source: You lead, I'll follow.
String.Dest: 你带路，我跟着你。

String.Source: If the Greybeards say it it's one thing, but I trust you to know the difference between peace and indifference.
String.Dest: 尽管灰胡子说这是同样的东西，但我相信你明白与世无争与漠不关心之间的差别在哪。

String.Source: Giants! You must want me dead, taking me to a place like this. Well, today's as good a day as any.
String.Dest: 巨人！带我来一个这样的地方，你肯定很想要我死。好吧，今天的确是个好日子。

String.Source: The clan said a hatchling had gone missing, and rumors were abound of corpses stolen for experiments, and live bodies turned into corpses.
String.Dest: 这个氏族说小孩子下落不明了。于是尸体被偷走用于实验，或者将活人转换成死尸之类的谣言开始疯传。

String.Source: You've got to admire their courage, doing something like that with dragons on the loose and a war going on.
String.Dest: 你不得不佩服他们的勇气，能在有龙出没，战争横行的时候在外面闯荡。

String.Source: Son of a...
String.Dest: 婊子……养的

String.Source: In truth, I only came to Skyrim to rid myself of that urchin. Now that I'm here, maybe I'll adventure for a bit.
String.Dest: 是真的，我来天际省只是为了历练。现在我到了，也许我该来点小冒险。

String.Source: What's the rush? I say we let a couple more Thalmor get down here before we get bored.
String.Dest: 你急什么？我是说在我们厌倦之前，总得放倒几个梭默吧。

String.Source: Ula-Wei was our scout, and by tradition he always went first. But when he placed his feet on that desert sand...
String.Dest: 乌拉卫曾是我们的侦查员，按习惯他总是在前。但是当他把脚踩上沙漠时……

String.Source: Look, I don't know if saving this boy is the smart thing. But it's the right thing, and as mortals, that's all we can ever do.
String.Dest: 听着，我不知道拯救那个男孩是不是明智的决定。但这是正确的决定，而且作为普通人，那也是我们力所能及的事。

String.Source: I guess you don't have potatoes in your ears after all. Just make sure we get a fresh batch in soon.
String.Dest: 看来你耳朵没被塞住。尽快给我们弄一批新鲜的来吧。

String.Source: But in all seriousness, I don't know if saving this boy is the smart thing. But it's the right thing, and as mortals, that's all we can ever do.
String.Dest: 但是认真的讲，我不知道救下这个男孩是不是一件聪明事，但这一定是一件对的事。作为一个凡人，这是我们所能做的全部了。

String.Source: Our hero, our hero, claims a warrior's heart.
String.Dest: 英雄，英雄，勇者无惧。

String.Source: Some say the ship suffered damage to her hull when she struck an iceberg, and Captain Safia can't afford the repairs.
String.Dest: 有人说船撞上了冰山，船体受损，而萨非亚船长付不起维修费。

String.Source: Ah, don't be so hard on yourself! I used to think Skyrim was nothing but snow and werewolves. But there's trolls too.
String.Dest: 啊，不要对自己要求太严格！我曾经认为天际省只有雪和狼人。但现在看来这还有巨魔。

String.Source: Welcome back, love. How many bandits did you kill today?
String.Dest: 欢迎回家，亲爱的。你今天又杀了多少强盗啊？

String.Source: The Vigil will be watching you.
String.Dest: 守夜人会注视着你的。

String.Source: Damn that Thalmor. But this isn't over. I swear by the Hist, he won't win.
String.Dest: 该死的梭默。但事儿还没完。以希斯特的名义起誓，他赢不了。

String.Source: That's what they say.
String.Dest: 据说是这样的。

String.Source: That's a long way down. But it isn't the fall that kills you, and it isn't even the ground. It's the trolls!
String.Dest: 下到这儿来可是很长一段路。但并不是那条瀑布致你于死地的，甚至也不是这块地面，杀了你的是巨魔！

String.Source: You're a talker, eh?
String.Dest: 你挺能说的啊，对吧？

String.Source: Dalum-Ei assured him he would get his vengeance. That was his condition for joining the Honorable Eight. It was a promise I wish he kept.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾向他保证他复仇成功的。这也是他加入神圣八人众的条件。我希望他一直继续这个承诺。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你需要什么？

String.Source: You think you can best me, Orc?
String.Dest: 你以为可以打败我吗，兽人？

String.Source: Mixing torchbugs and skeever hides is a quick way to restore stamina. That must be why the Nords have so much energy. No shortage of rats.
String.Dest: 将雪鼠皮与火虫混合出的东西能够快速地恢复体力。所以诺德人才会如此地精力旺盛，他们那儿从来不缺老鼠。

String.Source: He started to wobble, and his tail lashed recklessly against the sand. I couldn't believe my eyes. He was struggling for balance!
String.Dest: 他开始摇晃，他的尾巴鲁莽地摇摆着，企图对抗沙子。我简直无法相信我的眼睛，他居然努力想保持平衡！

String.Source: Drink up, my boy! Drink to those who have fallen! May their souls find their way to Sovngarde!
String.Dest: 喝吧，兄弟们！敬那些死去的人！愿他们的灵魂能找到去松加德的路。

String.Source: It seems this Dunmer took half the Draugr in this crypt with him to the void. How selfish of him.
String.Dest: 看起来这个黑精灵杀了地穴里一半的尸鬼，太自私了，也不给我留一点。

String.Source: Arnwulf always waxed poetic about his homeland, but he didn't do Skyrim justice. Probably because Arnwulf was a terrible speaker!
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫总是试图吹嘘和粉饰太平，可是他没有给天际省带来和平，他不过是个喷子而已！

String.Source: And if they don't drink it, it'll be our secret stash. Well, so long as we stick to ale and beer. I never liked Nord mead.
String.Dest: 假使他们没有喝掉它，那就让它成为我们的小秘密。所以我们只要忠于我们的麦芽酒和啤酒就好了。我就没喜欢过诺德蜜酒。

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: These bandits should be thanking us! By the looks of these barrels, if we hadn't come along they would've starved to death!
String.Dest: 这些强盗应该感谢我们！从这些桶来看，如果我们不一起来的话他们就会被饿死！

String.Source: Well, I did hear that the Argonians have been banned from living inside the walls of Windhelm.
String.Dest: 我听说他们禁止亚龙人住在风盔城里。

String.Source: So, they've made you master of this motley band of misfits. Say what you will about these thieves, but they know a leader when they see one.
String.Dest: 所以，你已经成了这帮乌合之众的头子。不管你怎么看这帮盗贼，在他们看见一个领导人的时候总还是能认出来的。

String.Source: The Dwemer spent all this time building spiders. Maybe it was the spiders that did them in.
String.Dest: 锻莫们花了他们的全部时间来制造机械蜘蛛。也许就是这些机械蜘蛛造成了他们的消失。

String.Source: It's a long story.
String.Dest: 说来话长。

String.Source: It's alright, young traveler. I used to think people in Skyrim rode giant sleds pulled by wolves!
String.Dest: 很好，旅行者，我曾经以为天际省的人坐狼拉雪橇呢。

String.Source: You speak to a Vigilant of Stendarr. Cavort with any Daedra, and we will hunt you down.
String.Dest: 你正在和一位斯丹达尔的守备人说话。只要你胆敢与魔族为伍，我们就要消灭你。

String.Source: Only true Imperials request that one.
String.Dest: 只有帝国人才点这首歌。

String.Source: True enough. The name came when I joined a company of fighters, many of whom were celebrated warriors from all over Tamriel.
String.Dest: 对的，当我加入一队勇士的时候想起了这个名字，他们很多都是泰姆瑞尔有名的战士。

String.Source: The what?
String.Dest: 你说什么？

String.Source: Hjaalmarch can hardly be called a marsh. What kind of marsh doesn't have fleshflies and green slime?
String.Dest: 希雅陲领几乎不能被称为沼泽，什么样的沼泽才会没有苍蝇和绿色的稀泥？

String.Source: I thank you, traveler. Your words are kind. Still, to some we were traitors, and it wasn't long before they made their feelings known.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，旅行者，你的话语很温暖。不过对于某些人来说我们就是叛徒，并且这种情绪出现的时间可不长。

String.Source: Argh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: If this ass-drinker of a Jarl wants a sword dipped in Daedric blood, he ought to find a Daedra and stab it himself!
String.Dest: 如果窝囊废领主想血溅魔族，那他得自己去找个魔族自己下手。

String.Source: These hunters weren't killed. They were sacrificed. Move with caution, traveler, I don't like this one bit.
String.Dest: 这些猎人不是被杀的。他们是被献祭的。小心行事，旅行者。我一点儿也不喜欢这种事。

String.Source: Arnwulf was a Nord. And like all sons and daughters of Skyrim, he cared only for battle.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫是个诺德人。像所有天际的儿女一样，他只在乎战斗。

String.Source: The Mercy of Stendarr does not extend to Daedra worshippers.
String.Dest: 斯丹达尔的怜悯是绝不会降临到魔族崇拜者的身上的。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei never told us who the conjurer was. But according to him, Moon-Tail had already told us countless times.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾从未告诉我们那个巫师是谁。但是，据他所说，月尾已经跟我们提起无数次了。

String.Source: Wasn't Helgen turned into rubble? Seeing that probably would've impressed me!
String.Dest: 海尔根不是变成一堆废墟了吗？光是看看备不住就能留给我深刻的印象！

String.Source: Strange. What kind of fool goes into a Draugr crpyt by his lonesome and leaves the muscle behind?
String.Dest: 奇怪。什么样的呆子才会因为孤单而不带任何护卫就闯到尸鬼的地穴里？

String.Source: All these puzzles and traps make it nearly impossible to get to that ledge from below. Of course, you could just drop in from above.
String.Dest: 所有的这些谜题和陷阱使得从下面到达那个窗台成为一件几乎不可能的事情。当然，你可以想个办法从高处掉到窗台上。

String.Source: Following.
String.Dest: 我跟着。

String.Source: A Falmer hive. The Hist demands justice. Let's not let any of these eyeless freaks smell tomorrow.
String.Dest: 一个雪精灵的聚居地。历史终须公义，让我们把这帮瞎子都给收拾了吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) You sure you two haven't been sniffing deathbells?
String.Dest: (笑) 你们俩确定自己不是被丧钟花呛了个半死么？

String.Source: Not at all. I am sorry, I misled the three of you earlier, when I said I could not find Indrel.
String.Dest: 没关系，战友，抱歉，之前当我说我找不到英卓尔的时候，我误导了你们。

String.Source: Oh, before I forget, here. Someone handed me this bottle of mead. I prefer ale, so here you go. Find it a good home.
String.Dest: 哦，趁我还记得，拿着这个。有人给了我这瓶蜜酒，但其实我想要的是麦芽酒来着。所以说拿着它吧，好好地对待它。

String.Source: So Gulum-Ei is a fence now? You've got to hand it to the thieves. They won't let an attempt to destroy their guild keep them from hiring you.
String.Dest: 这么说古鲁姆·埃现在是个销赃人？你现在不得不表扬下那些盗贼们。他们不会让一个尝试破坏他们行会对你的雇佣关系。

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: So we part ways once more, traveler. Next time you come back to the Rift, ask for the lizard in mourning.
String.Dest: 所以我们再次分手吧，旅行者。下次回裂谷城的时候，记得去找哀悼的蜥蜴。

String.Source: Thank you, traveler. Even if we don't find the boy, it'll be worth the trip to clear that place of bandits.
String.Dest: 感谢你，旅行者。就算我们没有找到男孩，这一次清扫强盗的旅程仍是有意义的。

String.Source: Of course, she would never admit such a thing. Captain Safia is far too proud a woman for that.
String.Dest: 当然，她永远不会承认的。萨非亚船长的骄傲不允许她承认。

String.Source: The wench here doesn't have a great voice, but she has personality. All the charm in Tamriel couldn't save Lurbuk though!
String.Dest: 这个姑娘没有优美的嗓音，但是她很有个性。即使是泰姆瑞尔大陆上的所有魔法也不能让卢布克清醒起来。

String.Source: Be ready, traveler. There'll likely be more Draugr inside. Necromancers are too cowardly to fight on their own.
String.Dest: 做好准备，旅行者。这里面大概有更多的尸鬼。亡灵术士们都很懦弱以至于他们都不敢亲自上阵去战斗。

String.Source: But I don't blame you for having bad memories of that place. For me, it was that cave all over again.
String.Dest: 但是我不为了那个有着糟糕回忆的地方儿怪你。对于我来说，这是那个洞穴的重演。

String.Source: For all he did, and all he put me through, I still forgive him. More than that, I understand him. All he ever wanted was to be clean.
String.Dest: 因为他所做的一切，以及所有他帮助我的，我还是原谅了他。更重要的是，我了解他。所有他所想要的是变得正派。

String.Source: Go ahead. I'm listening.
String.Dest: 继续说吧。我听着呢。

String.Source: By the Hist! The Nords can build a stage. Best of all, unlike in the Marsh, the creeks and waterfalls here aren't filled with tar.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！这些诺德人竟然能建一座竞技场。最重要的是，这里的溪流和瀑布不像沼泽那样充满沥青。

String.Source: Well traveler, now I think I've seen just about everything. How do you suppose they buried the ones at the top? I never knew Nords to be acrobats!
String.Dest: 好吧旅行者，现在我觉得我已经看清一切了。你怎么会觉得是他们烧掉了顶上的那些呢？我可没听说过诺德裔的杂耍演员啊！

String.Source: Under the authority of Mara, the Divine of Love, I declare this couple to be wed.
String.Dest: 在玛拉和圣灵的见证下，我宣布这对情侣结为夫妇。

String.Source: There's danger ahead, but it looks like this way's the back door. Might be able to catch the bandits napping.
String.Dest: 前面有危险，不过看来这条路是后门。或许可以打强盗们个措手不及。

String.Source: There were visitors. In fact, every few years a recruiter from the city would come to the village and conscript those in the clan who showed promise.
String.Dest: 曾经这里有很多旅行者. 事实上, 每隔几年，从城市的招聘人员会来村里，并征召那些显露才华的氏族成员.

String.Source: And a sensitive one at that! But take heart, traveler, in the knowledge that we Argonians are the beasts.
String.Dest: 一个敏感的家伙！ 既已知道我们亚龙人是野兽，旅行者，振作起来。

String.Source: This looks like a spider den, but spiders don't attack caravans. Let's press forward. Maybe one of these adventurers managed to survive.
String.Dest: 这看起来就像个蜘蛛巢穴，但蜘蛛是不会攻击篷车的。让我们走近看一看，说不定还有些冒险者在里面挣扎求生。

String.Source: No, you go on and see this Thane back to his home. Maybe when you're finished, you'll find your way back here, and we'll look together.
String.Dest: 不，你去盯着那个男爵回到他的家里。也许在你完成任务后，你会找到回来的路，然后我们再一起看。

String.Source: Sure. What do you need?
String.Dest: 当然，你需要什么？

String.Source: I'm sorry, mage, but the boy's coming with us. We're going to take him to the orphanage.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，魔法师，但这个男孩得跟我们走，我们要带他去孤儿院。

String.Source: I can hear you, you know...
String.Dest: 我听得见你在说什么，你知道么……

String.Source: So Lurbuk's finally dead. I knew I should've cut out his tongue. Might've saved his life!
String.Dest: 所以卢布克终于死了。我就知道应该把他的舌头割下来。说不定那么做能救他的命！

String.Source: Are you sure?
String.Dest: 你确定？

String.Source: Maybe for an adventurer that sounds like a paradise. But for a child without a voice, it's anything but.
String.Dest: 也许对于一个探险家来说那听起来像是是天堂。但是对于一个无法说话的小孩子来说，那就另当别论了。

String.Source: You're right. But if nothing else, you've given me hope that my crimes can be atoned for. Maybe not today, but someday down the road.
String.Dest: 你是对的。但是没有别的东西的话，你已经给了我赎罪的希望。或许不是今天，而是之后的某一天。

String.Source: What is it now?
String.Dest: 又怎么了？

String.Source: They won't, not after you tell them he's dead. As for any "incidents," you let me worry about that.
String.Dest: 他们不会的，至少不会在你告诉了他们他的死讯之后。对于任何“事故”，你让我担心了。

String.Source: So that priestess, and I use the term loosely, wants us to kidnap a child to be her new leader. This is going to go over real well with the family.
String.Dest: 结果女祭司跟我把那个词说的那么轻而易举，她希望我们绑架一个孩子成为她的新领袖。而这可不会给孩子的家人留下什么好印象。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on all this?
String.Dest: 你对这一切怎么看？

String.Source: I once tried wielding a blade of orichalcum. Never could get used to the weight.
String.Dest: 我曾经摆弄过一柄黑铜剑。根本习惯不了它那重量。

String.Source: It was an Imperial boy, hiding in a small crevice in the rock. I didn't know who he was, or if he was even with the refugees. The boy was a mute.
String.Dest: 那是一个帝国的男孩儿，躲在一道窄小的石头缝里。我不知道他是谁，以及他到底是不是跟那些难民在一起。那男孩儿是个哑巴。

String.Source: I saw how on bright days, the lizard used the hackwing's own shadow to scuttle around unseen, and how on dark days all creatures clung to the mist.
String.Dest: 我目睹过, 光明的日子里，蜥蜴如何在刀翼的阴影里消失，阴暗的日子里，万物如何在霭霭的迷雾中依存。

String.Source: Yeah, one of them might actually smile! (Laughs) But I suppose if they did find their way down the mountain, they might cause a little havoc.
String.Dest: 是啊，他们中没准真有人能笑出来！（笑声）但是我认为他们如果真的找到下山的路的话，他们可能会引起一场灾难。

String.Source: All these goons and locked doors must make this bandit feel real safe. But as of right now, his ransoming days are over.
String.Dest: 上锁的门和住在一起的狐朋狗友让这些土匪感觉相当安全。但是到此为止了。他们打家劫舍的日子到头了。

String.Source: Liar!
String.Dest: 骗子！

String.Source: What chivalry! Perhaps you'll also fetch me a bib, so that I don't stain my tunic when I vomit at your words.
String.Dest: 多么强大的骑士精神！也许你该给我个围兜，那样的话当我因为你话吐了的时候就不会弄脏自己的外衣了。

String.Source: Ha! Don't worry traveler, I meant no offense. There are simply so many bandits here in Skyrim, and such few persons of character.
String.Dest: 哈！别担心旅行者，我无意冒犯。天际省这里有很多强盗，基本上像你这种人不多……

String.Source: And so then came the clashing and slashing of steel, as the brave lass Matilda charged in full of zeal!
String.Dest: 一阵金属碰撞叮叮当当，勇敢的女孩玛提尔达战意高涨！

String.Source: So he was finally able to let go.
String.Dest: 所以他最后终于得以解脱了。

String.Source: I wouldn't expect anything less.
String.Dest: 我不会期待事情变得更糟的。

String.Source: But it wasn't until I woke up a blacksmith in the middle of the night and demanded my blade that Dalum-Ei pulled me aside.
String.Dest: 但直到我深更半夜摇醒一个铁匠向他要我的剑时，达卢姆艾才把我拉到一边。

String.Source: Gods strike you down.
String.Dest: 诸神会诅咒你的。

String.Source: Well then, by the Hist, maybe they're both wrong. Either way, we have to find them before they do something stupid.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上，那么也许他们都错了。无论如何，我们都必须在他们做出什么傻事儿之前找到他们。

String.Source: If I joined the Legion, I might've ended up a dog like this Halfhand character. It seems those old recruiters did me a favor!
String.Dest: 如果我加入帝国军团，也许我就不会再被当做没有爪子的狗了，看起来那些老兵帮了我一个忙啊。

String.Source: You can't win this!
String.Dest: 就你这两下子还想获胜?！

String.Source: Truth be told, it was always going to be in death.
String.Dest: 说实话，它总是得迈向死亡。

String.Source: Now that was a fight! Dragons bursting from the earth, mages lurking in the corners. I don't know about you, but I can't wait to see what's next.
String.Dest: 那战斗可是惊天地泣鬼神啊！巨龙们破土而出，奥术师埋伏在角落里。我不了解你，但我等不及想看看接下来要发生什么了。

String.Source: Kill a few Draugr, solve a few puzzles...you know, we might be getting the hang of this adventurer thing!
String.Dest: 杀几只尸鬼，解几个谜语……你知道的，也许我们就能找到当冒险者的窍门儿了！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 喝呀！

String.Source: I think I can see that old tree from here. We're a long way from Morthal, traveler, and a long way from home.
String.Dest: 我想我可以在这看到那颗老树,我们离莫萨尔城还有很长一段路要走，旅行者，并且我们离家还有很长的一段路。

String.Source: Old ruins. Nordic, by the looks of it.
String.Dest: 从外观上能看出来，这是座古代的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: First time I came to Ivarstead everyone assumed I was a pilgrim. Ha! What marsh lizard wants to climb a mountain? The thin air doesn't suit our kind.
String.Dest: 我第一次来紫杉镇的时候，人人都以为我是个朝圣者。哈！什么样的沼泽蜥蜴才会想去爬山啊？稀薄的空气可不适合我们。

String.Source: Ready to get moving?
String.Dest: 准备好出发了吗？

String.Source: You'll fit in because you have a strong will, and strong character.
String.Dest: 你会适应的，因为你有着坚强的意志和性格。

String.Source: Not impressed!
String.Dest: 雕虫小技！

String.Source: Well, I guess not. Sometimes I forget that being a legendary hero doesn't make you perfect!
String.Dest: 好吧，我想或许不是。有时我会忘记，成为一个传奇英雄并不会使你变得完美。

String.Source: Now some people will tell you you have to be crazy to ride one. Well, you don't have to be, but it certainly helps.
String.Dest: 有些人会告诉你，你得有股子疯劲儿才能骑得上去。其实未必如此，不过能“疯”当然最好。

String.Source: The suffering the Daedra cause will not go unpunished.
String.Dest: 魔族会为他们亲手造成的苦难付出代价。

String.Source: Well, Delphine seems to think you'll do just fine, but are you sure we can't find someone, I don't know, with a little less dirt on the boots?
String.Dest: 恩，戴尔菲娜似乎认为你能干好，但难道说我们就不能找个，或许，鞋子上泥巴少点儿的家伙吗？

String.Source: There you are. Good to see you made it out safe. And Mercer didn't.
String.Dest: 欢迎回归，很高兴看到你安全出来了，而墨瑟没出来。

String.Source: Just leave that to me and the traveler. We might even put this Giant to sleep the old fashioned way.
String.Dest: 就把它交给我和旅行者吧。我们甚至可能用老办法送这巨人归西呢！

String.Source: When we're together, I get whisked back to the old days. Sometimes I'll look up, and half expect Indrel to be sleeping atop a bookcase!
String.Dest: 当我们在一起时，我会突然想起过去的日子。有时我往上看，还以为英卓尔仍睡在书架上呢！

String.Source: I know you want to stop and enjoy the view, and I agree, it's breathtaking. But we owe it to Valdr and his friends to chop some wood first.
String.Dest: 我知道你想停下来欣赏景色，我也一样，这景象太惊人了。但我们还对瓦尔卓和他的朋友们有所亏欠，应该先帮他们砍些木头。

String.Source: Many of my fellow Argonians didn't like what we were doing. Even Moon-Tail scowled at the notion. But Dalum-Ei stood his ground.
String.Dest: 我的许多亚龙人同伴都不喜欢我们在做的事。甚至连月尾也对这打算怒目而视。但达卢姆艾却还是固执己见。

String.Source: Citizen.
String.Dest: 公民。

String.Source: You sure we should let this Fjola live? She is a murdering, kidnapping bandit after all. But at least she was kind enough to talk to us first!
String.Dest: 你确定我们应该让这个菲欧拉活着吗？毕竟她是个把谋杀绑架当作吃饭喝水的土匪。但至少她第一次跟我们说话的时候足够亲切。

String.Source: (Laughs) And here I thought I wasn't going to have any fun! Where should I stick this Giant?
String.Dest: (笑声)我可没感觉有什么有趣的！我该打这巨人的哪里啊？

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: Wonderful. Soon we'll have the latest section of the Edda complete. Keep up the good work.
String.Dest: 太好了。很快我们就能完成诗歌集的最后一节了。继续加油。

String.Source: In contrast, Ula-Wei never said a word. He was a retired Shadowscale, and the only noise he made was when he sharpened his daggers.
String.Dest: 相比之下，乌拉卫从不说一句话。他是个退休的影鳞，他会发出的唯一声响就是打磨自己匕首的声音。

String.Source: What do you need to take?
String.Dest: 你想要什么东西？

String.Source: Still, it'd be nice if you kept your murdering sprees to corrupt nobles and Thalmor. And say, it turns out you'll be entertaining both! Good luck.
String.Dest: 不过，如果你能继续疯狂谋杀堕落的贵族和梭默的话，那一定很赞。其实，原来你也挺会娱乐的。祝你好运。

String.Source: I'll not argue that. Heard any interesting gossip lately?
String.Dest: 我不否认。最近有什么八卦吗？

String.Source: Can't tell. Every time I come to Riften, he starts following me again. But at least he knows better than to leave the city.
String.Dest: 没看出来。每次我来到裂谷城，他就开始跟踪我了，但是他至少知道还是离开这个城市为妙。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei ordered me to stay with the cargo. One by one I watched my friends emerge from the white, blood dripping from their wounds.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾命令我跟货物一呆着。我眼睁睁看着我的朋友们一个接一个的从雾气中慢慢浮现，他们的伤口还都滴着血。

String.Source: They say the trees cry for no one, but when he played, I know in my heart they wept for him.
String.Dest: 他们说大树不为任何人哭泣，但是当他演出的时候，我知道在我心里大树是为他而哭。

String.Source: I was halfway through the marsh, when I decided to head back to Morthal. I turned to the pesky urchin and told him, "Alright, you win."
String.Dest: 当我决定掉头回莫萨尔时我正在通过沼泽的半路上。我回到那个孩子那里，然后告诉他，“好吧，你赢了。”

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 快点好吗？

String.Source: Think nothing of it.
String.Dest: 还好啦。

String.Source: I wanted to kill that boy in the cave, to spare him from the memory. But now, I see it differently.
String.Dest: 我曾经想把洞穴里的那男孩给杀了，把他从那记忆中解脱出来。但现在，我不这么想了。

String.Source: Seeing as he's our only lead, I think we do. Besides, he may have his secrets, but at least he's honest about keeping them.
String.Dest: 鉴于他是我们唯一的线索，我想我们不得不信。虽说他可能有自己的小秘密，但至少在关乎他们的方面，他还算诚实。

String.Source: I'm sure I will. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我会的，谢谢你。

String.Source: Odd that the technology of the Dwemer was never stolen by the other races. I suppose it isn't as practical as the secret to Nord swill!
String.Dest: 奇怪的是锻莫的技术从未被其他种族窃取。我猜它还没诺德人的废话实用呢！

String.Source: We can take out the rest of the Falmer here. Draw them with a bow or a magic spell, and I'll do the rest.
String.Dest: 我们可以把这里剩下的雪精灵连窝儿端。用弓箭或魔法吸引他们的注意，剩下的就交给我。

String.Source: But to be honest, when I think of home I don't think of the rivers of tar or the clouds of fleshflies.
String.Dest: 但说实话，当我想起家乡，首先想到的并不是汇聚成河的汩汩焦油，或者如云笼罩的食肉蝇虫。

String.Source: We never did find out who let out that scream. Although we all suspect it was him.
String.Dest: 我们没有发现那个发出尖叫的人。虽然我们都怀疑是他。

String.Source: There was a Redguard named Bodan, a man whose gift of strings and tongue once earned him a place beside an Argonian tribal chief.
String.Dest: 曾经有个叫波登的红卫人，凭着出色的口才得到了一位亚龙人部族酋长的赏识。

String.Source: Lead the way.
String.Dest: 带路吧。

String.Source: Ungh. Maybe for you two.
String.Dest: 嗯，也许是为你们两个人。

String.Source: You're right. He can't hide. Not from us.
String.Dest: 你说得对。他逃不出我们的手掌心。

String.Source: Of course! How can I help?
String.Dest: 当然！要帮忙吗？

String.Source: And good luck to you as well. The next time you come back to the Rift, maybe our paths will cross once more.
String.Dest: 祝你也好运。下次你回来裂谷城，也许我们的命运会再次交汇。

String.Source: Morndas is a thief. She'll steal for you, and she'll steal from you. Just be sure it's worth the trade.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝是个小偷。她为你而偷，也偷你所有。只为有利可图。

String.Source: This reminds me of the old days. I once asked Ula-Wei to spar, but Arnwulf grabbed my arm and shook his head. Assassins don't know how to hold back.
String.Dest: 这让我想起了过往的日子。我曾经要求和乌拉卫比划两下，结果阿恩武夫抓住我的手一个劲儿地摇头。刺客们可不懂什么叫“点到为止”啊。

String.Source: The same is true for the old company. Even Dalum-Ei. Whether it's in this world or the next, we'll all be together again.
String.Dest: 我的老伙计也是一样。连达卢姆艾也是如此。不管是今生还是来生，我们总会再相聚的。

String.Source: Late for your own party, huh? Well, traveler, you've earned the right.
String.Dest: 自己的聚会都迟到了哈？好吧，旅行者，你有这个权利了。

String.Source: My blood's calm. I prefer it boiling.
String.Dest: 我的鲜血都要凝固了，我宁愿它沸腾。

String.Source: And it's not because of the way you're dressed or because you've practiced speaking with a funny accent.
String.Dest: 这不是因为你穿着很搞笑或者是你操着一口很搞笑的口音。

String.Source: Do you hear that?
String.Dest: 你听到了么？

String.Source: Bodan never really got over his wife's death. I don't know if I told you this, but every day he was with us was a fight to keep him alive.
String.Dest: 波登一直没有从她妻子离世的悲痛中真正振作起来。我不知道这事儿有没有跟你说过，但是每天我们都跟他在一起，就是怕他想不开了。

String.Source: But Ysgramor is a real person, and he's up there in Sovngarde, shaking his finger at Torvar every time he gets drunk.
String.Dest: 但伊斯格拉谟是个真实存在的人，而他现在正在松加德，每每喝醉了就对着托瓦尔指手画脚呢。

String.Source: Just give up!
String.Dest: 别挣扎了！

String.Source: Huzzah!
String.Dest: 好啊！

String.Source: Hello there.
String.Dest: 你好啊。

String.Source: Apparently, the Red Wave has been docked in Solitude for well over a month, and with no sign of shipping out any time soon.
String.Dest: 很显然，赤红波浪已经在独孤城停泊一个多月了，依然没有离港的迹象。

String.Source: On the brink of death. It doesn't look like magic will be enough.
String.Dest: 在死亡的边缘。它可不是看起来像个戏法就够了。

String.Source: If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
String.Dest: 如果你改变主意了，你知道在哪里可以找到我。

String.Source: Keep looking. Maybe he left it on one of the dressers.
String.Dest: 仔细找，也许他把它丢在哪个衣柜里了。

String.Source: This war has taken a toll on the merchants of Skyrim. Let's hope that it ends soon, for their sake.
String.Dest: 这场战争给天际的商人带来了相当大的损失，让我们为他们祈祷，希望这场战争赶紧结束吧。

String.Source: Take that, you fiend!
String.Dest: 接招吧，你个魔鬼！

String.Source: (Laughs) True.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真的。

String.Source: So go on, slay the World Eater. Show him we mortals taste a little funny going down.
String.Dest: 去罢，勇者！将世界吞噬者送回虚空。让他见识一下凡身的厉害！.

String.Source: The Gildergreen's back, but I don't know...bringing the dead back to life doesn't seem all that holy. If anything, it's necromancy.
String.Dest: 翠苒树恢复了生机，但我不知道……让死物复生好像并不那么神圣。要说的话，这完全是死灵法术。

String.Source: Still need me to do something?
String.Dest: 还要我做什么事吗？

String.Source: So did I, for a time. I thought I was strong enough to survive anything. But then I realized it wasn't just my life on the line.
String.Dest: 我也是。有那么一段时间，我以为自己强大到足以从任何东西手中存活。但紧接着，我意识到有危险的不仅是我的生命。

String.Source: What do you want, stranger? I don't have time for chit-chat.
String.Dest: 你到底想要什么，陌生人？我可没时间闲扯。

String.Source: I don't think that regiment's coming. The Jarl needs every available guard to be outside his chambers and ready to polish his boots.
String.Dest: 我不认为大部队马上就要来了。真的要来的话，领主一般会召集每一个守卫站在他房间的门口准备好给他擦皮鞋。

String.Source: You're out of your league!
String.Dest: 你根本不是我对手。

String.Source: I hope Delphine's mistaken. The people of Kynesgrove wouldn't last more than a minute against a dragon.
String.Dest: 我希望戴尔菲娜是错的。凯娜之林的人们跟龙斗的话坚持不了一分钟。

String.Source: If only Hroggar loved his child as much as this vampire did. I don't care what magic Alva used, that fool of a Nord has no excuse.
String.Dest: 真希望赫鲁加能像这个吸血鬼一样的爱他自己的孩子。我才不管阿尔瓦到底施了什么魔法，反正那肯定不足以成为这个傻诺德的借口。

String.Source: Take care.
String.Dest: 多保重。

String.Source: I don't know what you're talking about.
String.Dest: 我不懂你在说什么。

String.Source: Lead on, brave traveler, lead on.
String.Dest: 带路吧，勇敢的旅行者，继续前进。

String.Source: This Argonian needs to stop whining and get off his tail. It doesn't matter what you were meant to be. You still have to meet destiny halfway.
String.Dest: 这个亚龙人需要停止抱怨和拿开它的尾巴。不管你是什么意思。你仍然需要面对你不完整的命运。

String.Source: This town reeks of the dead. The odor is sour, pungent. Gets right under your scales.
String.Dest: 这座城市充斥着死亡。酸涩辛辣的气味儿满溢。注意把握好你的分寸。

String.Source: Ha! You might be ready for parenthood, but as far as I'm concerned, raising a child is a thousand times scarier than any Oblivion Gate.
String.Dest: 哈! 你可能准备为人父母了，但就我而言， 抚养孩子比任何湮灭之门都要可怕一千倍。

String.Source: Bodan has always been polite, but he's never been one to hide his true feelings. If he wanted us dead, I'd know. Let me see that note.
String.Dest: 波登一直谦逊有礼，但他从不是一个会隐藏自己真实感情的人。如果他想让我们死，我会知道的。让我看看这笔记吧。

String.Source: Fine.
String.Dest: 好嘛。

String.Source: (Laughs) I hope you're right. Living in this swamp, you can't help but be surrounded by them.
String.Dest: (笑声)我希望你是对的。只要生活在这片沼泽里，你就不得不被他们所包围。

String.Source: Hard to say. Aside from the fact that Dalum-Ei recruited mages, I'd say the biggest difference is the name.
String.Dest: 很难说。事实上，除了达卢姆艾招募了一些法师外，我认为我们和战友团最大的不同之处是名字。

String.Source: But I like to think It doesn't matter whether we agree or disagree, whether we're saving the world or saving a life.
String.Dest: 但我时常这样想。不管我们是同意亦或是反对，无论我们是在拯救世界还是在拯救一个生命，这些都无所谓。

String.Source: They call this Bonechill Passage? Well, there's bones, and there's chill. Nords are such a creative people!
String.Dest: 他们管这儿叫寒骨通道？呃，这里是有骨头，也挺寒冷的。诺德还真是个有创意的民族！

String.Source: Your aunt was a true knight, Golldir. It took a lot of courage to come in here alone. Even more to leave you behind.
String.Dest: 你的伯母是位真正的骑士，高迪尔。独自到这儿就需要很大的勇气，更别说要将你抛在身后了。

String.Source: I'm sure it'll be just fine. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我确定它会很好的，谢谢你了。

String.Source: We've come to a decision, mage. You can teach the boy, but it's best you do it in Winterhold. It's safer that way.
String.Dest: 我们已经做出决定了，法师。你可以教这孩子，但教学过程最好不要离开冬堡。这样可能会安全点儿。

String.Source: Let's get going.
String.Dest: 我们走吧。

String.Source: Stand still, damnit!
String.Dest: 站住，该死的！

String.Source: But I'm glad you got yours. Mirabelle and Savos can rest easy knowing you avenged their deaths.
String.Dest: 但是我很高兴你能如愿以偿。米拉贝尔和萨沃斯知道你替他们的死报仇的话肯定能安息了。

String.Source: Come on in. Just stoked the fire. Take a seat and get the cold out.
String.Dest: 快请进。到火炉边坐吧，驱散身上的寒气。

String.Source: Werewolves! Didn't you say this man breeds them?
String.Dest: 狼人！难道你没有说过这个家伙在饲养它们？

String.Source: I'm on it.
String.Dest: 我这就去。

String.Source: I hope we bump into each other again.
String.Dest: 希望我们有机会再见面。

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: Let me know if you see anything you like.
String.Dest: 如果你看上了什么就请告诉我。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金子、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: There were sick children who needed these potions. It was the honorable thing.
String.Dest: 那些生病的孩子需要这些药水。这是件光荣的事儿。

String.Source: Ah, Middas. I joined the Honorable Eight on a Middas. That day was warm, but fresh, unlike any day in Black Marsh.
String.Dest: 啊，周三。就在一个周三，我加入了神圣八人众。那一天很暖和，空气也很新鲜，跟黑沼泽省的任何一天都不一样。

String.Source: It would have been the honorable thing. Ula-Wei would have done it too, had Elia not stood in his way.
String.Dest: 这是件光荣的事儿。乌拉韦也会这么做的，伊利亚不会阻碍他。

String.Source: I was so ungrateful. Even though if it weren't for blacksmiths like him, I'd still be swinging a hist branch.
String.Dest: 我是如此让人不愉快。哪怕不是因为铁匠喜欢他，我也要改变希斯特的决定。

String.Source: Can't sleep well no matter how much drink I put in me.
String.Dest: 不管我灌自己多少酒，我还是睡不好觉。

String.Source: That is, until a week after we boarded a ship for Elsweyr. A Khajiit lord had heard of our feats and commissioned us for a job in Jorval.
String.Dest: 也就是说，在我们登上开往艾斯维尔的船一周后，一个虎人领主听到了我们的功绩，于是委托我们到约瓦尔城工作。

String.Source: But they're still around, which is more than you can say for mine! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 但他们还在附近，这一点你可以替我说！ (笑声)

String.Source: A witch, huh? Well, I guess it had to be this way. I doubt either of us could keep a secret!
String.Dest: 一个女巫哈？好吧，我猜就得是这样。我怀疑我们俩都保守不住秘密！

String.Source: Lizard, did you say you were one of the Honorable Eight? Did you know Arnwulf the Wayfarer?
String.Dest: 大蜥蜴，你说你是荣光八人众之一？那你知道旅者阿恩武夫么?

String.Source: (Laughs) Now that's something we'd both like to see.
String.Dest: (笑声) 这真是喜！闻！乐！见！

String.Source: So it's only right I pass those words on to you. It's okay to be confident in your abilities. Just don't underestimate your opponent's.
String.Dest: 我把这消息告诉你真是太好了。对自己能力有自信没问题。总之别低估了你对手的实力。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, I can't say I don't have my own suspicions. Truth is, when I was talking about townsfolk, I was talking about me!
String.Dest: (笑声) 我不能说我没自己的想法，事实上是，当我讲到镇民的时候，我是在说我自己。

String.Source: Wait!
String.Dest: 等等！

String.Source: Sure, I can take something for you.
String.Dest: 当然，我可以给你一些东西。

String.Source: Another camp chock full of bandits. So good to see young people taking an interest in crime. Means more bounties for us.
String.Dest: 另一个塞满了强盗的营地。看见这么多年轻人沉溺于犯罪真好。这意味着我们有更多的赏金。

String.Source: What do you mean? Who are you? How do you know who I am?
String.Dest: 你什么意思？你是谁？你怎么知道我是谁？

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那好吧。

String.Source: Bloodsuckers have come a long way it seems. Now they drink from cups!
String.Dest: 似乎吸血鬼还有很长一段路要走。现在他们在用杯子喝血！恶心！

String.Source: What do you need me to take?
String.Dest: 你需要多长时间?

String.Source: I thought if I made the journey rough enough, he'd leave. But whenever I looked back, he was always there.
String.Dest: 我想如果我的旅途足够艰苦的话，他就会离开。但每当我回头看的时候，他总在那里。

String.Source: Get him!
String.Dest: 抓住他！

String.Source: That may be true, but even knowing your intentions were good is not enough to absolve. Knowing...won't rid you of the shame.
String.Dest: 也许这是真的。但就算知道你的本意是好的，也不足以得以宽恕。要知道……你摆脱不掉这种羞耻。

String.Source: That was delicious.
String.Dest: 那可真美味。

String.Source: Plus their eyes and tongues have been cut out. What kind of sick ritual is going on here?
String.Dest: 外加他们的眼睛被挖掉，舌头被割掉了。这种恶心的仪式是怎么回事？

String.Source: Chasing this scroll makes me feel like a knight again. You have ancient evils, legendary weapons and heroes to claim them.
String.Dest: 追求这卷轴让我觉得自己又像一个骑士一样了。你能够召唤远古恶魔，传奇武器和英雄。

String.Source: Klimmek ought to really invest in a horse. Or is that not allowed? Eh, might be easier to pay off pilgrims then buy a sack of oats.
String.Dest: 真应该买匹马。或者这是不受允许的？呃，先还清朝圣者们的欠债再买一袋麦子应该会更轻松。

String.Source: If High Hrothgar is the Throat of the World, this must be the collarbone. Still, it's a nice view.
String.Dest: 如果说高吼峰是世界之喉，那这里一定是她的锁骨。而且，这里的景致真不错。

String.Source: Isn't this a nice place for a picnic! Well, except for the ants, and the bandits, but that's why the Divines invented boots, and blades.
String.Dest: 这难道不是一个野餐的好地方么？好吧，除了那些蚂蚁，还有那群强盗，这就是为什么圣灵发明了靴子还有刀刃。

String.Source: Ugh...
Take the boy, mage. And if you need me for anything, anything at all...just give me a time and place, and I'll be there.
String.Dest: 把那男孩带走吧，魔法师。如果你有任何事需要我帮助,任何事都行……只要告诉我时间和地点，我必将前往协助。

String.Source: You remind me of him in that sense. They can shower you with boon, and hire a thousand bards to sing your story.
String.Dest: 在某种意义上你提醒了我，他们能让你享尽荣华富贵，还能雇上一千个吟游诗人来歌唱你的故事。

String.Source: I can't even imagine. Our company had to live up to an ideal, but the only people we let down was ourselves.
String.Dest: 这真是超乎我的想象了。我们的队伍应当承担起一个理想，而我们偏偏就让自己失望了。

String.Source: As you command, my Thane.
String.Dest: 谨遵吩咐，武卫。

String.Source: I was traveling in Black Marsh with a company of fighters. We fashioned ourselves the "Honorable Eight."
String.Dest: 我曾经和一个战士组织在黑沼泽省旅行。我们把自己称为“神圣八人众 ”。

String.Source: It shall be done.
String.Dest: 没问题。

String.Source: Well, it's a short story. I carry a sword. I'm from the swamps of Black Marsh. Do you need me to continue, or can you piece it together from here?
String.Dest: 嗯，这有个小故事。我来自黑沼泽省，我还有把剑。这事你来干还是我来？

String.Source: So tell me, what brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 告诉我吧，是什么风把你吹到裂谷城来的?

String.Source: Do you agree to be bound together, in love, now and forever?
String.Dest: 你们愿意结为一体，永远相爱吗？

String.Source: So you're convinced of that, hm? I admit, it takes a strong man to live through something like this and still keep your head.
String.Dest: 所以你相信这个，哼？我得承认，只有坚强的人，才能头脑清醒的挺过这种事情。

String.Source: Wherever the Daedra hide, the Vigil of Stendarr will cast them into the light.
String.Dest: 无论魔族躲藏在何处，我们都会把它们揪出来。

String.Source: That looks like a 40 foot drop. Who knows how deep that water is. Well, there's only one way to find out!
String.Dest: 那看起来有40英尺深，谁知道这水下有多深。好吧，只有一种办法来查出来了。

String.Source: Maybe.
String.Dest: 也许吧。

String.Source: For honor!
String.Dest: 为了荣耀！

String.Source: Hmph.
String.Dest: 哼。

String.Source: That's to say, she wears them proudly. But she's loyal, I'll give her that. She has a thief's honor, and I suppose that counts for something.
String.Dest: 也就是说，她自豪的穿着它们。但她是忠诚的，我会把那交予她。她是盗贼的荣耀，我想这很重要。

String.Source: Thank you. I know I'm asking a lot, but I don't want you to sacrifice your ideals for mine. If at any point you want to leave, I'll understand.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我知道我问的太多了，可我不愿让你为我牺牲你的理想。如果在任何时候你想离开，我会理解你的。

String.Source: But if I were a betting lizard, I'd say the shadows are as much as part of her as the knight's code is a part of me.
String.Dest: 如果我是一个爱赌博的蜥蜴，我想说：阴影作为她的一部分就好比骑士准则是我的一部分一样。

String.Source: In any case, I'm sure someone like you will be the talk of the party. Just try not to stand out too much. You still have a job to do.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我敢肯定像你这样的人会成为大家的话题的。不过也不要太抢风头了。你还有活要干呢。

String.Source: I think he finally realizes he's found a home.
String.Dest: 我认为他终于意识到他已经找到了一个家。

String.Source: If you don't mind, I'd like to stop by the marketplace in Riften. Got one more errand I need to run.
String.Dest: 如果你不介意，我想留在裂谷城的市场。我还有许多差事要做。

String.Source: Back then, Bodan wore a mask of courtesy, and the only time he took it off was to play that song.
String.Dest: 在那时，波登时刻戴着善意的面具，而只有在他演奏那首乐曲时，他才将那伪善的面具摘下来过。

String.Source: You'll need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 不给力啊！！

String.Source: Ahrk fin norok paal graan fod nust hon zindro zaan, Dovahkiin, fah hin kogaan mu draal!
String.Dest: 阿克 芬 诺罗 帕尔 古兰 佛 努斯 洪 金德罗 赞，都瓦克因，法 辛 克甘 姆 德阿尔

String.Source: So the townsfolk think the mages blew up their town? Not a surprise. Small mistakes lead to big accidents. I should know, I make them all the time!
String.Dest: 那么镇民认为法师炸了他们的镇子？那没什么。小错误会导致大事故。我当然知道这些，因为我一直在捅娄子！

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: Besides, you're the only thing standing between us and the dragons. Good, evil, at this point it doesn't matter. We're all on your side.
String.Dest: 而且，只有你挡在巨龙面前，保护我们。善良也好，邪恶也罢，此时此刻都已不再重要。我们都站在你这一边。

String.Source: (Laughs) Now that's the craziest sodding thing I've heard all day! Didn't I warn you to lay off the hist sap?
String.Dest: (笑声) 我现在听到一天里最他妈疯狂的事了。我是不是警告过你别去打希斯特树汁的主意？

String.Source: We were an elite band of fighters, hired to do jobs common sellswords weren't equipped for.
String.Dest: 我们是一群精锐战士组成的团体，被雇佣来做一般佣兵搞不定的事儿。

String.Source: You speak true, Dragonborn. A long quest gives us purpose.
String.Dest: 你说得对，龙裔。一个长久的任务让我们活得有目标。

String.Source: So do Elder Scrolls exist outside of time? I wonder if it sees a nice warm bath in our future!
String.Dest: 这样说上古卷轴能够游离于时间之外？我希望从卷轴里能看到我们在洗一个舒舒服服的热水澡~

String.Source: I haven't seen Elia since we parted in Bravil. How is she?
String.Dest: 自从我和伊利亚在布拉维尔分开以后就没再见过她了。她近况如何？

String.Source: I believe we're done.
String.Dest: 我们没什么好讲的了。

String.Source: Yet if I were you, I wouldn't be in a hurry to invite them to dinner. It's more likely one of you will end up the main course!
String.Dest: 如果我是你，我就不会急着请他们去吃晚餐。很有可能你们中的一个就会当成主菜被吃了！！

String.Source: Twice he swore we were hatched from the same mother! "How dare you forget your own sibling!" he'd say.
String.Dest: 他每次都强调他真的是从一个母亲的肚子里爬出来的。“你怎么敢忘记你的兄弟姐妹！” 他说。

String.Source: I thought I'd make a stop there and ask the caretaker if they've seen him. Maybe he was tired of traveling, and just wanted a normal life.
String.Dest: 我想我会停下来问问看守卫有没有人见过他。也许他厌倦了旅行，只是想要一个正常的生活。

String.Source: If bandits are ransoming captives, then there's a chance they're still alive. Even if we don't find this man's wife, there may be others.
String.Dest: 如果强盗只是绑票，那他们有可能还活着。就算我们不能找到那个男人的老婆，那也能找到其他人质。

String.Source: Ysgramor, huh. Elia once told me she was a descendant of Arslan II, but I think she was just being an arse.
String.Dest: 伊斯格拉谟，哈。艾拉曾告诉我说她是阿斯兰的后裔，但是我认为她不过就是个蠢蛋而已。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei, I stood by you, trusted you...is this what you call a knight's honor?
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾，我在你左右，信任你…这就是你所谓的骑士荣誉？

String.Source: I understand your anger. Moon-Tail, Elia, Arnwulf, Ula-Wei, and Bodan. With every loss, a piece of me died with them.
String.Dest: 我理解你的愤怒。月尾，艾拉，阿恩武夫, 乌拉卫,还有波登。他们的离去……带走了我的一片又一片的灵魂。

String.Source: But in all honesty, while I didn't fear Falion, I suspected him. It's just after what happened with my old company, even my doubts have doubts.
String.Dest: 不过坦白讲，虽然我不怕法利昂，也还是怀疑他。在我的老伙计发生过那些事之后，我的疑虑就变得更深更难以解开。

String.Source: Ha, that would explain the empty stall! But it doesn't matter if she's here or in the void, I can't get her voice out of my head.
String.Dest: 哈，那样的话这空空如也的畜栏就解释得通了！可这不是她是死是活的问题，她的声音在我脑子里挥之不去。

String.Source: I'll be waiting.
String.Dest: 我会等你的。

String.Source: Arnwulf once told me there were 2 types of people who lived in forts. The kind who read, and the kind who bed. And look at all these books!
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫曾告诉我住在城堡里的有两种人。一种是读书的人，另一种是上床的人。看看所有这些书！

String.Source: Sometimes Indrel would surprise us with a line or two, or Arnwulf would make a fool of himself, but mostly it was me who played the jester.
String.Dest: 有时英卓尔会用一两个笑话让我们惊喜一下，或者阿恩武夫会冒个傻气，但是大多数情况是我在扮演小丑的角色。

String.Source: I'll kill you if I have to!
String.Dest: 我会杀了你！

String.Source: You will bleed!
String.Dest: 我要帮你放血！

String.Source: All right love. Should you need me again, I'll be home.
String.Dest: 好吧亲爱的。如果你还需要我帮忙，到家里来找我。

String.Source: Ha, and here I thought I'd be more useful like this! Funeral clothes aren't exactly good for stopping arrows.
String.Dest: 哈，我以为我会表现得比现在这个样子更有用一点，葬礼礼服在抵御弓箭方面还真是差劲。

String.Source: But alright, traveler, I'll do my best.
String.Dest: 好吧，旅行者，我会尽力而为的。

String.Source: Grelka, did you get the armor I asked for?
String.Dest: 葛雷卡，你拿到我要的盔甲了吗？

String.Source: There's one of the witches. It doesn't look like we can take her by surprise. Lucky for us, we only need to take her head.
String.Dest: 那儿就有一个女巫。看来不太好偷袭。不过好在，咱们要的只是她的脑袋，怎么杀死倒是无关紧要。

String.Source: That poor mortal. Died shackled to the wall, listening to this voice moan and groan all day. It's time we gave him some peace.
String.Dest: 那可怜的凡人。到死都被锁在墙边，听着呻吟和抱怨。是时候该我们给他个清静了。

String.Source: Of course, by the time we got to Bravil, the harlot would have nothing to do with him!
String.Dest: 当然，等我们到达布拉维尔的时候，那妓女连理都不会理他的！

String.Source: And I didn't want to be the one to let the company down.
String.Dest: 我可不想成为让自己的同伴失望的那个人。

String.Source: Careful. These blades may be old, but they look sharp. Very dangerous, especially if you have a tail!
String.Dest: 小心。这些刀刃可能很旧，但是它们看起来很锋利。特别是如果你有一条尾巴的话，它们会非常的危险！

String.Source: Look at that table. It reminds me of a story Moon-Tai told me, about a bard with severed hands who conjured them back to life to play the flute.
String.Dest: 看那种桌子。它让我想起了月尾给我讲的那个故事，一个关于断手诗人整日祈祷着能重生双臂，再度吹响他的长笛的故事。

String.Source: That coffin must be where Mikrul sleeps. At least there's plenty of room to fight. Thank the Gods this Draugr likes open spaces!
String.Dest: 那口棺材一定就是米尔库最后沉睡的地方了。至少这里还有足够的空间来战斗。感谢老天，还好这只尸鬼喜欢开阔的地方。

String.Source: We killed a necromancer and saved her prisoner. Yes, he was a thief, and an idiot. But traveler, you still did the honorable thing.
String.Dest: 我们杀掉了亡灵术士，拯救了她的囚徒。是啊，他是个贼，是个白痴。不过旅行者，你还是做了件令人尊敬的事。

String.Source: Not a problem, brave adventurer, if there is one thing I do well, it's standing guard.
String.Dest: 没问题，勇敢的冒险者。如果说有一件事我做得最好的话，那就是站岗了。

String.Source: Be careful around this Dark Elf. I don't trust him, but with mages I don't trust myself. Whatever you decide, I'm with you.
String.Dest: 小心那个黑暗精灵。我不信任他。但于站在法师的角度，我也不信任我自己。无论你做出什么决定，我都支持你。

String.Source: I don't know if what he did was the honorable thing. But he believed it was, and that's a burden few are willing to bear.
String.Dest: 我不知道他所做的事是否值得夸耀。但是他坚信如此，而且那是个少有人愿意忍受的负担。

String.Source: It's possible. There was no guarantee he would ever see her again, but he was always patient.
String.Dest: 有可能吧。谁也不能保证他还有没有机会见到她，可他有的是耐心。

String.Source: Arnwulf use to complain that in Black Marsh, all the drinks taste like the swamp. Which is just the way we like it.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫经常抱怨黑沼泽省的酒尝起来都是沼泽味儿的。可我们就喜欢这样的酒。

String.Source: Two-handed weapon, huh? It suits you. I'm surprised you don't use your tail to swing it too!
String.Dest: 双手武器，哼嗯？挺适合你的。不过我感觉你拿尾巴也能抡人啊。

String.Source: Nothing like some good old indoctrination to build an army. Still, the Falmer don't trust them completely, if they're arming them with rusty maces.
String.Dest: 老话说得好，军队即王道。不过，这堆雪精灵们似乎不完全认同这点，这帮二货还用生锈的锤子武装自己呢。

String.Source: These people deserve their vengeance. I just hope the fates offer us the bounty.
String.Dest: 这些人理应得到他们的复仇。我只是希望命运能够慷慨地对待我们。

String.Source: Anyone who ever complains about the rain has never been to Black Marsh. There's a reason they call it "Hist Piss."
String.Dest: 抱怨过下雨的人他们肯定没去过黑沼泽省.这就是为啥那被叫做 "希斯特的尿池"的缘故。

String.Source: Maybe. There's been talk of a group of bandits holed up in an old barrow to the west of here.
String.Dest: 可能，有消息说有一组强盗隐藏在此处西边的古坟。

String.Source: (Laughs) True. If I saw a bunch of crazy adventurers charging at me with weapons drawn, a conversation is probably the last thing I'd expect.
