String.Dest: (笑声)确实。如果我看见一帮逗逼冒险者举着武器向我冲过来，我绝对不会想到要跟他们讲道理。

String.Source: That's what I thought.
String.Dest: 那就是我所想的。

String.Source: Yes. There was Arnwulf, a former member of the Fighters Guild in Cyrodiil. A big Nord man, with an even bigger laugh.
String.Dest: 是啊。阿恩武夫以前是赛瑞迪尔战士公会的成员。一个彪悍的诺德汉子，比他更彪悍的是他的笑容。

String.Source: So if I understand this right, this quartermaster told you where to find this war teacher?
String.Dest: 如果我没想错的话，这个军需官告诉你该去哪儿找战争导师了？

String.Source: I couldn't agree more. By the way, have you heard any interesting rumors lately?
String.Dest: 不能同意你更多了。顺便一提，你最近听过什么有趣的传言吗？

String.Source: Vampires. If Ula-Wei were here, he'd find his way up those stairs and take out any archers. A straight fight's going to be a lot tougher.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼。假如乌拉卫在这的话, 他会找到自己的办法登上台阶并且跟弓箭手谈谈人生。如果硬上的话这场仗会打得更艰难.

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 过来这里，这是你做到的？

String.Source: It is from her love of us that we first learned to love one another. It is from this love that we learn that a life lived alone is no life at all.
String.Dest: 从她的关爱中，我们第一次懂得去爱，从她的关爱中，我们懂得孤独的人生是不完整的。

String.Source: In his last days, I was thankful to get a glimpse of who Bodan really was, and not the man he was pretending to be.
String.Dest: 在他最后的日子里，我很感激我得到了身为波登应得的目光，而不是他假装是的那个人。

String.Source: (Laughs) Gajul-Lei? Why in Oblivion would Gulum-Ei use an Argonian name as an alias? Doesn't he know they all sound the same to foreigners?
String.Dest: (笑声) 古拉姆？古鲁姆·埃他妈的怎么会打算用一个亚龙人名字做化名？他不知道对外乡人来说这俩听起来没啥区别吗？

String.Source: By the Leviathan's tail! Look at that mist...not even the blackest swamps could make something that foul.
String.Dest: 鳄鱼尾巴在上！看看那雾…即使是最昏暗的沼泽也没法让东西腐烂到如此程度。

String.Source: It's just too bad I didn't get to strike the killing blow. Ever since my company disbanded, I've wanted to test my mettle against a true sorcerer.
String.Dest: 很遗憾我没有成功施展出致命一击。自从跟我的同伴分别以来，我一直想要通过对抗一名真正的巫师而证明自己的勇气。

String.Source: For now, I just want to do right by the ones that are living.
String.Dest: 而现在，我只想要给那些还活着的人公平的对待。

String.Source: How nice of the bandits to all pile together in one place, with no avenue of escape.
String.Dest: 这堆强盗全聚在一个地方唠嗑真是太妙了，看他们还能往哪里逃。

String.Source: This lunar forge looks like any other. But I'm not exactly a smith. Or a mage.
String.Dest: 这个月之熔炉看起来就像其他的什么。但我不完全是个铁匠，或者法师……我看不出来。

String.Source: Let's see what you can do!
String.Dest: 看看你有什么本事！

String.Source: A cave. Dark place, dark tidings.
String.Dest: 一个山洞。坏地方，坏消息。

String.Source: There are times I thought of returning to the marsh. I made it as far as Riften before realizing just how far the journey was.
String.Dest: 有几次我想过回沼泽去，在我意识到这旅行的距离之前我还以为就和到裂谷城一样远。

String.Source: Indeed.
String.Dest: 没错。

String.Source: Do you mean to tell me the Nords have gained horse and cart technology? By the Gods! They're practically Dwarves!
String.Dest: 你的意思是说那群诺德人还是学会了怎么造马车？额滴神啊！他们都快成了矮人了!

String.Source: Bodan for his wisdom, Ula-Wei for his cunning, and Elia, for being the sister I never had.
String.Dest: 波登是因为他的智慧，乌拉卫因为他的可爱，伊利亚，是因为她就像一个我从未有过的妹妹。

String.Source: After all, Eorlund works the Skyforge. How is any smith going to compete with that?
String.Dest: 厄伦德为天空熔炉工作。这点有哪个铁匠能比得上呢？

String.Source: But in all honesty, if a Companion tells you they only care about gold, I'd take their words with a grain of void salt.
String.Dest: 但是说实话，如果战友团告诉你他们只在乎钱，我会持保留意见。

String.Source: I'll tear you to pieces!
String.Dest: 我要把你撕碎！

String.Source: Sure, but Skyrim's like one big circle. Eventually, we'll end up right back where it all began, in the pond the Nords call a marsh.
String.Dest: 没错，但是天际省就好像一个巨大的循环。最终我们都将回到开始的地方，那些诺德人称之为沼泽的池子里。

String.Source: Well, we could always try Winterhold. It's not the most comfortable of surroundings, but I'm sure it beats living in some cave.
String.Dest: 嗯，我们总可以试试去冬堡。那个地方再差劲，也比住在洞穴里强。

String.Source: By the Hist, will you look at that! In Black Marsh, you learn to fear ripples on the water, but what came out here is a sight to behold.
String.Dest: 希斯特在上，看看那个！在黑沼泽，你会学着害怕水面的涟漪，但是在这出现的东西简直就是奇观。

String.Source: The others wished me luck. Bodan stood up to speak. But it was Moon-Tail, of all people, who said the words I'll never forget.
String.Dest: 其他人都祝我好运。波登站起来讲话。但那应该轮到月尾了，所有说出那些话的人我都永远不会忘记。

String.Source: Something tells me Saadia isn't telling the whole story. Then again, neither are the Alik'r!
String.Dest: 某种感觉告诉我萨迪亚没说完全，然后这次也是，阿利克尔也在遮掩什么！

String.Source: How did you know? Maybe you ought to give up adventuring and become a fortune teller!
String.Dest: 你是怎么知道的？我看你还是放弃冒险家这个职业改行算命好啦！

String.Source: What, never seen a Giant milk a mammoth? (Laughs) I'm guessing anyone who has was seeing stars shortly after.
String.Dest: 什么，你没见过巨人给长毛象挤奶? (笑声)我猜看过的人立马都被巨人送去登月了。

String.Source: You better have coin to pay for your drinks. There's no handouts here.
String.Dest: 你最好付得起酒钱。这里可没有在布施的。

String.Source: I know just what you mean. Heard anything interesting lately? Any news or gossip?
String.Dest: 我懂了。最近有什么有意思的吗？新闻或者八卦都行？

String.Source: Get ready for a fight.
String.Dest: 准备好战斗！

String.Source: We'll handle things from here. Move along.
String.Dest: 现在由我们接手处理，请离开吧。

String.Source: So now what? What's our next move?
String.Dest: 现在怎么着？我们接下来干嘛？

String.Source: Leave me.
String.Dest: 别来烦我。

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Sounds good. Let's go home, curl up by the fire and grow old together. And maybe slay a few monsters along the way.
String.Dest: 听起来真不错。我们回家吧，在篝火边并肩相依，直到我们都苍颜华发。也许在度过人生旅途的中途杀几只怪物。

String.Source: Stendarr's Mercy be upon you, for the Vigil has none to spare.
String.Dest: 愿斯丹达尔怜悯你吧，守夜人是绝不姑息一切罪恶的。

String.Source: Bye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: It sounds like chanting! Come on!
String.Dest: 听起来就像是吟唱！继续吧！

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 这就是你想要的？

String.Source: When we got there, the Shadowscale, Ula-Wei, scouted ahead as the rest of us waited near the entrance. He found bear traps and trip wires.
String.Dest: 当我们到那里时，那个影鳞，乌拉卫，在我们等在路口的时候侦察到了一些东西。他找到了捕熊的陷阱和绊绳。

String.Source: You don't have a chance, kitten!
String.Dest: 你没有机会了，小猫咪！

String.Source: I thank you, brave traveler, for the only thing more rewarding than a good battle, is to fight alongside someone like yourself.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，勇敢的旅行者，这样的结局肯定比打一架伤到边上像你这样看热闹的人好得多。

String.Source: Moon-Tail was a conjurer, who conjured monsters as quickly as he conjured lies. And Elia, a Breton healer, whose lust for men had no cure.
String.Dest: 月尾是一个（亚龙人）巫师，他施法的速度和他倒下的速度一样快。伊利亚, 一个布莱顿人医师，她的性欲强到没得救。

String.Source: And children can't be blamed for the ills of their fathers, yet we burden them with history. Dalum-Ei refused to. So they came for him, and for us.
String.Dest: 再说孩子不应该因为父辈的错误被谴责，我们向来都用历史来给他们增加负担。达卢姆艾不想如此。因此他们为他而来，也为我们而来。

String.Source: What is it you want?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Way ahead of you. Got health potions for when I get hit, and stamina potions for when I don't.
String.Dest: 早就想到了。当我被打中时就用治疗药剂，没打中时就用精力药剂吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) So that's what all the commotion is about? And here I thought the Nords had discovered a poorer tasting mead!
String.Dest: (笑声) 那么，这就是骚乱的原因了？我觉得这些诺德人找到了难喝的蜜酒！

String.Source: And yet you believed everything else? (Laughs) I don't know who's the bigger fool, you or the three idiots that followed you!
String.Dest: 至今你还相信每件事？我不知道谁才是大傻瓜，(笑声) 你还是那三个跟着你的呆瓜！

String.Source: If what this mage says is true, then it's not his fault. And if he's guilty of nothing, he doesn't deserve to be punished.
String.Dest: 如果这个法师说的是事实，那么就不是他的错了。再如果他问心无愧，他不会遭报应的。

String.Source: Eyaargh!
String.Dest: 哎呀！

String.Source: All right, we'll wait for you there.
String.Dest: 好的,我们等你。

String.Source: Maybe he was just curious. Maybe he ascribed it to fate. Maybe he thought he could make a wife out of me. (Laughs) Poor fool never had a chance.
String.Dest: 也许他只是好奇。也许他把这一切归结于命运。也许他以为他能让我的妻子离开我。 (笑声)可怜的呆子从没有过机会。

String.Source: So, are we heading out? Or do you need me to pick up an instrument too?
String.Dest: 那么，我们要出发了么？还是说你想要我再带些家伙？

String.Source: As you wish.
String.Dest: 遵命。

String.Source: You can mourn the dead and live in shame. But in the end, shame won't change what happened.
String.Dest: 你可以悼念死者,生活在耻辱之中。但终究什么也不会改变。

String.Source: Have you visited Rorikstead lately? No matter how harsh the winter, the crops that grow there never falter.
String.Dest: 你最近去过洛里斯泰德吗？不管那里的冬天有多严苛，庄稼都会长得很好。

String.Source: So this Orthorn stole some books to ditch the guild for some weirdos. Sounds like a loser. What? Don't look at me like that. I'm nothing like him.
String.Dest: 所以这个什么奥松恩就偷了几本工会的书，为他的那些怪物朋友在公会开后门？真是弱鸡……别这么看我！我哪点跟他一样啊？

String.Source: What sort of mistakes did you make with the boy? The less you talk, the more suspicious it sounds.
String.Dest: 你到底对那个男孩犯了什么错?你说的越少，听起来越可疑。

String.Source: A Giant camp. And here I thought I'd never get a chance to fly.
String.Dest: 一个巨人营地。我还以为自己没机会自由飞翔了呢。

String.Source: Animal sacrifices, witches, and hags. I've got a feeling this Priestess of Kynareth is playing with dark forces, and making a foul bargain.
String.Dest: 动物祭品。巫师，和女巫。我老感觉这个凯娜瑞斯的女祭司在跟那些黑暗势力厮混在一起，想搞什么肮脏的交易呢。

String.Source: With the return of the dragons, the world watches Skyrim with bated breath. Our actions are the winds upon which fate will chart its course.
String.Dest: 伴随着巨龙的回归，整个世界都在默默屏息注视着天际。我们的行动便是那动摇命运轨迹的清风。

String.Source: It's an exciting time to be alive, isn't it? Although I never expected the weapon to be a shout! I guess it's a Nord thing.
String.Dest: 活到这一刻还真是激动啊，是吧? 真没想到那件所谓的武器原来是一种吼声！我猜应该是诺德人的玩意吧。

String.Source: Well, I hate to be the one to ask, but...is it working?
String.Dest: 呃，我确实不想问，不过……那是在运转吗？

String.Source: I agreed to follow you, and protect you. But if you join the Thieves Guild, I won't steal for you. Not for you, not for anyone.
String.Dest: 我会跟着你，保护你。但是如果你加入了盗贼工会，我不会为你偷窃。不只是你，所有人都如此。

String.Source: We used to ask Moon-Tail which clan he was from, and every day it was a different clan.
String.Dest: 我们曾经问过月尾他来自哪个氏族，结果每天的结果都不一样。

String.Source: A group of bandits have been rumored to be ransoming children off over in Mistwatch. I thought it might be worth taking a look.
String.Dest: 据说有一群强盗在迷雾塔楼拐卖小孩。我想这里值得去看一下。

String.Source: Over my dead body!
String.Dest: 踩着我的尸体过去！

String.Source: The Thalmor don't fight as well in a place like this. It's almost as if they're the ones afraid to get their hands dirty!
String.Dest: 梭莫也不会再在这样的地方开打。就好像他们那种害怕把自己的手弄脏似的。

String.Source: And lastly, our leader, Dalum-Ei, a legendary swordsman who fought in The Great War.
String.Dest: 而最后，我们的领导者，达卢姆·艾，这位传奇剑客参加了世界大战。

String.Source: Probably.
String.Dest: 也许吧。

String.Source: The Hist take you!
String.Dest: 希思特会带你走的！

String.Source: Not possible.
String.Dest: 不可能。

String.Source: With the soldiers all fighting in the war, there's nobody to hunt down the bandits. Travel has become dangerous of late.
String.Dest: 士兵都去参战了，没人去打土匪，这使得出行变得更危险了。

String.Source: And on that day, it was big enough.
String.Dest: 在那一天，这已经足够大了。

String.Source: I have no complaints.
String.Dest: 我毫无怨言。

String.Source: Be seeing you.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: The caves here are far deeper than in Cyrodiil. May the Hist guide us.
String.Dest: 这里的洞穴比赛洛帝尔的深多了。愿希斯特指引我们。

String.Source: I'd take you over any of those heroes they have in Sovngarde, and if you can't see that, it might be time to visit the apothecary.
String.Dest: 我会把你往死里打，好让你看看他们口中的松嘉德的诸位英灵，如果看不到，我也会打的你去找药剂师。

String.Source: I thank you for your company. If the Hist should guide our paths together once more, you have my blade. Knight's honor, swamp's honor.
String.Dest: 我很感激有你相伴。如果希斯特愿意再为我们指引方向，我站在你这边，以沼泽和骑士的荣誉起誓。

String.Source: Greetings, Arch-Mage.
String.Dest: 幸会，首席法师。

String.Source: Although I suppose you vanquishing Alduin is something worth celebrating as well! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 尽管我认为你打败奥杜因这事儿也值得庆祝庆祝！ (笑声)

String.Source: As such, he'd only agree to work that didn't diminish what we stood for. But contracts have a way of leaving out the details.
String.Dest: 就这样，他只同意解决我们支持的（一方）而不会减少。可合同上还是有漏洞可以抓啊。

String.Source: As for who it is, well, I have no idea. In life, you make a lot of friends, and a lot of enemies, and this could be from any of them.
String.Dest: 至于是谁，啊咧，我不知道。生活中，你结交了很多朋友，还有很多仇人，这可能是从他们中任何一个人手中来的。

String.Source: (Laughs) If it was, I'd have to give the Gods credit for originality! I suppose it doesn't really matter what it is, so long as it works.
String.Dest: （笑声）如果是这样的话，我就得赞美诸神的匠心独运了！我猜那是什么其实无所谓，毕竟这东西已经工作很长时间了。

String.Source: Damn rebels!
String.Dest: 该死的叛军。

String.Source: You won't leave here alive!
String.Dest: 你会死在这里！

String.Source: It won't be up to me. Indrel does things her own way, on her own time.
String.Dest: 不关我事。英卓尔做事有她自己的门道，有她自己的时间。

String.Source: But a group of warriors isn't a company without a common thread to hold you together. Without honor, it all falls apart.
String.Dest: 但是一群各怀鬼胎的战士可不是和你并肩作战的伙伴。没有荣誉感，他们会在瞬间被冲的七零八落。

String.Source: I really like the layout of this tavern. Apparently, so did the Falmer!
String.Dest: 我真的很喜欢这家酒馆儿的设计。显然，那些雪精灵也是这么想的！

String.Source: Blood, chains, and bones. One of these bandits has a hobby. He might even be a cannibal. But at least Leifnarr got off easy, judging by that arrow.
String.Dest: 血，锁链，还有尸骨。这帮强盗之中有人有特殊的癖好。甚至可能是一个食人族。但至少雷夫纳尔逃脱了，从那支箭来看。

String.Source: Not everyday you find this in your basement. What are they digging for? I don't see any ore. But I do see a corpse.
String.Dest: 你不是每天都能在你家地下室里找到这玩意儿的。他们挖什么呢？我什么矿石也没有看到，但我见到了一具死尸。

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？

String.Source: A Dwarven ruin! Wait, you want to go inside? (Laughs) Very well. If the future promises mortals death, then we ought to slay it before it makes good.
String.Dest: 一个锻莫遗迹！等下，你想进去？（笑）赞，如果未来已为凡人的死亡许下诺言，那就让我们在命运达成愿望之前先宰了他！

String.Source: It will be good to see Dalum-Ei again. I don't think I ever said goodbye.
String.Dest: 能再看见达卢姆艾真的挺好的。我想我还没跟他道别呢。

String.Source: Hm...it looks like they didn't hear us knock. What a shame. Let's rattle a bone chime or two.
String.Dest: 哎……似乎他们没听到我们敲门啊。真遗憾啊。我们不如敲敲骨灰坛吧。

String.Source: It's a bit strange that there aren't more guards posted on this road.
String.Dest: 这条路上没有更多的守卫巡逻这点有些奇怪啊。

String.Source: Mercy!
String.Dest: 饶命啊！我祈求你的怜悯

String.Source: I admit, I was tempted to believe it. However, after talking with you and getting a fresh perspective, it's clear Indrel was wrong.
String.Dest: 确实，我之前被忽悠了。但是在跟你谈完之后，我的智商又回来了……英卓尔肯定错了。

String.Source: Was it something I said?
String.Dest: 是我讲错话了吗？

String.Source: The bandits hang these bodies over the pit, so the wolves will hunger for the scent of mortal flesh. This one's a bit stale though.
String.Dest: 强盗把尸体挂在斗兽场中，好激起狼群对人类血肉的渴望，尽管这具尸体已经有点腐烂了。

String.Source: Well what do you know, they've been torturing vampires! I'm starting to like these mages!
String.Dest: 噢你知道吗，他们在折磨吸血鬼！我开始喜欢这些法师了！

String.Source: Ha! You're right, of course. But I assure you, I am no Draugr. My heart does beat, but not to the call of motherhood.
String.Dest: 哈！你当然是对的。但我向你保证，我不是尸鬼。我的心脏确实在跳动，不过这并非是出自母性。

String.Source: Look at this rack. Chains and blood. I wonder if this will make it into the museum. It should.
String.Dest: 看看这刑架。铁链和鲜血。我怀疑这东西是不是会因为这个而被送进博物馆。它应该被送进去。

String.Source: Need me to do something?
String.Dest: 需要我做些什么吗？

String.Source: And the braggart did swagger and brandish his blade, as he told of bold battles and gold he had made!
String.Dest: 大话精吹嘘他身经百战，炫耀着金币还有他的剑。

String.Source: But in all seriousness, it must have been an epic battle. I wish I could've been there and fought by your side.
String.Dest: 但说实在的，那肯定是一场史诗般的战斗。我真希望我当时能和你并肩作战啊。

String.Source: Maybe that's what the mourner's clothes were for, so when I saw them next, at least I'd be properly attired.
String.Dest: 也许那就是为什么要穿悼衣的缘故，这样我下次再见到他们时，至少我的穿着整齐得体。

String.Source: It's never about one person. Maybe that's why Dalum-Ei did what he did. He felt we were all responsible.
String.Dest: 这绝不可能是一个人的事。也许这就是为什么达卢姆艾会这么做，他觉得我们都难逃干系。

String.Source: The layout of this mining colony makes it perfect archers. Should be a good place to stock up on arrows.
String.Dest: 这个迷你阳台的格局非常适合弓箭手们。这将是一个储存弓箭的好地方。

String.Source: You win! I submit!
String.Dest: 你赢了！我认输！

String.Source: Die, vampire!
String.Dest: 去死吧，吸血鬼！

String.Source: Well, Delphine seems to think you'll do just fine, but are you sure we can't find someone, I don't know, with a little less dirt behind their ears?
String.Dest: 好吧，戴尔芬似乎认为你会做的很漂亮，但是你确定我们连个耳朵后面污垢少的家伙都找不到吗？反正我不知道。

String.Source: Who do you think this was? You'd think one of these bandits would've passed him that ale.
String.Dest: 你认为这是谁做的？你该不会觉得有哪个强盗会把这啤酒递给他吧。

String.Source: Orc strongholds are full of strong warriors. Says so right in the name.
String.Dest: 兽人要塞全是精英战士。我以我的人格担保。

String.Source: These old Nord tombs smell like sweat and flies. Always best to raid them on an empty stomach.
String.Dest: 这些远古诺德墓穴闻着一股臭汗苍蝇味儿。咱最好空着肚子进去。

String.Source: Damn. This is why I don't trust mages. I rely on my sword, and the smith who forges it, not some sick corpse ritual.
String.Dest: 该死的。这就是我不信任法师的原因。我依赖我的剑，而我的剑是靠着铁匠打造的，不是这些变态的尸体仪式。

String.Source: Lead brave one, and I will follow.
String.Dest: 你勇敢你先走啊，我就在后面跟着就好了。

String.Source: I'll see you in pieces!
String.Dest: 你会粉身碎骨的！

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Old cities, old ghosts.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。古老的城市，古老的幽灵。

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 投降或着去死吧！

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Too slow!
String.Dest: 太慢了！

String.Source: A Greybeard though, I'd probably put a little spiced wine in their supply chest. It's warm, it's refined, and it'll get you drunk all the same.
String.Dest: A Greybeard though, I'd probably put a little spiced wine in their supply chest. It's warm, it's refined, and it'll get you drunk all the same.

String.Source: Or maybe he didn't feel her hands were dirty. She was always watching our back, guarding the entrance. She never went inside.
String.Dest: Or maybe he didn't feel her hands were dirty. She was always watching our back, guarding the entrance. She never went inside.

String.Source: That it?
String.Dest: 就这样？

String.Source: Hold your ground! Keep your hands up!
String.Dest: 坚守岗位！把手举高点儿！

String.Source: Agreed.
String.Dest: 同意。

String.Source: But in the end, none of it will sound as good as battle feels.
String.Dest: 但是直到最后，没有谁会感受到那种战斗的快感。

String.Source: What could you possibly have to gain from slaying a Giant, besides a cracked skull and a handful of toes?
String.Dest: What could you possibly have to gain from slaying a Giant, besides a cracked skull and a handful of toes?

String.Source: An inn! And here I was beginning to think you never slept.
String.Dest: 一家酒馆儿！话说你真的一直都不用睡觉吗。

String.Source: Bodan wouldn't have left without leaving a note. It must be around here somewhere.
String.Dest: 波登不会不留下痕迹就离开的。这附近一定还有什么。

String.Source: When we took that away, he had every reason to hate us. But now I realize he saw our pain. No, he didn't just see it. He understood.
String.Dest: 当我们把这个拿走的时候，他有足够的理由憎恨我们……但我现在意识到他当时看到了我们的痛苦……不，不仅是看到……他彻底懂得了这种痛苦。

String.Source: I can take care of myself.
String.Dest: 我能照顾好自己。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: (Laughs) So you both enjoy the company of men?
String.Dest: (笑声) 所以你还是喜欢跟爷们在一起组团？

String.Source: Feels good, doesn't it? We helped a stranger and killed a monster. It doesn't get more satisfying than that.
String.Dest: 感觉很好是吧？帮助了一个陌生人，然后干掉了一头恶魔……简直是一本满足啊！

String.Source: Two-handed weapon, huh? It suits you. If you had a tail, I'm sure you'd find a way to wrap it around your hilt!
String.Dest: 双手武器，哼嗯？挺适合你的。如果你有尾巴，再把尾巴训练一下，你也可以弄个三刀流啊……

String.Source: Ha! Don't worry, I'll makes sure your cousin gets plenty of exercise before he chews my leg off.
String.Dest: 哈！没事！你的亲戚在把我的腿咬烂之前会刷出来不少经验值的！

String.Source: He was. I know someday, wherever the Hist takes us, we'll all see each other again, and for once, we'll never have to say goodbye.
String.Dest: 他确实是的。总有一天希斯特会带我们到达永生之国，在那里我们还会再见面，永不分离。

String.Source: Nah. I don't think so.
String.Dest: 不要，我没兴趣。

String.Source: Of all the farms around Whiterun, I like this one the best. They're the only ones that let you drink wine on the job!
String.Dest: 对于白漫城周边所有的农场我最喜欢这个。这是唯一的一个上班时间允许喝酒的地方啊！

String.Source: Surprised the chief was in here by himself. In most Strongholds it's the other way around. He must've really loved to mine.
String.Dest: 真令人惊讶，首领自己来这了啊！在很多堡垒里首领是不出现的，他看起来真的喜欢挖矿啊……

String.Source: Agreed. I didn't always think so. But you get your tail caught in enough traps, and eventually you learn to watch your step.
String.Dest: 同意。我不经常这么想。但是如果你总在同一类石头上绊倒，你就会注意脚下了。

String.Source: By the Hist!
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！

String.Source: Thane of Whiterun! (Laughs) You're a noble, and all it took was killing a dragon. Still, I'd rather do that than kiss the Jarl's ass!
String.Dest: 白漫城的领主! (笑声) 你是个贵族，但你所做的唯一一件事情就是干掉了一条龙……好吧，跟用跪舔换取身份相比，我想要获得贵族身份的话宁可去杀龙。

String.Source: Finally.
String.Dest: 终于。

String.Source: Let me know if there's anything else you need.
String.Dest: 如果你还有什么需要的话，告诉我。

String.Source: Then it's settled. I hate to say it, but I can't be a mother to the boy, and I can't teach him to control his magic.
String.Dest: 好了，安置好了。我讨厌说这个，但我做不了孩子的保姆……我也教不了他怎么控制魔法……

String.Source: (Laughter)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: I met the former Captain of the Sea Squall when it was docked at Leyawiin. Strange to see that ship now, and to see it a widow.
String.Dest: 我曾经在海风暴号停在雷拉文的时候见过前任船长……很奇怪在这又见到这艘船了，看见这艘船没了主人感觉怪怪的。

String.Source: Although by the looks of it, he's not the only one. Sellswords, traveler. Five by my count.
String.Dest: 经过观察，他可不是唯一的一个。还有佣兵呢,旅行者。至少五个。

String.Source: Shor have mercy on you!
String.Dest: 愿朔尔宽恕你的罪。

String.Source: Then we better let them know we're here.
String.Dest: 那最好是让他们知道我们在这儿。

String.Source: The best I can do is stay close, and keep my sword ready.
String.Dest: 我能做的就是保持近距离，准备好剑。

String.Source: Or maybe I'll forge a new legend, right here in this adorable little puddle the Nords call a marsh.
String.Dest: 或者我来打造一个全新的传说，就在这片诺德人称之为沼泽的可爱小水塘里。

String.Source: Let's go, traveler! He couldn't have gotten far!
String.Dest: 快走吧，旅行者！他现在还没跑远！

String.Source: I figured the only way I'd be a soldier was to train on my own. So one night I went out into the deepest swamps with nothing but a hist branch.
String.Dest: 我发现唯一能让自己愿意当兵的方法就是自己训练自己。于是有天晚上我独自走入沼泽深处，随身只带了一根希斯树枝。

String.Source: Safe travels.
String.Dest: 旅途安全。

String.Source: That's not surprising. Indrel was always wrong about everything, and just right enough to save herself.
String.Dest: 一点都不意外。英卓尔从没搞对过什么事，只是勉强能够自保而已。

String.Source: Outlanders should mind their own business.
String.Dest: 外来者们应该先管好自己的事。

String.Source: No...this says Dalum-Ei betrayed us...and Bodan...
String.Dest: 不……上面说达卢姆艾背叛了我们……还有波登...

String.Source: Get back in your hole Draugr!
String.Dest: 滚回你的坑里去尸鬼！

String.Source: Keep digging Elf, you'll find it in there somewhere.
String.Dest: 继续挖吧精灵，就在那里面你肯定找得到。

String.Source: A courage spell, is it? (Laughs) Do I look like I coward to you?
String.Dest: 壮胆法术，诶？ (笑)你看我像胆小鬼吗？

String.Source: I hope you're just as adept a healer then. Bedding a male can be filthy business. At least when it's done right.
String.Dest: 真希望你也是个熟练的治疗师。睡男人可是个脏活儿。不过至少她做了该做的事情。

String.Source: And here I thought you were going to say no. (Laughs) I've never felt my heart beat so fast!
String.Dest: 而现在我觉得你要说拒绝的话了。(笑)我从没感觉过自己的心跳得这么快！

String.Source: The one time the Gods listen to my request, and it's this of all things.
String.Dest: 只要圣灵能听我一个请求，那就是这个了吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, that solves one problem, but I don't see how I'll be much of help, after dying from shock!
String.Dest: (笑)好啊，那就解决了一个问题，不过我没看出自己帮上了什么忙……我是说在被电的半死之后！

String.Source: I remember you. You're the bard who played Bodan's song. You two are a lot alike. When he sang, every note made you feel his pain.
String.Dest: 我记得你。你是那个会唱波登的歌的吟游诗人。你俩可真像。当他唱歌的时候，每一个音符都令人感同身受他的痛。

String.Source: Ah, so you're a Companion. It's a fine honor, and a fine company.
String.Dest: 啊，原来你也是战友团的。还不错的荣誉，不错的团体啊。

String.Source: Then maybe that's the end of it. But I don't know. Powerful men have a way of lingering, even after death.
String.Dest: 也许就那样结束了吧。不过我不确定。强者自有他绵绵不绝的影响力，即使是死后。

String.Source: Sounds pretty dull to me, Dragonborn. Maybe you're better off not being royalty.
String.Dest: 我听着好没意思啊，龙裔。也许你还是别做什么皇家身份比较好。

String.Source: Why are there cages here? Doesn't this fort already have a dungeon? (Laughs) Maybe these are for recreational use!
String.Dest: 这里要这么多笼子干嘛？不是已经有地牢了么？ (笑声)不会是还有什么观赏或者娱乐的用处吧？

String.Source: There's a lot of narrow tunnels in these caves. Better for mages, usually. They don't need a lot of room to swing their arms.
String.Dest: 这些洞穴里有着大量的细小通道……简直是违法是战斗而设计的啊，完全不用考虑武器挥不挥的起来啊。

String.Source: There you go, polite as ever. The tales will talk of your bravery and aplomb, but I will remember you most for your manners! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 那么你走吧，彬彬有礼的走吧，传说只会记录你的勇敢和沉着，但我会一直记得你的那些不为人知的一面！ (笑声)

String.Source: And I reckon you'll save it. That's what heroes do, and you Dragonborn, are one for the ages.
String.Dest: 我打赌你会搞定这一切的。这才是英雄真正的意义啊……你，龙裔必会在历史上写下浓厚的一笔。

String.Source: You impress me more by the day, traveler! Tolfdir too, it seems. And that Draugr we just pummeled? Even more so!
String.Dest: 旅行者，你今天和托夫迪尔一样给我留下了深刻的印象！这个就是我们刚才秒掉的尸鬼？还有么？我还没打够呢！

String.Source: I am at your service.
String.Dest: 我为你效劳。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Traps, centurions, spiders...that's the thing about Dwarven Ruins. It's almost as if they were expecting us.
String.Dest: 陷阱，百夫长，蜘蛛……整个矮人洞穴装的都是啥玩意？他们不会是故意列队欢迎我们呢吧？！

String.Source: Look at these bandits. They had nice little camp by the water, with plenty of food and a warm fire. They thought of everything it seems. Except us.
String.Dest: 啧啧啧，看看那些强盗……洁净水源旁边的营地、足够的食物、温暖的篝火……他们居然还想要更多？当然我确信这个“更多”的名单里没有我们的存在。

String.Source: There's the beacon. Watch your tail, that things looks like it could char a skeever in less than a second.
String.Dest: 这就是那个灯塔了？小心你的尾巴，我总觉得这玩意可以在一秒之内烤熟一只雪鼠……

String.Source: I never thought I would be mourning them in this way.
String.Dest: 我可从来没想过会用这种方式悼念他们。

String.Source: This bandit likes sleeping with a Imperial corpse by his bed. I prefer a warm body, but to each his own!
String.Dest: 这个强盗喜欢跟帝国士兵的尸体睡在一起？我还是喜欢温暖的躯体，但我怀疑他两个都喜欢。

String.Source: Sure, why not.
String.Dest: 当然，为什么不呢。

String.Source: The Rueful Axe. Do you think this wizard really used it to "cure" his daughter? I mean, do you see any werewolves around here?
String.Dest: 可怜的斧子。你真觉得这个巫师用这玩意去“治愈”他的女儿？我是说，你在这周围看到任何一只狼人了么？

String.Source: Arnwulf tried to get her to drink with him, but conversely, she developed a distaste for mead.
String.Dest: 阿恩武夫想要让她陪他喝酒，不过正好相反，她开始讨厌蜜酒了。

String.Source: By the Hist! This thing can steal starlight? Well, if the weather keeps on like it has, I don't think we'll know the difference!
String.Dest: 希斯特在上！这玩意可以吸收星光？如果天气再这么保持下去，我看区别不区别的就没意义了！

String.Source: This alchemist took 3 arrows in the ribcage. Do you think he opened the door for the machines, or did they just let themselves in?
String.Dest: 这个炼金师胸口中了三箭……你觉得他把机器的门打开了还是他让他们进来了？

String.Source: I'm surprised to see Malborn made it out of that scumhole. Maybe we ought to give him a sword!
String.Dest: 马伯恩居然从那个洞穴就这么逃出来了？！我们是不是应该给他一把剑？

String.Source: The only funeral we're gonna have is for you and your friends. I swear on the honor of my company, the child will live.
String.Dest: 我们即将参加的葬礼只有你和你狐朋狗友的。以战友们的名誉发誓，那个孩子会活下来的。

String.Source: I'm sure all those prisoners you saved in Angarvunde can attest to that.
String.Dest: 我很确定你从安枷坟救出来的囚犯能够证明这一切。

String.Source: Great.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: You should try that bit on the barkeep. Maybe get yourself a free drink.
String.Dest: 你应该去酒吧老板那里去试试，也许能弄到一杯免费的饮料。

String.Source: (Laughs) Was it now? Is that modesty or bravado? With you, sometimes it's hard to tell.
String.Dest: (笑声) 现在怎么了？自谦，还是虚张声势？对你来说，有时候很难区分。

String.Source: You know, you're a fun person to drink with. I know this great little place where the wine flows like water. We should head there.
String.Dest: 你知道吗，你是个有趣的酒友。我知道个很好的小地方，那里酒流成河。我们应该去那里。

String.Source: Dalum-Ei told me that vengeance is a powerful weapon, but like all things of great strength, it has the power to consume.
String.Dest: 达卢姆艾跟我说过，仇恨是一件威力很大的武器，但是如所有的强力装备一样，它会反噬。

String.Source: It's not often someone asks me to hold on to their mammoth tusk. I'm sure there's one heck of a story behind this one.
String.Dest: 也不是经常有人要求我去握他们的“猛犸牙”。只是我确信这把武器背后肯定有个见鬼的故事。

String.Source: Take a look.
String.Dest: 随意看看。

String.Source: To be honest, there's more to the name than just living in a swamp and sticking things with the pointy end.
String.Dest: 说实话，这地方可是比那只有一丁点儿立足之地的沼泽有着更多无法想象的困境。

String.Source: By the Hist, look. A Dwarven city.
String.Dest: 哦，我的天哪。一座矮人城市。

String.Source: Fort Hraggstad. The air's thin up here. Hope you brought a stamina potion.
String.Dest: 哈格斯塔德堡垒. 这里的空气是愈发稀薄了。但愿你有带着耐力药剂。

String.Source: Skeleton archers, up and down the wall. I say we charge ahead and drop them before they get a chance to aim.
String.Dest: 骷髅弓箭手，城墙上到处都是。我觉得我们应该直接冲过去，在他们有机会瞄准之前干掉他们。

String.Source: Don't pay any attention to the Elf. Mages have their way of doing things, and we have ours.
String.Dest: 不要太在意那个精灵。魔法师们都有自己的一套，当然我们也有。

String.Source: What do you want?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: (Laughs) What if we put it in a canteen, and made it look like it was water? You know, the way mothers trick their hatchlings into taking medicine?
String.Dest: (笑声) 要是我们把它放到水罐里，然后让它看起来像水一样会怎么样？你懂得，这是那些妈妈让她们的小崽子吃药的方法。

String.Source: Enjoy the party. Drink up! You deserve it.
String.Dest: 好好享受这场宴会。干杯！这是你应得的。

String.Source: You're out of you league!
String.Dest: 你背叛了组织！

String.Source: Sure thing. A little homemade soup, fresh from the swamp.
String.Dest: 当然每次。一碗家常热汤，新鲜的沼泽料理。

String.Source: What, that dragon trying to bite your head off wasn't evidence enough?
String.Dest: 什么，那龙差点咬下你的脑袋还不够证明的吗？

String.Source: If only we Argonians had thought of the same! We'd have no use for those pesky boats!
String.Dest: 我们亚龙人怎么就不能心往一块想呢！那样就用不着这些讨厌的破船了！

String.Source: That's enough!
String.Dest: 够了！

String.Source: You know what Orthorn, your Arch-Mage doesn't even know you exist. That's how insignificant you are. Face it, you're a test subject. Kill yourself.
String.Dest: 你知道什么啊奥松恩,首席大法师甚至都不知道你的存在。太没存在感了……面对现实吧骚年，你就是个实验品罢了。自我了断吧。

String.Source: By this Hist! Were you sleeping in that lake?
String.Dest: 我的希斯特大神啊！你是在湖底睡觉吗？

String.Source: The Windpeak Inn is rather lively tonight, and thanks to you, all these folks can look forward to a good night's sleep.
String.Dest: 今晚的风岳旅店可真热闹。多亏了你啊，这里的乡亲们都能放心睡个好觉了。

String.Source: A letter... not sure who from. He wouldn't say. Just that he was a friend of yours.
String.Dest: 一封信……不知道是谁寄来的。他似乎有意隐瞒。只是自称是你的一个朋友。

String.Source: So what are we dealing with, necromancers?
String.Dest: 那我们到底在对付什么人啊，亡灵巫师？

String.Source: Maybe for you two, but I don't see any other Argonians here.
String.Dest: 也许你俩是例外，我平时真没在这儿见过亚龙人。

String.Source: This Forsworn camp overlooks Rorikstead, but that isn't part of the Reach. Something tells me these Bretons have their eyes trained elsewhere.
String.Dest: 这个弃誓者营地能俯瞰整个洛利克镇，可那不是瑞驰的地盘。看来这帮布莱顿人还是有野心啊。

String.Source: I could take her.
String.Dest: 我能带走她。

String.Source: You're gonna like this place. It's called "Honorhall." Let's hope it lives up to the name.
String.Dest: 你肯定会喜欢这里的。它的名字是 "荣耀大厅"。 希望在这儿能生活得名副其实吧。

String.Source: Of course, I didn't believe him. But unlike these bandits, I wasn't drunk on skooma.
String.Dest: 当然了，我不是相信他。但跟别的强盗不同，我也没喝醉过斯库玛。

String.Source: Die, beast!
String.Dest: 去死吧，畜生！

String.Source: Those candles...it looks like some sort of dark ritual, traveler. Be on your guard.
String.Dest: 那些蜡烛…看来是某种黑暗仪式，旅行者。注意防范。

String.Source: True enough, but you can't let it consume you either. At some point, you have to move on.
String.Dest: 确实如此，不过你也不可以受到它的侵蚀。很多时候，你必须放下。

String.Source: That tickles. You and your crazy magic.
String.Dest: 好痒……你和你那疯狂的法术。

String.Source: Are those parts ready yet?
String.Dest: 那些部件准备好了吗？

String.Source: And seeing that temple of blood, it was a reminder of how dangerous this world can be.
String.Dest: 看着那座鲜血的神殿，就能随时提醒人们记得这个世界有多么的危险。

String.Source: The same is true for the old company, and the same is true for home. Whether it's in this world or the next, we'll all be together again.
String.Dest: 对我的老朋友是一样，对家人也是一样。不管是这个世界还是来生转世，我们总有一天会重聚。

String.Source: Ah, you speak of the rootworm. Not a preferred method of travel, on account of speed. Smuggler's prefer the secrecy, however.
String.Dest: 啊，你说的那是食根虫。不算是个旅行的好方式，速度不行。只不过玩走私的觉得比较隐蔽而已。

String.Source: For blood! For glory!
String.Dest: 为了血！为了荣誉！

String.Source: Twelve septims on my partner!
String.Dest: 12个金币押我的搭档胜！

String.Source: We aren't leaving without your head!
String.Dest: 不取了你的狗命我们是不会罢休的！

String.Source: Before, I didn't really get it. I mean, he was traveling with those refugees, trying to find a place far away from Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 之前我确实没能理解。我的意思是，他与这些难民一起旅行，希望能找到一个远离塞洛狄省的地方。

String.Source: I imagine towers like Bannermist used to be important defensive outposts before the Empire united this land. Well, it may be of some use soon enough.
String.Dest: 我觉着在帝国还未统治这片土地时，像旗霭塔那样的塔应该是一个重要的防御前哨站，说不定不久之后它就会重回它原本的角色。

String.Source: You could pay the sellswords to leave, but they'd just come back the moment they ran out of gold. If you want them gone, you pay them with steel.
String.Dest: 你可以付钱让那些雇佣兵离开，但一旦他们手头的钱花完了就又会回来找你。如果你想要让他们永远消失，那你就得用剑来对付他们。

String.Source: Okay, I'll go now.
String.Dest: 好吧，我现在走。

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
String.Dest: 打啊！打！

String.Source: Besides, all that time on the road, and not once was the boy afraid. Not of me, not of Elia, and certainly not of himself.
String.Dest: 此外，在这整一段旅途中，男孩一次都没有害怕过。我也没有，伊利亚也没有，更别说他自己了。

String.Source: Take that!
String.Dest: 接招！

String.Source: Vampires?
String.Dest: 吸血鬼？

String.Source: Not this again.
String.Dest: 别又来这一套。

String.Source: But this is something I have to see to the end.
String.Dest: 但我是不撞南墙不会回头的。

String.Source: Good to see it isn't just soldiers who are preparing for a war against stationary targets!
String.Dest: 看来在为这场以固定靶子为对象做准备的人并不仅仅只有士兵们啊，这可真让人高兴！

String.Source: Greetings, brave traveler. My clan once knew me as Anum-La. The fighters I stand beside, however, call me The Swamp Knight.
String.Dest: 你好，勇敢的旅行者。在我的氏族里他们称呼我为阿努姆拉。而那个与我并肩作战的斗士，则叫我沼泽骑士。

String.Source: Fair enough. Then let's find this murdering lord, and test both our mettle.
String.Dest: 很公平。那就让我们把这家伙打得落花流水来测测我们的胆量吧。

String.Source: So there's unnatural noises and lights coming from Wolfskull cave. Figures. You buy a nice house in a good area, and the neighbors are all witches!
String.Dest: 从狼头骨洞穴里会传来奇怪的声响，也会有奇怪的光亮。显然。你在一个不错的地段买了一幢不错的房子，而你的邻居还都是女巫！

String.Source: Then we band together one last time. We take the fight to anyone and everyone who dares kill one of our own!
String.Dest: 最后一次，我们会联合起来。和任何胆敢杀掉我们中一员的人而抗争！

String.Source: I thank you. We were no Heroes of Riverwood, but we had our time.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我们的溪木镇没有英雄，但我们有我们的时间。

String.Source: You're a true friend. Even better, you're a strong one. This Baron has no idea who he's messing with.
String.Dest: 你是个真正的朋友。不只如此，你还很强。这个拜伦可不知道他在找谁的麻烦。

String.Source: Why won't you die already?
String.Dest: 你怎么还不去死？

String.Source: Sometimes not even that! Did you see that thing rise up out of the ground? I'm not so sure it was ever alive!
String.Dest: 有时并不是这样！你看到那个东西从地上爬起来了吗？我可不知道它到底是不是活物！

String.Source: This might sound like a stupid question, but who's Arnleif? Really, is there an Arnleif here? I'd like to speak to an Arnleif. Any Arnleif will do.
String.Dest: 或许这听上去很蠢，但谁是阿雷夫？说真的，有个阿雷夫在这儿吗？我想和阿雷夫说说话。随便来个阿雷夫就行。

String.Source: Some say Dragon Bridge is as old as the Hist, but that's just the Nords waving their branches. Someone should inform them it's not a contest!
String.Dest: 有人说龙桥跟希斯特一样古老。但那只是诺德人在夸夸其谈。应该有人告诉他们这没啥好争的！

String.Source: Drunk already, huh? Save some for the rest of us!
String.Dest: 已经喝了，哼嗯？留一些给我们啊！

String.Source: Are you listening?
String.Dest: 你在听吗？

String.Source: Yes, my Thane?
String.Dest: 怎么了，武卫大人？

String.Source: You seem tense. Join a booth and relax a bit. Or did you need another fix?
String.Dest: 你看起来很僵硬。选一个包厢，放轻松点吧。还是你还要再来点乐子？

String.Source: If he's a former Thane, then he isn't all that important anymore, is he? Unless there's something else you're hiding.
String.Dest: 如果他是前任领主的话，他就不是那么重要了，不是吗？除非你隐藏了别的什么。

String.Source: In any case, I think you're right. If we see a dragon, it's best to swing first and apologies after.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我认为你是对的。如果我们看到龙，最好先走位后道歉。

String.Source: We're not supposed to talk to the guests.
String.Dest: 我们不能与客人们交谈

String.Source: Name it, and it shall be done.
String.Dest: 起个名字吧，这事儿一定要做。

String.Source: That's an impressive piece of rock! It reminds me of tales of old towers that pierce the sky, and every level has a new challenge.
String.Dest: 这真是块让人印象深刻的石头！这使我想起了那个古老的高塔刺穿天空，每一层都有一个新挑战的故事。

String.Source: May the Hist guide us.
String.Dest: 愿希思特指引我们。

String.Source: Sure, the Greybeards may be our elders, and have probably forgotten more things than we'll ever learn, but we know what's best for them.
String.Dest: 当然，灰胡子可能是我们的长辈，忘了的东西比我们学到的还多，但我们知道什么是对他们最好的。

String.Source: You're back.
String.Dest: 你回来了。

String.Source: Of course! Riding a chaurus is just like riding a horse. All you need is a saddle and a strong resistance to poison.
String.Dest: 当然了！骑着查鲁斯的感觉跟骑马没什么两样。你只需要一个马鞍和强效的抗毒药剂。

String.Source: Traveling with you, and righting wrongs, that's how I want to honor the fallen.
String.Dest: 和你云游四海，匡扶正义，并将以此荣耀逝者。

String.Source: Wouldn't be the first time someone kept a secret from me. I need to get you drunk more!
String.Dest: 这也不是第一次有人想要在我面前守住秘密了。我应该让你再多来几杯！

String.Source: By the Nine...
String.Dest: 以九圣灵之名……

String.Source: Not at all. I am sorry, Companion. I misled the three of you earlier, when I said I could not find Indrel.
String.Dest: 没关系，战友，抱歉，之前当我说我找不到英卓尔的时候，我误导了你们。

String.Source: For Kodlak!
String.Dest: 为了克拉科！

String.Source: Is that all?
String.Dest: 就这样？

String.Source: But they were all loyal. And they were all honorable. They were good beasts, mer and men.
String.Dest: 但他们心中充满忠诚。而且他们心中充满荣耀。他们是优秀的兽类，精灵和人类。

String.Source: Bodan once took down half a dozen men in the middle of a song, before finishing his set. He won't have much trouble with these sellswords.
String.Dest: 波登曾用半首歌的时间解决了六个人，他都没唱完组曲。他要搞定这几个佣兵一定不会费吹灰之力。

String.Source: Bodan may think his prayers went unanswered, but the force of that song made the Hist listen.
String.Dest: 波登也许会想他的祷告从未被回应，但那首歌蕴含的力量让使得希斯特神树倾听。

String.Source: Got it.
String.Dest: 了解。

String.Source: Vampires! If ever there were a more wretched monster, I'd probably faint at the sight of him. So try not to look in my direction.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼！没有比这更卑劣的怪物了，他看我一眼我都可能晕过去。所以不要看我不要看我不要看我。

String.Source: Well, there might be nothing to it, but I've heard that the feud between the Gray-Manes and the Battle-Borns in Whiterun has grown ugly.
String.Dest: 嗯……也许没什么消息吧，但我听说雪漫城里灰鬃和战狂两家的梁子是越结越深了。

String.Source: Oh no, don't look at me.
String.Dest: 喔不，别盯着我看。

String.Source: Next time the boy should just shout where he wants to meet. I think only half of the city saw him pass you that note.
String.Dest: 那个男孩下次该大吼着要去哪里见他了。我觉得大半个城市都看见他给你递了那张纸条。

String.Source: I'll have some mead.
String.Dest: 我需要一些蜂蜜酒。

String.Source: Good.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Well, will you look at that. I think one of these bandits just invented the wheel!
String.Dest: 好吧,你看看那个. 我猜其中一个强盗刚刚发明了这个轮子!

String.Source: Or maybe that's what you're afraid of! Give them one beer, and all of a sudden it's raining monks.
String.Dest: 或者说这正是你所担心的! 给他们一扎啤酒，然后他们马上就全都不省人事了。

String.Source: An Oblivion gate? What's she talking about, mage?
String.Dest: 湮灭之门？法师啊，你在说些什么？

String.Source: Well, I've dealt with a lot of mages, and most of them don't get angry unless you start poking around their stuff.
String.Dest: 呃，我面对过很多法师，其中大多数只要你不乱动他们的东西，他们是不会发火的。

String.Source: Most of all I think of you, Dragonborn. It was an honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我主要在思考你的事，龙裔。看着你战斗是我的荣耀，和你搭档是一种享受。谢谢你。

String.Source: Spiders on the table, spiders on the dresser...I'm surprised there aren't a few of them in the bed! Good to see even warlocks have their limits!
String.Dest: 桌子上，有蜘蛛；台子上，有蜘蛛……床上还有很多！真是不错，原来术士也有应付不来的东西！

String.Source: Right traveler, there's toes, cheese, and a pile of swords from all the fools who came before us.
String.Dest: 是啊旅行者，那地方有脚趾头、猛犸奶酪，和一堆之前到这里来的倒霉蛋留下的剑。

String.Source: Lead us to our next task.
String.Dest: 带我们去下一个目的地。

String.Source: You think you can take me?
String.Dest: 你觉得你能杀了我？

String.Source: I heard it's easy money, and you don't even have to be right! Just vague.
String.Dest: 我听说赚钱很容易。你甚至不用做得对！只要含糊其辞就行。

String.Source: It's a title I can get used to. I mean, there's no such thing as a "good" dragon is there?
String.Dest: 这是个我能适应的头衔。我是说，这里可没有一条“好”龙吧？

String.Source: Pretty amazing, traveler. Opening your mouth and making everything scatter. Here I thought Lurbuk was the only one who could do that!
String.Dest: 真是厉害，旅行者。张张嘴，一切都烟消云散。我还以为只有卢布克能做到呢！

String.Source: That the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了吗？

String.Source: And of course, Dalum-Ei, for taking pity on a little hatchling from the swamp and showing her the way.
String.Dest: 还有达卢姆艾，当然了。记得他是因为他给我这个沼泽来的小可怜虫展示了前路。

String.Source: Ohhh... that's good stuff. Believe me friend, I've tried it all and this is the best.
String.Dest: 喔……这是好东西。相信我，朋友。我全都尝试过了，我知道这是最好的。

String.Source: But the one I'll always remember fondly is the day we were delivering sacks of potions to a village full of Dunmer refugees.
String.Dest: 我印象最深的应该是那天我们把大袋的药剂分发给暗精灵难民。

String.Source: So these ghosts want to test our valor? (Laughs) Fine by me.
String.Dest: 这些鬼魂想试试我们是不是勇猛？（笑声）我倒是无所谓。

String.Source: Looks like I was wrong about Orthorn. He had a use after all.
String.Dest: 我好像错怪奥松恩了。他还是有点用的。

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说吧。

String.Source: Alright Orthorn, I'm officially stumped. How is it you're still alive? Because you're completely useless. This Caller must be your sister.
String.Dest: 好吧奥松恩, 我被气乐了。知道你还活着的原因么？因为你太没用了……懒得杀你。这个召唤者一定是你姐姐。

String.Source: It's some kind of blood sacrifice. The Falmer used to be Elves. And just as their hearts have turned black, so has their magic.
String.Dest: 那是一种血祭。伐莫曾经是精灵族。当它们的心灵被黑暗扭曲的时候，它们的魔法也是。

String.Source: We have our wedding soon, don't we? That's right, we do!
String.Dest: 我们快结婚了，不是吗？就快了！

String.Source: Very much so, and thank you for asking.
String.Dest: 正是如此，谢谢你的邀请。

String.Source: Is that you're way of saying I'm too loud? (Laughs) Maybe you have a point. Who needs an Elder Scroll when you have lizard lungs!
String.Dest: 你是在暗示我声音太大吗？（笑）你说不定没错。如果有蜥蜴的肺活量，就算是上古卷轴又能算什么呢！

String.Source: See you around, my beauty.
String.Dest: 再见了美人儿。

String.Source: What's a few dozen toadies against a Swamp Knight, anyway? But I'm sure with you doing the sneaking, it won't be necessary.
String.Dest: 是不是有一大堆马屁精在那里反对沼泽骑士啊？但你偷偷潜伏进去听这些乌七八糟的东西还真是辛苦你了……

String.Source: You know, I'm beginning to suspect that bandits just aren't very smart.
String.Dest: 知道吗，我开始发现强盗们脑子都不大灵光了。

String.Source: Those were spider eggs outside, and a dead mammoth beside them. Whatever's in this cave promises to be as huge as it is ugly.
String.Dest: 外面有蜘蛛卵，旁边是头死掉的长毛象。山洞里不管是什么肯定都又大又丑。

String.Source: But it's time I stopped mourning. The company, the refugees...that's all in the past now.
String.Dest: 可我是时候从哀痛中走出来了。伙伴们，难民们……现在都是过去式了。

String.Source: But when travelers from strange lands used the term, their words spoke with a tone heavy with reverence. That's how I wanted them to speak about me.
String.Dest: 但是当异乡旅行者度过了这段时间，他们的语言里就带有了浓浓的尊敬。这就是我想让他们谈谈我的原因。

String.Source: I think of faces and names. I think of friends. Seems to me a lot of the faces have more skin than scales.
String.Dest: 我会想到面庞和名字，想到朋友们。貌似其中许多脸孔不属于长着鳞片的亚龙人。

String.Source: I hope there aren't any more.
String.Dest: 我希望没有更多。

String.Source: Some may ask why I'm a knight without armor. Others contend I wear the mourner's clothes to honor the brave warriors I slay.
String.Dest: 有些人会问我为什么作为一个骑士却不穿盔甲。而另一些人则认为我穿着丧服是为了表达我对那些被我所杀的英勇战士们的纪念。

String.Source: What is this, some kind of throne? I don't know if it was big enough to hold Movarth's ego.
String.Dest: 这是啥，某种君主头衔么？我不知道这种头衔能不能够装下莫瓦斯那膨胀的自负。

String.Source: Outside of maybe Benor, the townsfolk are just that. Townsfolk. And even Benor's biggest weapon is that mudcrab he calls a face!
String.Dest: 就连本诺，那帮镇民也一样对待。那帮镇民们。本诺最大的武器就是他称为脸面的那只泥沼蟹啊。

String.Source: So, our friend wants to meet in Riverwood. It's a quiet place, but one where you might let your guard down. I don't like it, Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 那么，我们的朋友想在河木镇碰面。那是个安静的地方，但要到那个地方去你就不能带上你的护卫。我可不喜欢这一点啊，龙裔。

String.Source: There were even retired assassins from the renowned Shadowscales of legend. But none knew of who I was, or why I was recruited to join the company.
String.Dest: 这儿甚至还有一些从富有盛名、带有传奇色彩的影鳞中抽身而退的杀手们。但没有人知道我是谁以及我加入这个组织的原因。

String.Source: If you want to do monstrous things, I want no part of it. That goes without saying. But you weren't asking for my opinion about you.
String.Dest: 如果你真的打算像怪物一样行事，那可别问我要不要参与，因为就算你问了我，我也会拒绝的。但你可没问我对于你的看法。

String.Source: It was an honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 能够见识到你战斗时的英勇身姿真是荣幸之至，能让你陪伴我左右更是让我勇气倍增。非常感谢你。

String.Source: (Laughs) I've seen drunken jesters with more grace! The poor fool came to the desert and thought he didn't need any boots!
String.Dest: (大笑) 我可没见过喝醉了的小丑还能摆出这么优雅的姿势来！那个白痴居然没穿靴子就跑进了沙漠里！

String.Source: Yes, I agree with you. Have you heard any news from the other parts of Skyrim?
String.Dest: 对，我同意。你有什么天际那边的消息吗？

String.Source: I suppose so, yes.
String.Dest: 我想是的。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: In any case, let's go back to Morthal. If this Baron isn't responsible, maybe Bodan knows who is.
String.Dest: 无论如何，让我们会墨索尔城去吧。若这个男爵并不可靠，那说不定波登会知道谁才比较可靠。

String.Source: That is, not unless someone takes them, and I won't stand idly by while they do.
String.Dest: 不过呢，除非有人从我身边把它们拿走，但我可不会放任它们就那样消失。

String.Source: Dark sorcery was at work on this table. You might want to stick a dagger in that body. Who knows if it's really dead.
String.Dest: 黑魔法正在这张桌子上起效呢。你或许想要把一把匕首插进那具尸体里。鬼才晓得那家伙到底死没死。

String.Source: When I told him of what happened, he asked that I warn you and Elia, whereas he would stay and search for Indrel.
String.Dest: 当我告诉他发生了什么之后，他要我去警告你和艾拉，他则去搜寻英卓尔.

String.Source: I will cut off your tail, cat!
String.Dest: 我会把你的尾巴给砍下来的，你这只死猫！

String.Source: I've heard Windhelm is unkind to Argonians. Nonsense! Why, the other day a landstrider offered to spit in my drink! In Black Marsh, they don't ask.
String.Dest: 我听说风舵城对亚龙人并不友好。胡扯！问我为什么那样说？某天一只爬行类问我能不能在我杯子里吐一口痰！要是在黑沼泽省，他们在那样做之前问都不会问呢。

String.Source: He would play a song that wasn't part of his normal routine. A solemn dirge about a lost love. A song so sad it moved the trees to tears.
String.Dest: 他所演奏的那首曲子并不在他平时的曲目单中。那是一曲关于依然逝去的恋情的哀歌。那首歌是如此地悲伤，以至于甚至能让古树潸然落泪。

String.Source: Black-Briar mead or Honningbrew mead, it doesn't really matter. In the end, it's still mead! Not even the Gourmet can make gutter bile tasty!
String.Dest: 黑荆棘酒或是蜂蜜酒，这无所谓。反正它们都是蜜酒嘛！就连高梅特也不可能用那种下水道的污水变出美味来！

String.Source: That's impossible.
String.Dest: 这不可能。

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 你也就是个传说了！

String.Source: Gimme a mug of ale.
String.Dest: 给我来杯酒。

String.Source: If that's the case, we ought to get you a crown! And servants! And one of those big thrones from where you can give orders to them!
String.Dest: 如果这是真的，我们该推举你为王！再给你些侍从! 还有一个可以向大家发号施令的大王座!

String.Source: I never knew Bodan to be that generous! We better hurry, or he might kill this assassin too! That old bard always did hog the glory!
String.Dest: 我不认为波登会宽容别人！我们最好快点，不然他会把这个刺客也杀了！老不死吟遊诗人总想抢头功!

String.Source: Then let's go, love. Let the Hist guide us both.
String.Dest: 好的出发，亲爱的。让神指引我们。

String.Source: Speech!
String.Dest: 说话！

String.Source: I'd say this was a strange place for a Giant camp, but then again, what do I know? This might be the perfect place for them to be.
String.Dest: 我想说，这里作为一个巨人营地来说太奇怪了，但是，谁知道呢？或许这对他们来说是个绝佳的地点。

String.Source: Whiterun, jewel of Skyrim. Home of the Skyforge and the Companions, but also, the best salmon steak this side of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 白漫城，天际的一颗宝石。战友团和天空熔炉的所在地，当然，也是泰姆瑞尔最美味的三文鱼排的所在地。

String.Source: May they journey forth together in this life and the next, in prosperity and poverty, and in joy and hardship.
String.Dest: 愿他们无论贫穷还是富有，顺境还是逆境，都能相伴一生。

String.Source: But seeing all that blood, it's enough to make us all drunkards. For me, it was that cave all over again.
String.Dest: 但是你看那些血，足够我们全部喝醉了。对于我来说, 这只是重蹈那洞里的覆辙。

String.Source: He wasn't like Elia, who treasured the company, or Dalum-Ei, who fought only for honor.
String.Dest: 他不喜欢艾拉，她只重视战友团, 还有达卢姆艾,达卢姆艾只会为荣誉而战。

String.Source: A warm fire, wine and cheese. Looks like whoever runs this bandit crew isn't too bright. You never want your sentries to feel comfortable.
String.Dest: 温暖的炉子，酒还有奶酪。看来这伙强盗的头头不够聪明啊。哨兵永远不该呆的过于舒服。

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: We were on the trail of a kidnapper, and didn't have much time. But I was acting like a hatchling, and he let me know it.
String.Dest: 我们当时在跟踪一个绑匪，而且时间紧迫。但我却像个臭小子一样笨拙，是他让我认识到了这一点。

String.Source: We heading out?
String.Dest: 我们启程吗？

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of danger inside, I hope.
String.Dest: 看呐。一个山洞。我希望里面够危险。

String.Source: Bastard!
String.Dest: 混账！

String.Source: I used to tell Arnwulf he was ugly enough to be one! (Laughs) He never laughed so hard.
String.Dest: 我曾跟阿恩武夫说他丑的就像个兽人。（笑声）从没见过他笑得那么生硬。

String.Source: I heard this tavern was full of drunken soldiers and nightly bar fights. Looks like it's much worse. The place is practically empty!
String.Dest: 我听说这家酒馆里满是酩酊大醉的士兵和夜间斗殴的事情。但实际情况好像比这更糟。这里完全是空的！

String.Source: And I am honored to meet one so fragile as to think squashing bugs requires bravery.
String.Dest: 能见到胆小得连碾碎一只虫子都要鼓足勇气的人真是我的荣幸。

String.Source: My hero, that wasn't very nice what you did to Orthorn. Although it wasn't very nice of him to steal the books, either.
String.Dest: 我的大英雄，你对奥松恩做的事情可不是很……敞亮。好吧我承认他偷书的行为也不是很敞亮。

String.Source: That's why, when this party is over, I'm headed back to the Rift.
String.Dest: 这就是宴会一结束，我就要赶去裂谷城的原因。

String.Source: But as I said the day we met, despite what Bodan may think, in the end the sheer force of that song drove the Hist to listen.
String.Dest: 不过正如我们第一次见面时我说的那样，不管波登是怎么想的，那首歌的澎湃力量最终让希斯特圣树侧耳聆听。

String.Source: I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 我就在你的后面。

String.Source: Maybe for you, but I like to fight at close range.
String.Dest: 对你而言也许吧，但我更喜欢贴身战斗。

String.Source: When Arnwulf said something that didn't make sense, he could always blame it on the mead. This Septimus should leave more bottles lying around.
String.Dest: 当阿恩武夫说一些毫无意义的事的时候，他总是把这归咎于蜜酒身上。这个金币旁边应该放多些瓶子。

String.Source: Well said, traveler. Dalum-Ei had his honor, and I had mine. Either way, I'm glad you were here with me, to help me defend it.
String.Dest: 说的好，旅行者。达卢姆艾有他的荣耀，而我也有我的。无论如何，我很高兴你和我来这儿，帮我捍卫我的荣耀。

String.Source: Up until now I've been going in circles. It's you who's pointed me toward the path of redemption. And I promise I won't ever lose my way.
String.Dest: 直到现在，我一直在兜圈子。是你给我指出了走向救赎之路。我保证不会再失去自己的方向了。

String.Source: Maybe it's because they were weak. Maybe dragons were the original milk-drinkers. Only one way to find out.
String.Dest: 也许是因为他们很弱。也许这些龙的本质其实就是个吃奶的货。只有一个办法能找出答案。

String.Source: Funny, I never noticed these spheres have crossbows on their arms until now. Why don't they use them? Ha, what am I saying. Better they don't.
String.Dest: 真有趣，直到现在我才注意到这些金属球儿胳膊上架着弩呢。他们为什么不用呢？哈，我在说什么。他们不用才是最好的。

String.Source: Safe travels, kid. Be good to your new guardian.
String.Dest: 旅途平安，孩子。对你新的监护人好点儿。

String.Source: Sometimes it pays to look in every nook and cranny.
String.Dest: 到处都仔细找找总是有收获的。

String.Source: Moments later, Arnwulf slumped down the tree, a gash running across the breadth of his face! He ran to Elia, of course, but she refused to heal him.
String.Dest: 片刻之后，阿恩武夫从树上跌了下来，一道伤口深深的横过了他的脸！他当然赶紧跑到伊利亚跟前，但她却拒绝为他治疗。

String.Source: The banner of Markarth is bronze, green, and gold. The same colors as a lunatic! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 马卡斯城的旗帜是青、绿、金相间的。跟它的愚蠢正搭！(笑声)

String.Source: We're heading out? My scales are itching for a fight. It's that or a bad case of Rust Chancre! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 我们要走了吗？我的鳞片对战斗的渴望已无法抑制。 或许这对鲁斯特·查克利来说是挺糟糕的！(笑声)

String.Source: Safe travels, all of you.
String.Dest: 你们都要注意安全。

String.Source: But I jest, Dragonborn. Truth is, I get what you're saying. No one's seen a dragon in thousands of years. They might not all be godless killers!
String.Dest: 但我是开玩笑的，龙裔。事实上，我知道你在说什么。几千年以来，没人见过龙。也许他们并不都是邪恶的杀手！

String.Source: And by "we" I take it you mean "me?"
String.Dest: 你说“我们”？我想你的意思是……“我”？

String.Source: Don't make me laugh!
String.Dest: 别逗了！

String.Source: (Laughs) Where would we flee to? It seems like the dragon's the one who can fly.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我们应该逃到哪儿去？似乎那个人可以像龙一样的飞。

String.Source: I can block fire, maybe even dodge it, but I don't think I can fight my way out of a dragon's stomach!
String.Dest: 我可以格挡掉火焰，甚至躲开它，但我不认为我能从一条龙的肚子里逃出来！

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: You might tell yourself it's okay, because you need the gold more than they do, and what you do is more important.
String.Dest: 你可以告诉自己没什么大不了的，因为你比他们更需要钱。而你所做的事也比他们更重要。

String.Source: Well, I've seen ringing plants and singing Orcs, so a talking mudcrab wouldn't be the craziest thing I've come across, but it'd be up there.
String.Dest: 呃，我见过会发声的植物和会唱歌的兽人，所以一个会说话的泥沼蟹不会是我遇到的最疯狂的事，但这也足够疯狂了。

String.Source: (Laughs) Mages can wield the elements, they can come back from the dead as flying wraiths, and it still won't save them from old fashioned steel.
String.Dest: (笑声)法师可以支配元素，他们可以像是漂浮的幽灵一般从尸体之中回归，而这依旧不能把他们从老旧的钢制品之中拯救出来。

String.Source: You're bloated with disease. The Vigilant of Stendarr can help you, as long as you promise to never assist the Daedra.
String.Dest: 你已经病入膏肓了。斯丹达尔的守备人们能帮助你，但你要承诺今后不可再与魔族相勾结。

String.Source: Now that I think on it, I did hear something rather interesting the other day.
String.Dest: 让我想想，我的确听到过更加有趣的事情。

String.Source: So what now? If he's as dangerous as you say, somehow I doubt your friends will give up.
String.Dest: 现在怎么样？如果他像你说的那么危险，我怀疑你的朋友会放弃。

String.Source: As the hatchling of a small and pitiful clan, I couldn't afford to travel to the city and train under the guidance of the tribal guard.
String.Dest: 作为一个小得可怜的氏族的小孩子，我没钱到城市旅行，也没钱在部落守卫的指导下训练。

String.Source: Oh, did you need something?
String.Dest: 哦，你需要些什么？

String.Source: So be it.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Does this weapon look crooked to you? (Laughs) Everything the Orcs forge has a personality!
String.Dest: 这种武器对你而言看起来很弯吗？ (笑声) 兽人打造的每件东西都是这么有个性！

String.Source: Well, this might take some getting used to, for the both of us.
String.Dest: 呃，对我俩来说，这可能需要花些时间去适应。

String.Source: Walk always in the light, or we will drag you to it.
String.Dest: 你须行走于光明之下，否则我们必让你受光明的制裁。

String.Source: Then mark it on my companion's map. Best you let her lead the way.
String.Dest: 那就在我的同伴的地图上标记一下吧。你最好让她带路。

String.Source: On dreary nights, Bodan would lift our spirits with a song. And when he sang our spirits would indeed lift, provided Arnwulf didn't join him.
String.Dest: 在每个枯燥的夜晚，波登用歌声来鼓舞我们的精神。每当他唱完，我们的确能感觉多了些干劲儿，如果阿恩武夫没跟他一起唱的话。

String.Source: He's here?
String.Dest: 他在这儿？

String.Source: Ah, Windhelm. The Nords do love their stonework! How many blocks does one have to stack upon each other before it's declared a work of art?
String.Dest: 噢，风盔城。诺德人确实很喜欢他们的石雕工艺！在它被宣布是种艺术作品之前，有多少块彼此堆叠在一起了啊？

String.Source: Let's go. I don't want him to see me when he wakes up. It'll just make things more confusing.
String.Dest: 我们走吧。我不想要他醒来的时候看见我。这只会让事情变得更加混乱复杂。

String.Source: Friend or foe, I don't think I'll be able to avoid this stranger for long. Not if he knows where I live!
String.Dest: 无论是朋友还是敌人，我不认为我可以避开这个陌生人太长时间。要是他知道我住在那里的话!

String.Source: Traps or no, bandits usually post sentries in and outside the cave.
String.Dest: 是陷阱，或者啥都没有。强盗通常都在山洞内外设置岗哨。

String.Source: (Laughs) Fair enough.
String.Dest: (笑声)很公平。

String.Source: A healing spell. Thank you, brave companion.
String.Dest: 治疗法术。谢谢你，勇敢的同伴。

String.Source: Eventually I realized I could've walked right into the Sea of Ghosts, and the little histcarp would've dove right in.
String.Dest: 最后我才想到我本可以径直进幽灵之海，然后那个小家伙就会掉到里头。

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然了。

String.Source: Nothing we were involved with in our little neck of the swamp.
String.Dest: 我们在沼泽的那块小地方里与世无争。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Zora asked me to hand out drinks. Sure, it's not the best job, but it sure beats cleaning up.
String.Dest: 佐拉让我去分发饮料。当然，这不是最好的活计，不过至少比收拾残局强。

String.Source: Moon-Tail was much the same. His words were as slippery as his scales.
String.Dest: 月尾差不多也是这样。他的言辞就和他的鳞片一样油滑。

String.Source: Magic spiders, huh. Usually it takes about three bottles of skooma before you see one. But not in this place.
String.Dest: 魔法蜘蛛，哼。一般来说在你喝下三瓶斯库玛之前不会轻易看到这种东西。不过在这里可不是。

String.Source: Let's move.
String.Dest: 出发吧。

String.Source: It would take an army to capture a fort this large. Which means we'll have to clear an army of bandits to liberate it.
String.Dest: 想要俘获这么大的堡垒需要一整支军队。也就是说我们需要干掉一支军队那么多的强盗才能解放它。

String.Source: However, while mourning one friend, there came news of two more. Arnwulf and Moon-Tail had perished as well.
String.Dest: 但是，当我参加一个老朋友的葬礼时，还有两个的消息也过来了…… 阿恩武夫和月尾……也……

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: So this vampire lord kept his own little bowl of blood next to him while he napped.
String.Dest: 所以说这个吸血鬼领主在打瞌睡的时候都会把他盛血的小盆放在自己身边。

String.Source: Good luck.
String.Dest: 祝你好运。

String.Source: There were members who served as honor guards for tribal chieftains, and those who trained under guild masters and various regiments of the Empire.
String.Dest: 有为部落首领服务的仪仗队成员，有经过工会大师严格训练的人，也有许许多多帝国军团的人。。

String.Source: There were several Khajiit camped outside the walls of Whiterun. Seems they've been traveling around the whole of Skyrim peddling their wares.
String.Dest: 有几个虎人在雪漫城外面扎营了。他们贩卖货物的足迹遍布整个天际。

String.Source: Undaunted, I told them the story of how I trained to become a knight. I used that exact word. In truth, I'd only heard the word "knight" in passing.
String.Dest: 鼓起勇气，我给他们讲了我被如何被训练为一名骑士的故事。我确实用了那个词。实际上，我以前只是听说过“骑士”这个字眼。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Should we flip a coin, traveler? Heads takes on the mages, tails gets whatever's coming out of these coffins.
String.Dest: 我们应该抛硬币吗，旅行者？正面就去找那些法师，反面就去料理那些棺材里跑出来的玩意儿。

String.Source: Why? They're practically dead already! And besides, they want to help you! Sometimes the things you say make no sense at all.
String.Dest: 为什么？他们事实上已经死了！而且除此之外，他们想要帮你！有时候你说的话真是让人无法理解。

String.Source: You took the words right out of my mouth. To the next fight, traveler! I swear on the Hist it'll be a good one.
String.Dest: 话刚到我嘴边却被先你说了。让我们动身应对下一场战斗吧，旅者！我以圣树希斯特的名义发誓那一定是一场精彩的战斗。

String.Source: No, I'll be alright traveler. I just needed a moment to say goodbye.
String.Dest: 不，我会没事的。我只是需要点时间道别。

String.Source: This grove has all sorts of weird plants and fungus around it. If the creek was made of black ooze, it'd feel just like home!
String.Dest: 这块土地上生长着各种各样奇怪的植物和菌类。要是把那条消息换成一块黑色的泥地，那感觉就像我的故乡！

String.Source: It's not. And I don't mean from assassins, but from himself.
String.Dest: 并不是。我不是在说刺客，而是在说他自己。

String.Source: So, what's the plan?
String.Dest: 计划是什么？

String.Source: Everything is splendid, thank you.
String.Dest: 做的都很好，谢谢。

String.Source: Point the way.
String.Dest: 指路。

String.Source: They say to solve a conspiracy, you just have to follow the trail of gold. Seems to me all the gold in this city leads here.
String.Dest: 他们说，要解决一个阴谋，你只需要跟着黄金的踪迹走。在我看来这，这城里所有的黄金都指向了这儿。

String.Source: Indrel's words were poisonous, even though her intentions were noble.
String.Dest: 英卓尔尽管出发点是高尚的，但他的话语……充满了恶意。

String.Source: Neither would I. Traveling across Skyrim just isn't the same without you.
String.Dest: 我也不会。如果没有你的话，在天际省旅行的光景就完全不同了。

String.Source: So why not? I'll lend you my blade, if you'll lend me your ears.
String.Dest: 为什么不呢？我会把我的剑借给你，如果你稍稍借我会儿耳朵的话。

String.Source: You're as good as dead!
String.Dest: 你死定了！

String.Source: Yeah, it turns out I'm pretty good at this selling thing. Must be my lizard charm. Here you go.
String.Dest: 恩啊，事实上我挺擅长卖东西的。一定是因为我蜥蜴的魅力。这是你的份儿。

String.Source: Don't know what he wanted, but that Psijic gave me a cold shiver up my scales. Well, I got off easy. I think Ancano went off to change his diaper!
String.Dest: 不知道他想要什么，但赛伊克都让我的尾巴寒得直起鸡皮疙瘩啦。呃，我很容易就能恢复的。我想安卡诺已经放弃给他换尿布了！

String.Source: May your road lead you to warm sands.
String.Dest: 愿你的前路是温暖的沙地。

String.Source: This is ridiculous.
String.Dest: 这太荒谬了。

String.Source: Forgive me, Bodan...all those years, all those lessons...and sometimes I wonder if I've learned anything at all.
String.Dest: 原谅我，波登……这么多年了，这么多的教训……有时我会想，我究竟学到了什么呢。

String.Source: Sure! Where would you like to move?
String.Dest: 当然！你想搬到哪去?

String.Source: It's over. May Dalum-Ei find the peace in death he could not find in life.
String.Dest: 一切都结束了。愿达卢姆艾在死后能寻到他生前求而不得的安宁。

String.Source: The occupants were further in, he said. Black robed mages. Chanting. The whole thing stunk like a Thalmor's wet diaper.
String.Dest: 居住者还在更远处，他说。黑袍法师。吟唱。整件事情都跟臭得跟个梭默的湿尿布似的。

String.Source: I do. Just as I'll miss you, when we part ways. Still, every goodbye is just another detour before our paths cross once more.
String.Dest: 我会的。正如当我们分离，我会想念你。尽管如此，在我们道路交汇之前，每一次再见只是另一种迂回。

String.Source: You know, you could just throw the skeleton key away. If the thieves have bad luck, it means good luck for everyone else!
String.Dest: 你知道的，你完全可以把骷髅钥匙扔得远远的。小偷的霉运对其他人意味着幸运!

String.Source: See you around, handsome.
String.Dest: 再见了帅哥儿。

String.Source: What do you think the history is behind these statues? Walking through them, it feels like we're passing into a whole new world.
String.Dest: 你对在这些雕像背后的历史有什么想法？从它们身边路过，这感觉就像我们穿进了一整个新世界。

String.Source: At first, I thought the "honorable" part was a joke. Our company was made up of liars, drunkards, and lying drunkards.
String.Dest: 首先，我认为“荣耀”部分完全就是个笑话。骗子，醉汉，说谎的酒鬼构成了我们的团队。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么？

String.Source: Stop that!
String.Dest: 停下！

String.Source: But I'm sure if I did know him, I would be proud to call him a friend.
String.Dest: 但如果我认识他，我当然为能叫他作朋友感到骄傲。

String.Source: Is that it? Is that your best?
String.Dest: 它就是？这是你最好的了？

String.Source: It was a cave just like this one. Not unlike thousands of others strewn about Tamriel. Coffins, corpses, and candles on the ground. And black robes.
String.Dest: 是个跟这一样的洞穴。和其他成百上千遍布在泰姆瑞尔大陆的洞穴不一样。棺材，尸体，地上的蜡烛，黑色的长袍。

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: Wake up traveler! Bodan and Dalum-Ei! They're gone!
String.Dest: 醒来！旅行者！ 波登和达卢姆艾! 他们跑啦!

String.Source: You know, "Protect yourself right, buy armor from Grelka!"
String.Dest: 你知道的，“真正的保护自己，从格瑞卡那里买盔甲！”

String.Source: You've returned.
String.Dest: 你回来了。

String.Source: You speak truly. Have you heard any interesting rumors of late?
String.Dest: 如你所说，你最近听过什么有趣的传言吗？

String.Source: These aren't ordinary bandits, traveler. It takes guts to kill a mammoth. Be ready for a fight.
String.Dest: 这些不是那些普通的盗贼，旅行者。杀死一头猛犸象需要极大勇气。准备好战斗吧。

String.Source: Put that snowback to sleep, traveler!
String.Dest: 把那个外地佬放倒，旅行者！

String.Source: You really know how to inspire confidence in your friends, don't you? Are you sure it's not too late to go after that prisoner?
String.Dest: 你很会激起同伴的自信，不是么？你确定追逐那个囚犯不会显得太迟?

String.Source: I'll teach you to talk to me that way!
String.Dest: 你居然敢这样跟我说话！

String.Source: When Bodan played, it was as much for him than it was for his love. When he released all that anger, he was able to better hide his pain.
String.Dest: 当波登演奏时，他完全地投入其中。他把愤怒都释放出来，这样他可以更好地把痛苦埋藏在心里。

String.Source: Thanks again for saving my life.
String.Dest: 再次谢谢你救了我一命。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. It's not his fault. Whatever doors he opens, we'll just have to close them shut.
String.Dest: 没关系。这不是他的错。无论他打开哪扇门，我们都会把它关上。

String.Source: Orthorn reminds me of a young man who was similarly torn between two paths. But in the end, youth will gravitate toward excitement and danger.
String.Dest: 奥松恩让我想起了一个中了陷阱、在一条岔路口被撕成两半的年轻人。不管怎么说，年轻……就意味着冒险。激情以及危险。

String.Source: Maybe if we gave it a peace offering, like a goat or the Jarl of Windhelm, it might not be in such a rush to fight!
String.Dest: 或许如果我们给它一份和解的礼物，比如说一只山羊或者风盔城的领主之类的，它就不会这么急着跟咱干架了。

String.Source: (Laughs) Careful, traveler, people might think we're a company of Dragonslayers!
String.Dest: (笑声) 小心，旅行者，人们可能会误以为我们是屠龙者的同伴!

String.Source: Not true, traveler. How many rotten, evil, horrible sons of a werecroc have survived as long as the Companions?
String.Dest: 不，旅行者。有多少堕落的，邪恶的，恐怖的邪恶之子子存活得和战友团一样长？

String.Source: When I asked him about his past, he'd start with half-truths, before saying "If you really want to know what happened, talk to the bard."
String.Dest: 当我问起他的过去，在说出‘如果你真的想要知道发生了什么，就去问吟游诗人吧’这话之前，他一直都半真半假的给我讲故事。

String.Source: Right.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Like the pinch of a mudcrab!
String.Dest: 就像被泥沼蟹夹了一下！

String.Source: Shall we get moving?
String.Dest: 我们动身吗？

String.Source: Weapons and armor on the table. Could be Forsworn. I hope its Forsworn.
String.Dest: 桌子上有武器和铠甲。可能是弃誓者的。我希望是弃誓者。

String.Source: Certainly! It's a fine tune and a good request!
String.Dest: 当然！那是首不错的曲子，非常好的选择！

String.Source: (Laughs) Sure, why not. I was going to say three hundred, but who really knows? No one's seen a dragon in thousands of years.
String.Dest: (笑声) 是啊，为什么不。我可以说三百，但是谁又真的知道呢？已经有一千多年没人看见过龙了。

String.Source: You sound like Dalum-Ei. I was always the least prepared among us, and he made it known to everyone.
String.Dest: 你听上去就像达卢姆艾。我总是我们之中准备最少的，而他总是把这件事让所有人都知道。

String.Source: Be careful, traveler. Dalum-Ei said it's a slippery slope, once you start making exceptions to your code.
String.Dest: 当心，旅行者。达卢姆艾说一旦你以你自己的名义做这种不受保护的项目，就会发生灾难性的跌价。

String.Source: Die, dragon!
String.Dest: 去死吧，巨龙！

String.Source: I kept going north, figuring at some point the boy would stop following me. Got to give it to the little runt, he had courage.
String.Dest: 我保持一路向北，想着也许在某一时刻这孩子能停止跟随我。我可以把他放到一头小兽的背上让小兽拖着他走，他就会有勇气了。

String.Source: Just in case what? This Giant ends up using one of us as a backscratcher? No wonder you want another lizard by your side!
String.Dest: 以防什么万一？这个巨人居然就被一个痒痒挠打败了？难怪你觉得你需要个巫师呢！

String.Source: Well, we better check on Bodan. If these sellswords are any indication, he's going to have a lot of corpses to burn tonight.
String.Dest: 嗯，我们最好查查波登。如果这些佣兵有什么异常，他今天晚上就有很多尸体要烧干净了。

String.Source: Pressure plates. Probably rigged with all sorts of traps. My advice? Don't step on the rigged ones!
String.Dest: 压板。也许还连接着其他陷阱。我的建议？别踩！

String.Source: The Giants here must pray to the sleeping tree. No crazier than Talos worship, I suppose!
String.Dest: 这里的巨人必须向沉睡的树祈祷。我猜，没有什么比塔洛斯崇拜更神经病的了！

String.Source: Thanks.
String.Dest: 谢谢。

String.Source: Then there was the Bosmer, Indrel. Lazy girl, that one. When we made camp, she slept in the trees. But always with one eye open.
String.Dest: 这儿曾经有个木精灵, 英卓尔. 是个懒惰的姑娘。当我们扎营的时候，她就睡在树上。但总是睁着一只眼。

String.Source: It was me against them, and I couldn't lose.
String.Dest: 那是我反抗了他们。我不能输。

String.Source: A passageway like this is a double-edged sword. It's a good escape route, but it's also an open invitation to assassins.
String.Dest: 这样的通道有利有弊。虽然它利于逃跑，但也易进入杀手。

String.Source: Hey, be careful!
String.Dest: 嘿，小心点！

String.Source: Tidings.
String.Dest: 怎么样？

String.Source: Dragons...Alduin's wall...ancient Akaviri temples...this is getting heavy traveler, but I'll be here if you need help carrying the weight.
String.Dest: 龙...奥杜因之墙...古老的阿卡维尔庙宇...这听起来太玄了旅行者, 但当你需要我的时候我会为你减轻负担的.

String.Source: Really? (Laughs) I admire you Dragonborn. You never forget to take care of the little things.
String.Dest: 真的? (笑声) 我佩服你龙裔. 你从来不忽视细节.

String.Source: I marched up to them, lashing my tail against the water. I said "I heard this company is in need of a true knight. Well, look no further."
String.Dest: 我悄悄的靠近他们，用尾巴轻拍水面。我说 "我听说这个伙伴是个真正的骑士。好吧至少现在是。"

String.Source: (Laughs) But why not? You've caught me on a good day. Alright, I'll help you slay this Giant.
String.Dest: (笑声) 但为什么不呢？你在这样的好天遇到了我。好吧，我会帮你杀了这个巨人。

String.Source: Why does your friend lives in the Ratways? Not enough corpses at the college?
String.Dest: 为什么你的朋友住在鼠道？难道大学的尸体不够？

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 你先进洞。小心脚下。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, I can't say I didn't have my own suspicions. Truth is, I've heard all manner of strange noises echoing through the marsh.
String.Dest: (笑声) 好吧，我不得不说我也起疑心了。事实是我听到了湿地回响着各种奇怪的声音。

String.Source: When she met Dalum-Ei, she was probably perched up high, half asleep, but out of harm's way.
String.Dest: 当她遇见达卢姆艾时, 她在高处迷迷糊糊的，但不危险。

String.Source: I just want to make sure I don't flinch. A knight has to be decisive on the battlefield. Sometimes, I wonder if I still am.
String.Dest: 我只想确认我不会退缩。 一个骑士在战场上必须要果断。 有时我在想我是否依旧这样。

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 噢！

String.Source: It's always good to reunite a dog with its master. Even better if it comes at the expense of a cult of vampires!
String.Dest: 能够让狗跟它的主人团聚总是令人开心的，更别说是拿一群吸血鬼作为祭品。

String.Source: Want to talk? Go ahead.
String.Dest: 想谈谈吗？请便。

String.Source: Stendarr be with you.
String.Dest: 斯丹达尔与你同在。

String.Source: We gather here today, under Mara's loving gaze, to bear witness to the union of two souls in eternal companionship.
String.Dest: 我们齐聚于此，在玛拉慈爱的注视中，见证两个灵魂的结合。

String.Source: Foul sorcery lies beyond this door. There's no mistaking it this time.
String.Dest: 邪恶巫术就在门后. 这一次没错了。

String.Source: Only a handful of hatchlings were chosen. All of them were males. Males I bested in combat a hundred times over.
String.Dest: 只有极少数的小家伙被选中。他们都是男性。数量是我在战争中击败男性的100倍。

String.Source: By Ysmir, you'll pay for that!
String.Dest: 伊斯米尔在上，你会为此付出代价的!

String.Source: We'll drive out the Empire from this land that we own. With our blood and our steel we will take back our home.
String.Dest: 驱逐帝国找回自我，用鲜血和盔甲重建家国。

String.Source: This place isn't as lively as The Bannered Mare, but at least they sell weapons. That almost makes up for it.
String.Dest: 这地方不像母马横幅一样兴盛, 但至少他们出售武器. 这在某种程度上弥补了它的不足.

String.Source: Now, having slain him, I know his pain.
String.Dest: 把他杀掉之后，我知道了他的那种痛苦。

String.Source: For the Companions!
String.Dest: 为了战友团！

String.Source: Trust me, mage. When it comes to mistakes, that much I understand.
String.Dest: 相信我，法师。当错误来临时的那种感觉我最清楚。

String.Source: It was a tree like this. Sitting on a tiny island. The seven of them were standing there, waiting for the eighth.
String.Dest: 这就像这样的一棵树，在一个小岛上，他们中的七个人已经等候在那里，等着第八个人的出现。

String.Source: And I swore my own vow. To protect the lives of my friends, and to never let another innocent die.
String.Dest: 我以自己生命立誓：以我全部生命保护至亲好友，让纯真在世界上不会消亡！

String.Source: Oh they did, but Dalum-Ei assured them I was on the up and up. He was our leader, and the one who assembled the crew. I never asked him why.
String.Dest: 他们真的这么干了， 但是达卢姆艾确信我爬得越来越高。他是我们的头儿，他负责组织所有人。我从不问为什么。

String.Source: There's a cave here. Maybe we should check it out.
String.Dest: 这有个洞穴，咱们进去看看？

String.Source: I don't have to take this from the likes of you.
String.Dest: 我不是非得从你这种人手里拿到这个。

String.Source: The only thing I've seen up here is snow and goats. If we stay up here tonight, I can pretty much guess what we're having for dinner.
String.Dest: 我在这只看到了雪和羊。如果我们今晚留在这儿，我已经预感到晚餐的菜谱了。

String.Source: But maybe that's your way of making me feel better. It was hard to stomach not being able to be there at the end.
String.Dest: 但是大概这只是你让我开心的法子吧？没有最终到达那个目的地，这种事情我可很难忘怀。

String.Source: You should stop if you have doubts. I don't know what makes a Nightingale special, but I bet Mercer bleeds like any man if you stick him.
String.Dest: 心存疑虑的话就应该停手。我不知道夜莺的特别之处在什么地方，但我知道墨瑟被剑刺入胸膛的时候一样会流血、死亡。

String.Source: Maybe that's why Dalum-Ei kept me around. I was but a hatchling then. I had energy, and I had confidence.
String.Dest: 大概这就是达卢姆艾为什么让我在他身边了。我可不是弱鸡，我有力量，还有勇气。

String.Source: Do come back.
String.Dest: 记得回来。

String.Source: Maybe he's just lonely. Have you considered that?
String.Dest: 他大概很孤独，你有考虑过他的感受么？

String.Source: Is that the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了？

String.Source: So this is home. It's almost too good to be true. Maybe I'll start a store, to keep me busy when I'm not adventuring.
String.Dest: 家……甜蜜的家……我真的回家了……我想开个小店，每天忙来忙去进货出货而不是打生打死。

String.Source: Hear, hear!
String.Dest: 你听，你听！

String.Source: They may not understand, but I know you will. Ever since Dalum-Ei died, I keep thinking back to that day, and the child that was spared.
String.Dest: 他们不会懂，但你一定会懂。达卢姆艾死了，我却一直在想着那天的一幕幕情境，以及那个活下来的孩子。

String.Source: Bodan...thank you.
String.Dest: 波登……谢了……

String.Source: The boy! Is he all right?
String.Dest: 孩子！他还好么？

String.Source: Hey, there's a cave here. Animals, bandits, or maybe both.
String.Dest: 嘿，这有个洞穴。强盗,怪兽，或者两者皆有。

String.Source: It doesn't look like the marketplace is open. Let's get some rest and come back in the morning.
String.Dest: 市场还没开啊……咱们先回去睡一觉（哈欠）早上再过来？

String.Source: That boy was the last bit of honor we have left. I owe it to the company to find him, and make sure he's safe.
String.Dest: 那个孩子是我们仅存的一点荣誉了。我答应过战友们要把他找到，并保护他的安全的。

String.Source: It's a relief to see you standing, traveler. I'd give my tail to stick my sword into Mercer's gut, but this is Karliah's revenge. We do it her way.
String.Dest: 看见你还活着我真高兴，旅行者。我真想把我的剑刺进墨瑟人的胸膛，但这个是卡莱雅的复仇啊，我们按照她来就好了。

String.Source: You are perceptive, Companion. You have the makings of a great leader. Yes, I misled the three of you earlier when I said I could not find Indrel.
String.Dest: 你的感知很敏锐，战友。你有领导者的必备素质。是的，之前当我说我找不到英卓尔的时候，我误导了你们。

String.Source: Listen up! I'm only going to say this once. We're taking the boy. Stand aside and you live. Get in our way, and you die.
String.Dest: 听好了！我就特么说一次！我们手上有这个孩子！你站一边去！这没你的事！你想阻拦的话就做好死的准备吧！

String.Source: I almost feel sorry for those old heroes. One night in that stink, and even Ysgramor is going to wish he died a coward!
String.Dest: 我差点就要因为那些古代英雄感到悲哀了。那些臭气熏天的历史，就连伊斯格拉谟都希望那个弱鸡就这么消失了得了！

String.Source: Me, I still have a long way to go. After all, real knights keep their armor polished and their scales clean.
String.Dest: 我？我还有很长的路要走呢。不管怎么说，真正的骑士总会随时擦亮他们的装甲，清洁它们的鳞片。

String.Source: No, but I did run into one of your friends.
String.Dest: 没有，但我确实遇到了你的一个朋友。

String.Source: I hope they'll serve the roast venison with bittergreen sauce that we had at the last party.
String.Dest: 我希望他们能提供烤鹿肉和苦菜酱，就像我们上次宴会吃的那种。

String.Source: In a lot of ways, a good song is like good company.
String.Dest: 从很多方面上来看，好的歌曲跟好的同伴一样重要。

String.Source: Those in my company will tell you I wear it to mourn the refugees who died that day, and all the innocents who die in the pangs of war.
String.Dest: 我的战友都会告诉你，我穿这套衣服是为了悼念那天死去的人们，以及因为战争的悲痛而死掉的善良的人。

String.Source: I think we're done here.
String.Dest: 没事了。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Most of all I think of you, Dragonborn. It was honor to watch you fight, and a pleasure to have your company. Thank you.
String.Dest: 我主要在思考你的事，龙裔。看着你战斗是我的荣耀，和你搭档是一种享受。谢谢你。

String.Source: Neither is this place, but it's probably where he'll end up otherwise. Face it, the three of us alone won't be enough to protect him.
String.Dest: 不是这里，但总归是一个什么地方可以让他终老一生的。面对现实吧，我们三个保护不了他的。

String.Source: So what are they, a cult? All the more reason for the three of us to work together.
String.Dest: 所以这是啥？一个仪式？各种让咱们三个在一起奋斗的原因么？

String.Source: Part of me thought it would be better to slay him. But another part of me saw the hatchling in the swamp, just trying to survive until morning.
String.Dest: 理智的一部分告诉我，把他干掉会比较好，但另一部分情感告诉我，在太阳出来前，还是在沼泽里保护他，让他别受到伤害吧。

String.Source: So the Companions live in a mead hall, eh? Although I could say the same about every Nord home.
String.Dest: 所以战友团住在蜜酒大厅？……尽管我看见每个诺的人的居住地都会这么说。

String.Source: She also said that Ula-Wei would never let his guard down unless the killer was someone he trusted.
String.Dest: 她也说了，乌拉卫除非看到了他信赖的人，否则是不会放下警觉的。

String.Source: So you're a mage. Seems a little odd for you to be hunting bandits.
String.Dest: 你是个法师啊……这种人物来处理强盗……有点怪怪的。

String.Source: But yes, I consider it a privilege to have known you, and fought with you. I've known many great heroes in my time, but none more honorable.
String.Dest: 但是……使得，我觉得了解你并跟你并肩作战是一种荣誉……我在过去的时光里见到过许多英雄，但没有一个有你的荣耀和成就。

String.Source: What happened?
String.Dest: 什么状况？

String.Source: Or maybe he's nodding his head in approval. I can't tell with these Nords if drinking yourself stupid is a sin.
String.Dest: 或者说他点着头表示支持？我不能跟诺德人说出他们的窘况……如果喝多了出丑也算一种罪过的话。

String.Source: We drink to our youth, and to days come and gone. For the age of oppression is now nearly done.
String.Dest: 为了我们的青春，为了那些逝去的和将来的日子，我们干杯。

String.Source: Let's just hope we don't end up on the wrong end of this trade.
String.Dest: 祈祷这次交易咱们别吃亏吧……

String.Source: This ends now!
String.Dest: 你的末日到了！

String.Source: As opposed to going backwards? (Laughs) I haven't thought about it, but your company makes me long for the old days.
String.Dest: 转身回去？ (笑声)我没这么想过，但是你的同伴让我想起了一些陈年往事。

String.Source: All hail to Ulfric! You are the High King! In your great honor we drink and we sing.
String.Dest: 向乌弗瑞克欢呼！您是至高王！我们为你的荣耀举杯欢庆。

String.Source: (Laughs) Don't worry Elf. I'm stronger than I look, and I tend to draw attention. This Giant will definitely kill you last.
String.Dest: (笑声) 别慌啊小精灵，我可比看上去强壮的多，并且更吸引眼球……你会是最后一个被干掉的。

String.Source: Is that so? Then I'd hate to see you when you're angry! (Laughs) You just need to trust in your companions, and you'll feel as strong as the Hist.
String.Dest: 真的假的？你发怒的时候我可不想看到你！（笑声）相信你的战友，你会和希斯特一样强壮。

String.Source: If he thinks this is the best way to go about it, then I trust him.
String.Dest: 如果他觉得这是最好的处理方式，那我相信他。

String.Source: If I remember it right, I think all that's left now is to tell the priest in Mara. I'll leave that to you.
String.Dest: 如果我没记错的话，就剩下一件事没做了……告诉玛拉祭司。拜托了。

String.Source: You know, you don't have to come. These mages are part of your company, aren't they? They're people you know.
String.Dest: 你知道，你其实不用来的。那些法师是你的战友对吧？他们才是你熟悉的人。

String.Source: Of course! What are items but things to be shared amongst friends!
String.Dest: 当然了！好东西就要一起分享啊！

String.Source: The dockworkers here wear their sorrow like a tunic. Is there anything nudity can't solve?
String.Dest: 这些码头工人穿着束腰工作服很难受吧？裸着上身展现健美肌肉不好么？

String.Source: Some of these Nords are too afraid they'll sound like milk-drinkers to tell you how they really feel.
String.Dest: 那些诺德人中的一部分太害怕被人看成吃奶娃娃了……以至于不敢说实话。

String.Source: But maybe there's something about you I don't know. Are you hiding a pair of wings under those clothes?
String.Dest: 但总该有什么事是你不知道的吧！你确认衣服下面没藏着一对翅膀？

String.Source: The shopkeeps earn their gold through sweat and hard work, and the thieves throw a tantrum because they think they're entitled to it. It's not right.
String.Dest: 店主们付出汗水和努力获得金币，但是盗贼却因为没获得这些所谓的“应得之物”而大发雷霆？呵呵，呵呵呵，呵呵呵呵。

String.Source: This town has suffered many a tragedy, and yet through it all they endure. The Nords are hard people, traveler.
String.Dest: 这个镇子的惨剧可真够多的啊……尽管他们活该。诺德人还真是冷酷啊，对吧旅行者？

String.Source: I was an aggressive little scaleback, always charging on ahead, trying to prove myself to the others.
String.Dest: 我为人比较冲动,经常冲在前面, 并尝试表现自己。

String.Source: I just didn't want to do it until I new the boy was safe.
String.Dest: 在确保那小子安全之前我是不会干这事的。

String.Source: How big do you think this spider is? Ten feet wide? Twenty? My blood is boiling just thinking about slaying it.
String.Dest: 你能想象这蜘蛛有多大吗? 十英尺那么宽? 还是二十英尺? 我只感到热血沸腾想冲上去宰了它.

String.Source: Maybe that's why I'm actually considering your offer. A Giant! By the Hist, I must be losing my mind!
String.Dest: 可能那就是为何我在考虑你的协助. 一个巨人! 希斯特在上，我快疯掉了!

String.Source: Die witch!
