String.Dest: 死吧女巫！

String.Source: Die, worm!
String.Dest: 去死，蛆虫！

String.Source: (Laughs) But they have beards! Gray ones, even. That makes them wise.
String.Dest: (笑声)但是他们有胡子啊！灰色的胡子，让他们看上去更聪明的胡子。

String.Source: It was. I could tell you a thousand stories of the glory days, but most of them only remind me of how it ended, and what we lost.
String.Dest: 是的。我能告诉你几千个过去发生的荣耀战绩，但是我现在想起来的……却只有他们的消亡和我们的损失。

String.Source: I can't disagree more, traveler. Bodan must have recognized a kindred spirit. Someone with her own ghosts.
String.Dest: 我完全赞同，旅行者。波登一定感受到了血脉中的灵魂相通，有些还是他自己的灵魂。

String.Source: Yeah, the town seems much more at ease, although people still don't look Falion in the eye. Only now it's out of guilt.
String.Dest: 这个镇子气氛还是很轻松的，唯一的问题就是法利昂还是没被放在眼里。这可不是负罪感的事情了。

String.Source: A blind man standing watch? I didn't know bandits had a sense of humor.
String.Dest: 瞎子站岗？强盗也开始走搞笑娱乐路线了？

String.Source: Now go on. Slay that dragon. I've got to track down the Jarl's maid. I bet the floor here hasn't been swept for ages, with all this dust in my eyes.
String.Dest: 继续吧，去屠龙吧。我已经查到了领主的女儿。这地板多少年没扫过了？这么厚一层灰！

String.Source: They say the Dragonborn comes, but I haven't the faintest clue where you're going. Perhaps we ought to stop and ask fate for directions.
String.Dest: 他们都说龙裔来了，但是他们没有一丁点的证据证明你的位置……要不咱们也停下脚步问问圣灵们你的未来方向？

String.Source: I'll show you what a real Orc can do!
String.Dest: 让你见识一下兽人的强大！

String.Source: Take your best shot!
String.Dest: 来吧！

String.Source: You may not be nobility, but you have a presence that rivals any king. And that's why they'll know you belong.
String.Dest: 你大概不是贵族，但你却有着比肩于任何一个过往的气质。这就是他们认出你的原因。

String.Source: With Elia, he wouldn't have to. Not if he was handsome enough.
String.Dest: 跟艾拉他也不用这样吧？这可不是因为他不够帅。

String.Source: A Nordic ruin. It promises treasure, but I wouldn't hold my breath. That will get you killed.
String.Dest: 一个诺德废墟……里面可能有财宝，但我可没什么兴趣……那玩意是要拿命去填的啊。

String.Source: What are you doing?
String.Dest: 你在做什么？

String.Source: Still here.
String.Dest: 还在这里。

String.Source: If only I was faster and in better shape, I could spend it on an ale instead! Ha-ha-ha!
String.Dest: 如果我再快点，外形再狂拽霸酷一点，我就会被粉丝热情的麦芽酒淹死吧！哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！

String.Source: Bodan's song...by the Hist...he was here then.
String.Dest: 波登的那种歌声……呕……希斯特……呕……在上，他又……呕……回来了……呕……

String.Source: Can't be done.
String.Dest: 办不到啊！

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲的唯一原因就是他在那天晚上被强行留在了独孤城。

String.Source: These temples are nice, but there's something mystical about nature, and walking among the Hist that stone and mortar can't capture.
String.Dest: 这些庙宇看上去很不错……但我总是有种对大自然的敬畏感，即使我漫步在这些石头砌起来的希斯特雕像中也不能降低半分。

String.Source: A Dwemer Museum. You mean to tell me these pieces of scrap metal are considered artifacts? Ha! That's a tail-slapper if I ever heard one.
String.Dest: 一个锻莫博物馆。你说这些破铜烂铁是艺术品？哈哈哈，你敢更搞笑点么？！

String.Source: Curse you!
String.Dest: 诅咒你！

String.Source: I doubt that. The boy I knew was a survivor.
String.Dest: 我怀疑这个。据我所知这个孩子还是个幸存者。

String.Source: Need something?
String.Dest: 有事吗？

String.Source: No one bests an Orc!
String.Dest: 没人能击败兽人！

String.Source: A talking orb of light. I must be losing my mind! But if what he says is true, I say it's Ancano that should lose his head.
String.Dest: 一个会说话的光球？！我疯了还是这个世界疯了？！……等等，它说的真的假的啊？安卡诺的脑袋掉了？

String.Source: Happy hunting.
String.Dest: 狩猎愉快。

String.Source: Watch your step, traveler. It's a long way down.
String.Dest: 小心脚下！路才刚开始呢！

String.Source: An ancient Dwarven city built into the rock. And judging by that crossbow by the gate, they probably weren't too fond of their neighbors.
String.Dest: 一座建在岩石里的古代矮人城市。看那些大门边上的石弩，他们可不怎么喜欢周围的邻居啊。

String.Source: Here you are, not the slightest bit worse for wear. They say no one escapes Cidhna Mine. I guess we better start calling you "No One!"
String.Dest: 给你……穿上这个吧，总比没有的穿要强。他们说没人能逃离哪个矿坑？那好吧，我是不是该称呼你为“没人”？

String.Source: Why are you still here?
String.Dest: 你怎么还在这？

String.Source: It was a damn good party. I thank you for having me.
String.Dest: 真是个棒得特么要死的宴会啊！感谢你带着我！

String.Source: They're only allowed on the city docks now. Most of them sleep together in one building, and they're as poor as wretches.
String.Dest: 他们现在只能住在城市的港口，大部分人都挤在一栋建筑里，像乞丐一样贫穷。

String.Source: Somehow I managed. I labored through the bog and hid inside a hollowed out tree. I waited and watched for predators. And as I watched, I learned.
String.Dest: 不知何故，我已经尝试过了。我费劲了九牛二虎之力才在沼泽中的树洞里寻得了一处隐蔽点。我静静的等待着那些肉食者，但就在我观察的时候，我也懂得了不少事情。

String.Source: You and Dalum-Ei go have your little chat. I'll be here.
String.Dest: 你跟达卢姆艾侃大山去吧，我在这。

String.Source: Orthorn, you should really be more careful who you trust. I mean, look a this place! You can tell a lot about a cult by how clean they are.
String.Dest: 奥松恩, 别完全信任那些你觉得可以信任的人。我是说……看这里！你可以在仪式上谈谈这个地方有多干净。

String.Source: You've got my back, and I've got yours. Mine will just be a little heavier than usual.
String.Dest: 我可以放心的把后背交给你，你也一样……我身上的担子比以往重了一点。

String.Source: Got any ale or mead?
String.Dest: 有酒或肉吗？

String.Source: What can I do for you?
String.Dest: 有什么可以效劳的？

String.Source: Drink for the thirsty, food for the hungry.
String.Dest: 渴了畅饮美酒，饿了大啖美食。

String.Source: Then mark it on my companion's map. Best you let him lead the way.
String.Dest: 在战友团的地图上加上这个地标。最好是让他给你带路。

String.Source: Ula-Wei was a master assassin. Arnwulf was a bear in single combat. Elia and Moon-Tail were both accomplished mages.
String.Dest: 乌拉卫是个刺客大师。阿恩武夫在近身战中简直就是狂暴巨熊。艾拉和月尾则是经验丰富的法师。

String.Source: How can I argue with that?
String.Dest: 我怎能不同意呢？

String.Source: But you're right, when this party's over, I'm headed back to the Rift.
String.Dest: 但是你是对的，宴会结束之后我就马上返回裂谷城。

String.Source: The old Nord ruins are like a swamp of traps and stone. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 这个诺德遗迹简直就是石头和陷阱的集中营……小心。

String.Source: (Sigh) As am I. It seems like I'm always mourning someone. There will be plenty of time for that though, when this business is done.
String.Dest: (叹气) 我也是。我受够了参加一个有一个的葬礼了。一切都搞定之后我会有足够的时间来好好悼念的。

String.Source: Easily blocked!
String.Dest: 很容易堵住！

String.Source: My scales always get the shivers in a place like this. Old ghosts haunt these halls, and long shadows hide them.
String.Dest: 我的鳞片总是不自觉地这么打颤。古老的幽灵盘旋不去，浓厚的阴影覆盖着他们。

String.Source: Bodan! It looks like that Thalmor was right. Gabania sent these men.
String.Dest: 波登!看上去梭默是对的。卡贝尼亚派出的这些人。

String.Source: Show me.
String.Dest: 让我看看。

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！

String.Source: If they kidnapped the boy, then we don't have much time. We need to find him!
String.Dest: 如果这个孩子被绑架了，那我们可没什么时间磨蹭了！快去找他！

String.Source: Thank you.
String.Dest: 谢谢。

String.Source: The area in front is well lit, but this tunnel is dark. I think that vampire would look good with an arrow sticking out of his neck.
String.Dest: 前面灯火通明，但是这个洞里却一片漆黑。我认为那个吸血鬼的脖子被箭刺穿之后看起来会很不错。

String.Source: Maybe it was a death wish, to challenge a Master Conjurer. I'd be lying if I said I hadn't thought about it. But Agni made me change my mind.
String.Dest: 大概只有想死才会许下愿望去挑战一个魔法大师。如果我说我从没考虑过这个那一定是扯谎。但是阿格尼让我改变了想法。

String.Source: That's an impressive sword you carry. I've always marveled at Akaviri craftsmanship.
String.Dest: 你带这把剑真是让人印象深刻。我总是对阿卡维尔的技艺感到无比惊叹。

String.Source: Gah!
String.Dest: 嘎！

String.Source: There's something about that girl that's bound to the shadows. You can drag her to the light, but it'll kill her in the end.
String.Dest: 这有些关于那个被阴影束缚的女孩的。你可以把她拽向光明，但你这么做这最后会要了她的命。

String.Source: I'm sorry, sir, I'm on duty.
String.Dest: 很抱歉，先生。这是我的职责。

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要剁掉你的脑袋！

String.Source: Is that an Amulet of Mara? You should be careful with that. I might just get the wrong idea.
String.Dest: 那是马拉的护身符么？你可得小心点那玩意。我会想歪的。

String.Source: Old Rorik has some ambition. I'm surprised he doesn't have his own banners yet. Maybe someone will confuse him for a Jarl!
String.Dest: 老罗里克有些野心。我很奇怪他怎么还没自立为王。也许有人想要让他乘乱成为领主！

String.Source: Only three beds? These fire mages must sleep in shifts. Or standing up!
String.Dest: 只有三张床？这些火焰法师必须换地方。要么就给我站着睡！

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Savos and Mirabelle dead, and yet the slimy worm still lives. A true knight would never let such deaths go unavenged. Nor would a swamp one.
String.Dest: 萨沃斯和米拉贝勒死了，但是那些只会拍马屁的蛀虫还活着。一个真正的骑士不会让一个未得雪耻的人就这么走了。即使被掩埋在历史深处。

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错晚餐了，畜生！

String.Source: (Laughs) As long as you let me pay for it! What kind of lizard would I be if I didn't buy a drink for the savior of Skyrim!
String.Dest: (笑声) 只要你让我掏钱！要是我不请上天际的救星喝上一杯的话我就是个超级大二逼。

String.Source: Do you need something?
String.Dest: 你要什么？

String.Source: You're the boss.
String.Dest: 你说了算。

String.Source: Maybe if you're a dragon! (Laughs) Now if this shout were called "Lizardrend," then I might have reason to worry.
String.Dest: 如果你是条龙的话！(笑声)现在如果这种喊叫可以称得上是 "亚龙裂" ，那也许我还会稍微担心一小下。

String.Source: Sure, I'll shoulder some of your burden!
String.Dest: 当然，我会替你分担一些！

String.Source: I know this isn't your fight, traveler, but whoever killed the others must be one damn good fighter, and I'd feel better if you were by my side.
String.Dest: 我知道这不是你的战斗,旅行者,但是能杀死其他人的人必定是经历过生死战斗的优秀战士,而且如果你在我身边，会让我的感觉更好。

String.Source: It's been a brutal winter. I can't remember the last time it was this cold, and for this long.
String.Dest: 这个冬天真要命，我不记得还有哪个冬天有这么冷，还持续了这么久。

String.Source: You will yield or you will die!
String.Dest: 投降！或者死！

String.Source: As you will.
String.Dest: 如你所愿。

String.Source: Hm...you may be right. Sometimes, the best thing for a child is to be around kids his age.
String.Dest: 嗯……也许你是对的。有些时候，对于孩子最好的东西就是他周围的同龄人。

String.Source: I hate to say it traveler, but the honorable don't lie. It was definitely you.
String.Dest: 我不想提这个，旅行者，但是有荣耀感的人不会说谎。全是因为你。

String.Source: The Companions don't seem to care that Skjor's dead. I don't think Aela's told any of them.
String.Dest: 战友团看上去并不在乎思科月的死。我不认为艾拉已经把这事告诉战友团的其他人了。

String.Source: The company disbanded. Honor brought us together, and dishonor drove us apart. Me and the healer, Elia, went north. The boy, he followed.
String.Dest: 连队解散了。荣耀让我们聚在一起，耻辱让我们分崩离析。我还有治疗者伊利亚去了北方。那个男孩还跟着。

String.Source: Well, I certainly wouldn't have expected you to protect me! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 哈哈哈，我可没指望过你能保护我！ (笑声)

String.Source: Oh really? You better tell our friend over there to get back in his coffin!
String.Dest: 哦真的？你最好快去那告诉我们的朋友让他赶快回到他的棺材里。

String.Source: You're not going to help this coven of cannibals, are you? Normally, I say to each their own, but not if you eat your own.
String.Dest: 你不会去帮助这些食人女巫对吧？一般来说，我是指所有的这种家伙，除非你想吃了你自己。

String.Source: Ha, I can't see my toes. Now I know how a Jarl feels after dinner.
String.Dest: 哈，我看不见我的脚尖了。现在我终于知道一个领主晚饭后是什么感觉了。

String.Source: But we both were founded on honor and glory. The fact that a few people around here still believe in it is a testament to their company.
String.Dest: 但是我们都是为了荣耀和赞颂。实际上这里很少还有人始终相信他们同伴的遗嘱。

String.Source: That Elf was a real sharp one, crossing the heroes who just killed a giant spider. Only a matter of time before he sat on his own sword.
String.Dest: 那个精灵就是一个大骗子，说什么杀了大蜘蛛的英雄。你看着吧，他早晚一屁股坐到自己的剑上。

String.Source: Well, I plunged my sword into it enough times where it could be either.
String.Dest: 当然，我把我的剑在里面放了足够久……起码足够让它可以变成任何其他东西。

String.Source: Get lost.
String.Dest: 给我滚。

String.Source: Maybe if our company had more whiskers, we would've never made that horrible mistake.
String.Dest: 如果我们的伙伴有更多的胡须，我们也许就不会犯那个可怕的错误了。

String.Source: I'm on your side!
String.Dest: 我是帮你的啊！
